block_quote.content: Nhyira ne onipa a
ɔnnante abɔnefoɔ agyina mu,
na ɔnnyina nnebɔneyɛfoɔ kwan soɔ,
na ɔntena fɛdifoɔ tenabea,
na mmom n’ani gye AWURADE mmara ho,
na ɔdwene ho awia ne anadwo.
Ɔte sɛ dua
a atim asubɔnten ho
a ɛso n’aba ne berɛ mu,
na n’ahahan mpo,
na deɛ ɔyɛ nyinaa bɛwie yie.
Na abɔnefoɔ deɛ, wɔnte saa,
na wɔte sɛ ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ guo.
Enti abɔnefoɔ renni bem atemmuo mu,
na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ rennya kyɛfa wɔ teneneefoɔ asafo mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE nim teneneefoɔ kwan,
na abɔnefoɔ kwan deɛ, ɛbɛyera.
Adɛn nti na amanaman yɛ gyegyeegye,
na aman susu ade hunu yi?
Asase so ahemfo sɔre gyina,
na atumfoɔ bom tu agyina
tia AWURADE ne deɛ wasra no no sɛ,
Momma yɛmmubu wɔn mpokyerɛ,
na yɛnto wɔn nhoma mfiri yɛn ho ngu.
Deɛ ɔte soro no sere,
AWURADE di wɔn ho fɛw.
Ɛno na ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ wɔn n’abufuo mu,
na ɔde n’abufuhyeɛ bɛyi wɔn hu aka sɛ:
Me AWURADE na masi me hene,
me bepɔ kronkron Sion so.
Na mɛka no deɛ AWURADE ahyɛ no.
AWURADE ase me sɛ: Me ba ne wo,
ɛnnɛ na mawo woɔ.
Bisa me, na mede amanaman bɛyɛ wo apɛgyadeɛ,
na mama woafa asase ano nohoa adi so
Wode dadeɛ poma bɛbubu wɔn,
na woabobɔ wɔn sɛ ɔnwomfoɔ ahina.
Na afei, ahemfo, monhunu nyansa.
Asase so atemmufoɔ, montie afotuo.
Monsom AWURADE osuro mu,
na monni ahurisie ahopopoɔ mu.
Momfa nidie mapa mma no,
na ne bo amfu, na moanyera ɔkwan mu;
na aka kakra na n’abufuo adɛ.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa.

fragment.content: Dawid dwom a ɔtoeɛ berɛ a ɔdwane firii ne ba Absalom anim.

block_quote.content: AWURADE, hwɛ sɛdeɛ m’ahohiahiafoɔ si dɔɔso fa!
Wɔn a wɔsɔre tia me no yɛ pii.
Nnipa bebree se me sɛ:
Ɔnni nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn mu.
Sela
Na wo, AWURADE, wone me ho kyɛm,
m’animuonyam ne me werɛkyekyefoɔ.
Mede me nne mesu mefrɛ AWURADE,
na ɔgye me so firi ne bepɔ kronkron so.
Mekɔdae na medae;
manyane, na AWURADE kura me mu.
Mensuro nkurɔfoɔ mpempem
a wɔabɔ me ho nsraban ahyia yi.
O AWURADE, sɔre ɛ!
Me Nyankopɔn, gye me!
Na woabobɔ m’atamfoɔ nyinaa abɔgye,
woabubu abɔnefoɔ se.
Na AWURADE na nkwagyeɛ wɔ no;
wo man so na ma wo nhyira mmra.

note.content: Kasa yi nkyerɛaseɛ wɔ Hebri mu no nna hɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Me sufrɛ mu gye me so, me tenenee Nyankopɔn.
Ahohia mu, woboaa me.
Hu me mmɔbɔ, na tie me mpaebɔ.
Mo mmarima mma, m’animuonyam bɛdane ahohora akɔsi da bɛn?
Mobɛdɔ ade hunu, mobɛdi atorɔ akyi akɔsi da bɛn?
Na monhunu sɛ AWURADE ayi ne dɔfo asi hɔ;
mesu mefrɛ AWURADE a, ɔbɛtie.
Mo bo fu a, monnyɛ bɔne!
Monkasa mo akoma mu wɔ mo daberɛ, na monyɛ komm.
Mommɔ tenenee afɔdeɛ,
na momfa mo ho ntwere AWURADE.
Nnipa bebree bisa sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛma yɛahunu papa?
AWURADE, te w’anim ma no nhran yɛn so.
Wode anigyeɛ ahyɛ m’akomam asene
berɛ a wɔn aburoo ne wɔn nsa dɔɔso no.
Asomdwoeɛ mu na mɛkɔ makɔda, na mada prɛko,
na wo, AWURADE, nko ara na woma metena hɔ dwoodwoo.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa atɛntɛbɛn nto. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me nsɛm,
na hwɛ me nsusuiɛ a mekura mu.
Tie me nteamu,
me hene ne me Nyankopɔn,
na wo na mɛbɔ wo mpaeɛ.
AWURADE, tie me nne anɔpa,
anɔpa na masiesie mama woɔ, na mɛhwɛ wo kwan.
Na wonyɛ Onyankopɔn a wopɛ adebɔne,
ɔbɔnefoɔ ne wo rentena.
Agyimifoɔ rennyina w’anim,
wotane amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa.
Wosɛe wɔn a wɔka atorosɛm.
AWURADE kyiri mogyapɛfoɔ ne asisifoɔ.
Na me deɛ, menam w’adom bebree so
mɛba wo fie,
na wo ho suro mu na mɛkoto masɔre
makyerɛ w’asɔrefie kronkron no.
AWURADE, fa wo tenenee kyerɛ me kwan,
wɔn a wɔtɛ me nti,
tene wo kwan wɔ m’anim.
Na wɔn anomu nni nokwasɛm bi,
wɔn yam wɔ mmusuo,
wɔn menewa yɛ ɛda a abue,
na wɔde wɔn tɛkyerɛma dɛfɛdɛfɛ.
Onyankopɔn, bu wɔn fɔ,
ma wɔmpɔn mfiri wɔn agyinatuo ho.
Wɔn mmarato bebrebe nti sum wɔn gu,
na wɔasɔre atia wo.
Na ma wɔn a wɔdwane bɛtoa woɔ nyinaa ani nnye,
na wɔmfa ahosan nhuro daa,
ɛfiri sɛ woakata wɔn so,
na ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo din no ani nka wo ho.
Na wo, AWURADE, wohyira ɔteneneeni,
wode anisɔ twa ne ho hyia sɛ ɛkyɛm.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto no “Seminit” ɛnne so. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: AWURADE, mfa w’abufuo nka m’anim,
na mfa w’abufuhyeɛ ntwe m’aso.
AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ meyɛ hodwoo;
AWURADE, sa me yadeɛ, na me nnompe abɔ huboaa,
na me kra nso abɔ huboaa sɛ.
Na wo, AWURADE, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn?
Sane bra, AWURADE, bɛgye me kra,
gye me nkwa w’adɔeɛ nti.
Na wo ho nkaeɛ nni owuo mu.
Hwan na ɔbɛyi wo ayɛ Asamandoɔ?
M’apinisie ama mabrɛ,
anadwo biara, me mpa fɔ,
mede me nisuo mefɔ me nnaeɛ.
Awerɛhoɔ ama m’ani ayɛ siamoo,
ɛso ayɛ wisiwisi, m’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa nti.
Mo amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa, momfiri me so mfi!
Na AWURADE ate me su.
AWURADE ate me nkotosrɛ,
AWURADE bɛgye me mpaebɔ so.
M’atamfoɔ nyinaa ani bɛwu, na wɔn ho adwiri wɔn sɛ,
na wɔapatu de fɛreɛ asane.

fragment.content: Dawid adesrɛ dwom a Benyaminni Kus nsɛm nti ɔto maa AWURADE.

block_quote.content: AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, wo na medwane bɛtoa wo.
Gye me m’atifoɔ nyinaa nsam, na yi me!
Na wɔansunsuane me kra sɛ gyata antete me mu
a ɔgyefoɔ nni hɔ.
AWURADE me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mayɛ yei,
na amumuyɛdeɛ bi wɔ me nsam,
sɛ mayɛ deɛ ɔne me te asomdwoeɛ mu bɔne
na madi deɛ ɔha me no amim bi kwa a,
ma ɔtamfoɔ ntaa me kra,
na ɔnkyere me, na ɔntiatia me nkwa so fam,
na ɔmma m’animuonyam nyɛ fam.
AWURADE, sɔre w’abufuo mu,
ma wo ho so tia m’ahohiahiafoɔ aniɛden,
na nyane ma me, wo a woahyɛ atemmuo.
Na ma aman asafo ntwa wo ho nhyia,
na sane firi wɔn so kɔ soro.
AWURADE bɛbu aman atɛn;
AWURADE di m’asɛm sɛdeɛ me tenenee
ne bem a ɛwɔ me mu teɛ.
Ao, ma abɔnefoɔ bɔne to ntwa ɛ!
Na ma ɔteneneeni ntim.
Na wone tenenee Nyankopɔn
a wosɔ akoma ne adwene hwɛ.
Me kyɛm wɔ Nyankopɔn nsam,
ɔno na ɔgye akoma mu teneneeni nkwa.
Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufoɔ tenenee,
ne Onyankopɔn a ɔteatea daa nyinaa.
Sɛ obi annane n’akwan, Onyankopɔn bɛse n’afena,
wakuntunu ne tadua mu, na wasiesie.
Na wasiesie owuo adeɛ ama onii korɔ no,
wayɛ n’agyan ma no hye adeɛ.
Hwɛ, ɔmumuyɛfoɔ nyinsɛn amumuyɛ,
na ɔnyem ɛhaw,
na ɔwo atorɔ.
Watu amena, na wafunu mu,
na ɔtɔ tokuro a ɔno ara tuo no mu.
Ne mmusuo resane abua n’atifi,
na n’amim aduru n’apampam.
Mɛda AWURADE ase sɛdeɛ ne tenenee teɛ,
na mato ayeyie dwom mama AWURADE a ɔwɔ sorosoro no din.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Gittit” sankuo nne so. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Ao, AWURADE, yɛn Awurade,
enim
bɛn na wo din nni
asase nyinaa soɔ!
Wo a wode w’animuonyam akata ɔsoro.
Wo a w’animuonyam pue firi mmɔfra ne nkɔkoaa anomu.
Wo na woasiesie abankɛseɛ, w’atamfo nti,
na wode amua ɔtamfoɔ ne ɔweretɔfoɔ ano.
Sɛ mehwɛ wo soro, wo nsateaa ano adwuma,
ɔsrane ne nsoromma a woasiesie a,
ɔdasani ne hwan a wokae no,
na onipa ba ne hwan a w’ani ku ne ho!
Na woama aka no kakraa bi na wasɛ Onyame,
na wode animuonyam ne anidie abɔ no abotire.
Woama no adi wo nsa ano nnwuma so,
wode nnoɔma nyinaa ahyɛ ne nan ase:
Aane, nnwan ne anantwie nyinaa
ne wiram mmoa nso,
ewiem nnomaa ne ɛpo mu mpataa,
mmoa a ɛnam ɛpo mu akwan soɔ.
Ao, AWURADE, yɛn Awurade,
enim bɛn na wo din nni asase nyinaa soɔ!

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Mut labben! sankuo nne so”. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Mede m’akoma nyinaa mɛda AWURADE ase;
AWURADE, mɛka w’anwanwadeɛ nyinaa akyerɛ.
Mɛgye m’ani na madi ahurisie wɔ wo mu,
mɛto wo a wowɔ sorosoro no din ayeyie dwom.
Ɛfiri sɛ m’atamfoɔ asane wɔn akyi,
wɔatotɔ, na wɔayera w’anim.
Woatena atemmuo adwa so abu atɛn tenenee,
Woadi m’asɛm abu me bem.
Woateatea amanaman, woasɛe abɔnefoɔ,
woapepa wɔn din korakorakora.
Atamfoɔ awie sa adane daa amamfo,
na woama nkuro ase ahye,
na wɔn ho nkaeɛ ayera.
Na AWURADE deɛ, ɔte n’ahennwa so daa,
ɔde n’adwa asi hɔ rebu atɛn.
Ɔno na ɔbɛbu wiase atɛn tenenee mu,
na wadi aman asɛm tenenee mu.
AWURADE bɛyɛ dwanekɔbea ama deɛ wɔrepɛkyɛ no,
ahokyere berɛ mu dwanekɔbea.
Na wɔn a wɔnim wo din de wɔn ho bɛto wo so,
ɛfiri sɛ woannya wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo, AWURADE.
Monto ayeyie dwom mma AWURADE a ɔte Sion,
monka ne nneyɛɛ nkyerɛ aman mu,
sɛ, deɛ ɔtɔ mogya so were no akae wɔn,
na ne werɛ amfiri abrɛfoɔ nteamu.
AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ, hwɛ m’amaneɛ a ɛfiri m’atamfoɔ,
wo a woma me so firi owuo aboboano,
na menka w’ayeyie nyinaa menkyerɛ,
Sion babaa aponkɛseɛ mu,
na menni ahurisie wo nkwagyeɛ mu.
Amanaman amemmem amena a wɔtuiɛ no mu,
afidie a wɔsum huntaeɛ no ayi wɔn nan.
AWURADE ayi ne ho adi, wabu atɛn,
ɔde ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam nneyɛɛ atoatoa no.
Abɔnefoɔ bɛsane akɔ Asamando,
amanaman a wɔn werɛ afiri Onyankopɔn nyinaa.
Na ɛnyɛ daa na ne werɛ bɛfiri ohiani,
na ɛnyɛ daa na mmɔborɔni anidasoɔ bɛyera.
AWURADE, sɔre, mma ɔdasani nnni nim,
ma wɔmmu amanaman atɛn w’anim.
AWURADE, yi wɔn hu,
na amanaman nhunu sɛ wɔyɛ adasamma.
AWURADE, adɛn nti na wogyina akyirikyiri,
na wode wo ho hunta ahokyere berɛ mu?
Ɔbɔnefoɔ ahantan nti ɛmma mmɔborɔni ho hyehye no,
wɔde wɔn atirimpɔ a wɔabɔ no kye wɔn.
Na ɔbɔnefoɔ hoahoa ne ho ade a ne kra kɔn dɔ ho,
na omimfoɔ ka abususɛm yi AWURADE ahi.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ dwa n’anomu ka sɛ: Hwee mfa ne ho.
Onyankopɔn bi nni baabi! n’adwene nyinaa ne no.
N’akwan yere hɔ pintinn daa nyinaa.
W’atemmudeɛ asɔre n’ani so kɔ akyirikyiri,
ɔmfa n’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa nyɛ ahuro.
Ɔse no n’akomam sɛ: Merenhinhim da,
daa nyinaa merenhyia amaneɛ biara.
Nnome, nkontomposɛm ne amimdie ahyɛ n’anomu ma,
na ɔhaw ne mmusuo hyɛ ne tɛkyerɛma ase.
Ɔtetɛ nsumaeɛ mu,
ɔdi deɛ ɔnyɛɛ hwee no awu kokoam,
ɔwɔ awiɛmfoɔ ho ani.
Ɔtɛ kokoam sɛ gyata wɔ ne bɔn mu,
ɔtɛ sɛ ne nsa bɛka mmɔborɔni
ne nsa ka mmɔborɔni no twe no ba n’afidie mu.
Ɔkoto, ɔdɛɛdɛɛ,
na awiɛmfoɔ akɔka ne nsa.
Ɔse no n’akomam sɛ: Nyankopɔn werɛ afi,
ɔde n’ani ahunta ɔrenhunu ara da.
Ao, AWURADE sɔre, ɛ! Ao, Onyankopɔn, ma wo nsa so.
Mma wo werɛ mmfiri amanehunufoɔ.
Adɛn nti na ɔbɔnefoɔ yi Onyankopɔn ahi
ka no n’akomam sɛ: Worentwe m’aso?
Wohunu, ɛfiri sɛ wo na wohwɛ ɔhaw ne awerɛhoɔ,
sɛ wode bɛsie wo nsam.
Wo nsa na ɔbrɛfoɔ de hyɛ,
awisiaa boafoɔ ne wo ara.
Bubu abɔnefoɔ basa,
na di obusuyɛfoɔ bɔne akyi kɔsi sɛ worenhunu bio.
AWURADE ne hene daa daa,
amanaman ayera afiri n’asase so.
AWURADE, wobɛtie deɛ ahobrɛasefoɔ pɛ,
woahyɛ wɔn akoma den, woama w’aso aba so
sɛ wobɛdi awisiaa ne deɛ wɔhyɛ no soɔ no asɛm,
na ɔdasani a ɔfiri asase mu no anhunahuna bio.
AWURADE na medwane kɔtoa no,
adɛn na mose me kra sɛ:
Dwane sɛ anomaa kɔ mo mmepɔ so.
Na hwɛ, abɔnefoɔ kuntunu wɔn tadua mu,
wɔde wɔn mmɛmma asi homa so
sɛ wɔde bɛto abɔ akoma mu tenefoɔ esum mu.
Sɛ wɔsɛe nnyinasoɔ a,
ɔteneneeni bɛyɛ dɛn?
AWURADE wɔ n’asɔrefie kronkron mu,
AWURADE ahennwa wɔ soro,
n’ani tua nnipa mma, na n’anisuatɛtɛ kari wɔn hwɛ.
AWURADE sɔ ɔteneneeni hwɛ,
na ɔbɔnefoɔ ne deɛ ɔpɛ amim deɛ,
ne kra tane no.
Ɔbɛma asraman aduru abɔnefoɔ,
ogya ne sɔfe ne mframa a ɛderɛ
ne wɔn kuruwa mu kyɛfa.
Na AWURADE yɛ ɔteneneeni, na ɔpɛ asɛntenenee,
wɔn a wɔtene bɛhunu n’anim.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Seminit” sankuo nne so. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: O AWURADE, boa na ahotefoɔ rewie sa,
na nokwafoɔ ase rehye nnipa mma mu.
Obiara twa ne yɔnko nkontompo,
ano fremfrem ne akoma nta na wɔde kasa.
Ma AWURADE ntwa ano dɛfɛdɛfɛ nyinaa
ne tɛkyerɛma a ɛka nsɛnkɛseɛ,
wɔn a wɔse: Yɛn tɛkyerɛma na yɛde di mmaninsɛm,
yɛn ano wɔ hɔ, hwan na ɔbɛdi yɛn soɔ?
Mmɔborɔfoɔ so hyɛ ne ahiafoɔ apinisie nti mɛsɔre afei,
sɛ AWURADE seɛ ni,
mɛgye deɛ ɔgu ahome repɛ nkwagyeɛ no nkwa.
AWURADE bɔhyɛ yɛ bɔhyɛ kronkron, te sɛ dwetɛ
a wɔanane no ananeeɛ a asene fam
a wɔayiyi mu mprɛnson.
Ao, AWURADE, hwɛ yɛn so,
na kora yɛn firi nnɛ mma yi mu daa.
Sɛ ahuhusɛm ahoran nnipa mma mu yi,
abɔnefoɔ abu so nenam.
Ao, AWURADE, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn? Wo werɛ bɛfiri me daa?
Wode w’ani bɛhunta me akɔsi da bɛn?
Ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na menni me kra mu yea,
na adeɛ kye a awerɛhoɔ ntena m’akomam?
Me tamfo nhoran me so nkɔsi da bɛn?
Hwɛ na gye me so, AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn,
te m’ani, na manna owuo nna,
na me tamfo anka sɛ: Matumi no,
na sɛ mehinhim a, m’ahohiahiafoɔ anni ahurisie.
Na me deɛ, m’ani da w’adɔeɛ so,
m’akoma bɛdi wo nkwagyeɛ mu ahurisie,
mɛto AWURADE dwom
sɛ ɔne me adi no yie.
Ogyegyentwie se n’akomam sɛ: Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.
Wɔasɛe wɔn nneyɛɛ ayɛ akyiwadeɛ,
obi nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.
AWURADE firi soro hwɛ nnipa mma,
sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma,
obi a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan.
Wɔn nyinaa amane, wɔn nyinaa aporɔ,
obi nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa,
ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
Enti omumuyɛfoɔ biara nni hɔ a ɔwɔ nimdeɛ,
wɔn a wɔdi me man sɛdeɛ wɔdi aduane,
na wɔnsɔre AWURADE?
Ɛno na wɔn ho popoeɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ teneneefoɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu.
Mobɛhwete mmɔborɔni atirimpɔ mu
ara, nanso AWURADE ne ne dwanekɔbea.
Hwan na ɔde Israel nkwagyeɛ bɛfiri Sion aba?
Da a AWURADE de ne man agyapadeɛ bɛsane aba no,
Yakob bɛdi ahurisie, na Israel ani agye.
O AWURADE, hwan na ɔbɛsoɛ wo ntomadan mu?
Hwan na ɔbɛtena wo bepɔ kronkron soɔ?
Deɛ ɔnante pɛpɛɛpɛ na ɔdi asɛntenenee,
na ɔka n’akomam nokorɛ.
Ɔmfa ne tɛkyerɛma nni nsekuro,
na ɔnyɛ ne yɔnko bɔne,
na ɔmmɔ ne mfɛfoɔ ahohora.
Ɔno ara n’ani so ɔbu onipa huhuo animtia,
na ɔdi wɔn a wɔsuro AWURADE no ni,
ɔka amanenya ntam a, ɔnsakyera.
Ɔmfa ne sika mma nnye nsiho,
na ɔnnye deɛ ɔdi bem ho adanmudeɛ.
Deɛ ɔyɛ yeinom no ɔrehinhim ara da.
Onyankopɔn, fa me sie, na wo na medwane bɛtoa wo.
Mese AWURADE sɛ: M’Awurade ne wo,
menni papa biara nka wo ho.
Na akronkronfoɔ a wɔwɔ asase soɔ no,
wɔne animuonyamfoɔ a wɔsɔ m’ani koraa.
Wɔn a wɔdi anyame afoforɔ akyire no, wɔma wɔn yea dɔɔso.
Merenhwie wɔn mogya nhwiesa no bi,
na meremfa m’ano memmɔ wɔn din.
AWURADE ne m’agyapadeɛ mu kyɛfa ne me kuruwa,
wo na me nkrabea kura wo nsam.
Me susuhoma akɔfa deɛ ɛyɛ ama me,
aane, apɛgyadeɛ no yɛ me fɛ.
Mekamfo AWURADE a ɔtu me fo,
nso anadwo m’akoma kyerɛkyerɛ me.
Mede AWURADE masi m’anim daa,
na ɔwɔ me nifa yi, merenhinhim.
Enti m’akoma tɔ me yam, na me kra di ahurisie,
na me honam tena ase dwoodwoo.
Na worennya me kra Asamando,
woremma wo hoteni nhunu Amena mu porɔeɛ.
Wobɛkyerɛ me nkwa kwan,
anika a ɛmeeɛ wɔ w’anim,
anigyedeɛ wɔ wo nifa hɔ daa.
O AWURADE, tie asɛntenenee, wɛn w’aso ma m’abooboo,
yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ a ɛmfiri nnaadaa anofafa mu.
Ma bembuo mfiri w’anim mmra,
ma w’ani nhwɛ adeɛ a ɛtene mu.
Sɛ wosɔ m’akoma hwɛ, na wohwehwɛ me mu anadwo,
na wonane me yiyi mu, worenhunu hwee.
Mabɔ me tirim sɛ meremma asɛmmɔne mfiri m’ano.
Nnipa nneyɛɛ fam, w’anomu asɛm no nti
masɔre me ho, awerɛmfoɔ akwan ho.
W’anammɔn no ara so na me kwan nam,
me nan anwati.
Ao, Onyankopɔn, mesu mefrɛ wo, na wobɛgye me so.
Yɛ aso ma me, tie me nsɛm.
Fa anwanwa kwan so yi wo dɔ mapa adi kyerɛ,
wo a wogye wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ dwanekɔbea,
firi wɔn atamfoɔ nsam wɔ wo nifa.
Hwɛ me so sɛ ani kurutuawisi,
fa me hunta wo ntaban nwunu ase,
abɔnefoɔ a wɔfom me fa,
m’atamfoɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ a wɔtwa me ho hyia no nti.
Wɔapirim wɔn akoma a wɔnni mmɔborɔhunu biara,
wɔde wɔn ano kasa ahantan kasa.
Wɔtetɛ me, na afei wɔtwa me ho hyia,
wɔde wɔn ani akari me pɛ m’asehweɛ.
Wɔte sɛ gyata a wɔredɛɛdɛɛ apɛ adufudeɛ,
te sɛ gyata ba a ɔtɛ kokoam.
Ao, AWURADE, sɔre bɛsianka wɔn na brɛ wɔn ase,
fa w’afena gye me kra firi abɔnefoɔ nsam.
AWURADE, fa wo nsa bɛgye me firi nnipa nsam,
nnipa a wɔn nkwa kyɛfa yɛ wiase deɛ,
fa deɛ wɔasiesie ama wɔn hyɛ wɔn yafunu ma;
ma wɔn mma nya no mmorosoɔ,
na wɔnnya bi mma wɔn mmotafowa.
Me deɛ, mɛhwɛ w’anim tenenee mu,
menyane a, me ho bɛtɔ me sɛ mahu woɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. AWURADE akoa Dawid deɛ. Ɔkaa dwom yi nsɛm kyerɛɛ AWURADE, da a AWURADE gyee no n’atamfo nyinaa ne Saulo nsam no.

block_quote.content: Ao, AWURADE, m’ahoɔden, medɔ wo.
AWURADE ne me botan ne m’abankɛseɛ ne me gyefoɔ,
me Nyankopɔn ne me botantim a medwane kɔtoa no,
me kyɛm ne me nkwagyeɛ abɛn, m’abantenten.
Mesu mefrɛ AWURADE, ɔno a ɔfata sɛ wɔyi no ayɛ,
na wɔagye me m’atamfoɔ nsam.
Owuo nhoma bebaree me ho,
na ɔsɛeɛ twi faa me so sɛ osuhweam.
Asamando nhoma twaa me ho kɔntɔnkrɔn,
owuo afidie bɛhyiaa me.
M’ahohia mu mesu mefrɛɛ AWURADE,
me Nyankopɔn, na meteaa mu mefrɛɛ no.
Ɔtee me nne n’asɔrefie,
na me su a mesu mekyerɛɛ no no kɔduruu n’aso mu.
Ɛnna asase hinhimiiɛ na ɛwosoeɛ,
na mmepɔ nnyinasoɔ popoe, na ɛhinhimii,
ɛfiri sɛ na ne bo ahuru no.
Wisie tu firii ne hwenem,
na ogya a ɛhye adeɛ firii n’anomu,
nnyansramma dɛre firii ne mu.
Na ɔkuntunuu ɔsoro mu, na ɔsii fam,
na esum kabii wɔ ne nan ase.
Na ɔtenaa Kerub so na ɔtui,
na ɔde mframa ntaban tu bae afrɛ so.
Ɔde sum kataa ne ho hyiae;
n’asasewa yɛ osuo a amuna kusuu.
Hann a ɛdi n’anim no
nnyansramma firi
ne mununkum no mu bae.
Na AWURADE boom ɔsoro,
na ɔsorosoroni no maa wɔtee ne nne,
asukɔtweaa ne nnyansramma.
Na ɔtotoo n’agyan de bɔɔ wɔn hwetee
ne asraman bebree de tanee wɔn ani.
Ɛnna ɛpo mu mmɔnka yiyii adie,
na wiase nnyinasoɔ ho daa hɔ,
ɛfiri w’ateatea, AWURADE,
ne wo hwene mu home hahyeehahyee no.
Ɔtenee ne nsa firi soro bɛfaa me,
ɔtwee me firii nsuo pii mu.
Ɔgyee me firii me tamfo hoɔdenfoɔ
ne wɔn a wɔkyiri me nsam,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔsene me ahoɔden.
Wɔbɛtoaa me m’amanehunu da no mu,
na AWURADE bɛyɛɛ me okyiritaafoɔ.
Na ɔyii me kɔgyinaa deɛ ɛhɔ trɛ,
ɔgyee me, ɛfiri sɛ mesɔɔ n’ani.
AWURADE tuaa me ka sɛdeɛ me tenenee teɛ,
sɛdeɛ me nsa ho a afire no teɛ na ɔtuaa me ho ka.
Na manante AWURADE akwan so,
na menyɛɛ bɔne mennyaa me Nyankopɔn,
na mmom n’atemmudeɛ nyinaa wɔ m’ani so,
na memfirii n’ahyɛdeɛ ho.
Na me ho nni asɛm wɔ n’anim,
na mehwɛɛ me ho so firii amumuyɛ ho.
Na AWURADE atua me ka sɛdeɛ me tenenee,
sɛdeɛ me nsa ho a afire wɔ n’ani soɔ no teɛ.
Ɔnokwafoɔ na wo ne no bɛdi no nokorɛ mu,
onipa a ɔdi mu na wo ne no bɛdi no mudie soɔ.
Deɛ ɔte ne ho na wobɛte wo ho akyerɛ no,
na ɔkontonkyini deɛ, wokyinkyim wo ho kyerɛ no.
Na wo na wogye ahobrɛasefoɔ,
na wobrɛ ahantanfoɔ ase.
Na wo na woma me kanea derɛ,
AWURADE me Nyankopɔn te me sum mu.
Na wo na mede wo meto mehyɛ ɛdɔm soɔ,
na mede me Nyankopɔn mehuri metra ɔfasuo.
Na Onyankopɔn yi deɛ, ne kwan yɛ pɛpɛ,
AWURADE asɛm mu te,
ɔyɛ ɛkyɛm ma wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa.
Na hwan ne Nyankopɔn sɛ AWURADE nko,
na hwan na ɔyɛ ɔbotan sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn?
Onyankopɔn a ɔde ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔsoɔ,
na ɔma me kwan yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Ɔyɛ me nan sɛ aforotebereɛ deɛ,
na ɔde me gyina me sorɔnsorɔmmea so.
Ɔkyerɛ me nsa akodie,
na ɔma me basa kuntunu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ tadua.
Na woama me wo nkwagyeɛ kyɛm,
na wo nsa nifa sɔɔ me mu,
na wo mmoa maa meyɛɛ kɛseɛ.
Wotrɛɛ m’anammɔn mu m’ase,
na me nan anwatiri.
Metii m’atamfoɔ, na metoo wɔn,
na mansane de kɔsii sɛ mewiee wɔn kum.
Mebobɔɔ wɔn, na wɔantumi ansɔre,
wɔtotɔree me nan ase.
Na wode ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔsoɔ maa akodie,
wobrɛɛ wɔn a wɔsɔre tiaa me no ase hyɛɛ m’ase,
na womaa m’atamfoɔ danee wɔn akyiri kyerɛɛ me,
na wɔn a wɔkyiri me no, mesɛee wɔn.
Wɔsu frɛe a ɔgyefoɔ bi nni hɔ,
wɔfrɛɛ AWURADE, na wammua wɔn.
Na mepɛkyɛɛ wɔn meyɛɛ wɔn sɛ mfuturo, mframa anim,
mesesaa wɔn meguu sɛ mmorɔno so dɔteɛ.
Woyii me nnipa aperedie mu, wode me sii amanaman so ti,
ɔman a mennim wɔn na ɛsom me.
Aso teeɛ ara pɛ, na wɔtiee me,
ananafoɔ brɛɛ wɔn ho ase maa me.
Ananafoɔ twintwamee,
na wɔde ahopopoɔ fifirii wɔn huntabea bae.
AWURADE te ase, na nhyira ne me botantim no.
Na me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn no, wɔmma no so.
Onyankopɔn a ɔtɔɔ were maa me,
na ɔde aman hyɛɛ m’aseɛ;
wagye me afiri m’atamfoɔ mu,
aane, woama me so afiri wɔn a wɔsɔre tiaa me no mu,
woagye me awerɛmfoɔ nsam.
Enti, AWURADE, mɛda wo ase amanaman mu,
na mabɔ wo din mato ayeyie nnwom,
sɛ wone deɛ ɔma ne hene nkwagyeɛ soɔ,
na ɔyɛ deɛ wasra no no adɔeɛ,
Dawid ne n’asefoɔ daa.
Ɔsoro ka Nyankopɔn animuonyam,
na ewiem kyerɛ ne nsa ano adwuma.
Da koro biara woro kyerɛ,
na anadwo biara da nimdeɛ adi.
Ɛnyɛ ɔkasa na ɛnyɛ nsɛm a wɔteɛ.
Ɔsoro susuhoma duru asase nyinaa so,
na ne nsɛm duru wiase ano;
wasi ntomadan ama owia ɔsoro hɔ.
Na ɛfiri adi sɛ ayeforɔkunu a ɔfiri ne pia mu,
ɛde ahosɛpɛ tu mmirika sɛ ɔbrane.
N’adifire wɔ ɔsoro ano,
na ne kyini kɔduru ano hɔ,
na biribiara nkora ne ho mfiri ne hyeɛ ano.
AWURADE mmara yɛ pɛ,
ɛdwodwo ɔkra.
AWURADE adanseɛ atim,
ɛma awiɛmfoɔ hunu nyansa.
AWURADE ahyɛdeɛ tene,
ɛma akoma tɔ yam.
AWURADE mmarahyɛ ho te,
na ɛte ani.
AWURADE suro yɛ kronkron,
ɛgyina hɔ daa.
AWURADE atemmudeɛ yɛ nokorɛ,
ne nyinaa tene.
Ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ sene sika
ne sika amapa pii,
na ɛyɛ fremfrem sene ɛwoɔ
ne ahwedeɛ mu nsuo.
Wɔnam so bɔ w’akoa kɔkɔ,
ɛsodie mu wɔ akatua pii.
Hwan na ɔhunu ɔno ara ne mfomsoɔ mu?
Me bɔne a ahunta me, fa kyɛ me.
Nso bɔ w’akoa ho ban wɔ bɔne a wɔboapa yɛ ho,
na anhyɛ me so.
Ɛno na mɛdi bem,
na me ho afi amumuyɛ kɛseɛ ho.
Ma m’anomu nsɛm nyɛ wo fɛ,
na m’akomam nkɔmmɔ nsɔ w’ani,
O AWURADE, me botan ne me gyefoɔ.
AWURADE ntie wo hiada,
Yakob Nyankopɔn din mmɔ wo ho ban,
ɔmfiri kronkron mu hɔ mmɛboa wo,
na ɔmfiri Bepɔ Sion mmɛhyɛ wo den.
Ɔnkae w’aduane afɔdeɛ nyinaa,
na wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ nsɔ n’ani.
Ɔmma wo deɛ w’akoma pɛ,
na ɔmma wo tirim asɛm nyinaa mmra mu.
Ma yɛmmɔ ose wɔ wo nkonimdie ho,
na yɛn Nyankopɔn din mu na yɛhim yɛn frankaa:
AWURADE mma deɛ wosrɛ nyinaa mmra mu.
Afei mahunu sɛ AWURADE boa deɛ wasra no no,
ɔgye no so, ne soro kronkronbea hɔ,
ɔde ne nifa ahoɔdenneɛ gye no.
Ebinom kamfo nteaseɛnam,
na ebinom kamfo apɔnkɔ,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛkamfo AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn din.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔbubu duedue so hwehwe ase,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛasɔre gyina hɔ kyirebenn.
AWURADE, gye ɔhene nkwa.
Ɔbɛtie yɛn, da a yɛfrɛ no yi ara mu.
Ao, AWURADE, wo na ɔhene ani gye wɔ w’ahoɔden mu,
na wo nkwagyeɛ nti hwɛ sɛdeɛ ne ho si sane no fa.
Deɛ n’akoma pɛ na wode ama no,
na deɛ n’ano bisaeɛ no, woankame no.
Na wode papa mu nhyira hyia no,
wode sika amapa abotire bɔ ne ti.
Ɔbisaa wo hɔ nkwa,
wode ama no, nna a ɛware daa daa.
N’animuonyam so wo nkwagyeɛ nti,
kɛseyɛ ne anidie na wode ama no.
Aane, wode no asi hɔ sɛ nhyira nko ara daa,
wode w’anim anigyeɛ gye n’ani.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔhene ani da AWURADE so,
na deɛ ɔwɔ sorosoro adɔeɛ nti ɔrenhinhim.
Wo nsa bɛka w’atamfo nyinaa,
wo nsa nifa bɛnya wɔn a wɔkyiri woɔ.
Wobɛyi wo ho adi
ayɛ wɔn sɛ ogya fononoo,
AWURADE de n’abufuo bɛmene wɔn,
na ogya ahye wɔn.
Wobɛsɛe wɔn aba afiri asase so,
ne wɔn asefoɔ afiri nnipa mma mu.
Sɛ wɔbɔ wo ho pɔ bɔne na wɔsusu bɔne bi ho a,
wɔrentumi nyɛ.
Na wobɛma wɔasane wɔn akyi,
wode wo bɛmma bɛkyerɛ wɔn anim.
AWURADE, ma wo ho so w’ahoɔden mu,
yɛde adwontoɔ ne sankuo bɛkamfo wo mmaninneɛ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Adekyeeɛ foroteɛ” sankuo nne so. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, deɛn nti na woagya me?
Me su a mesu mefrɛ woɔ ne me nkwagyeɛ ntam ware.
Me Nyankopɔn, meteam mefrɛ wo awia,
na wommua me, ne anadwo, nso mennya ɔhome.
Na woyɛ kronkron,
wote w’ahennwa so, na wo na Israel ayeyie nyinaa wɔ woɔ.
Wo so na yɛn agyanom de wɔn ho toeɛ,
wɔde wɔn ho too wo so, na wogyee wɔn.
Wo na wɔteaa mu frɛɛ woɔ, na wɔnyaa nkwagyeɛ,
wɔde wɔn ho too wo so, na wɔn ani anwu.
Na me deɛ, meyɛ aboa, na menyɛ onipa,
meyɛ nnipa ahohoradeɛ ne ɔman akyiwadeɛ.
Wɔn a wɔhu me nyinaa
di me ho fɛw trɛ wɔn anomu woso wɔn tiri ka sɛ:
Dane to AWURADE so, ma no nnye no,
sɛ ɔpɛ no a, ma no nyi no!
Na wo na woyii me firii me na yam,
metua me na nufoɔ ano no, na womaa me anidasoɔ.
Mefiri yafunum ara na wɔde me too wo soɔ,
wone me Nyankopɔn firi me na yam.
Mma me ne wo ntam nnware,
na ahohia abɛn
a ɔboafoɔ bi nni hɔ.
Anantwinini bebree atwa me ho ahyia,
Basan anantwie akɛseɛ abɔ me ho kɔntɔnkrɔn.
Wɔtrɛ wɔn anomu kyerɛ me
sɛ gyata a ɔteteɛ na ɔbobom.
Wɔahwie me agu sɛ nsuo,
na me nnompe nyinaa ahwinhwan n’akwaa so.
M’akoma ayɛ sɛ akraa,
anane wɔ me yam.
M’ahoɔden mu awe sɛ kyɛmferɛ,
na me tɛkyerɛma afam me dodom,
na wode me ato owuo mfuturo mu.
Nnipa bɔne te sɛ akraman atwa me ho ahyia,
na wɔbom ba me so,
wɔahwire me nsa ne me nan mu.
Metumi mekan me nnompe nyinaa,
wɔn deɛ, wɔhwɛ me de gye wɔn ani.
Wɔkyɛ me ntoma mu fa,
na m’atadeɛ so na wɔbɔ ntonto.
Na wo, AWURADE, ntena akyiri.
M’ahoɔden, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
Hwim me kra firi nkrantɛ ano,
m’ade koro no firi akraman nsam.
Gye me firi gyata anomu,
na ɛkoɔ mmɛn mu na wotie me.
Mɛbɔ wo din makyerɛ me nuanom,
mɛkamfo wo asafo mu.
Mo a mosuro AWURADE, monyi no ayɛ.
Yakob asefoɔ nyinaa, monhyɛ no animuonyam,
na Israel asefoɔ nyinaa, momfɛre no.
Na wansere na wankyiri
ɔmanehunufoɔ amaneɛ,
na wanyi n’anim anhunta no,
na mmom ɔsu frɛɛ no no, ɔtiee.
Wo na woma meyi wo ayɛ asafo kɛseɛ mu,
mɛma m’aboadeɛ wɔ, wɔn a wɔsuro no no anim.
Ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛdidi na wɔamee,
wɔn a wɔpɛ AWURADE akyiri kwan bɛyi no ayɛ.
Mo akoma nnya nkwa daa.
Asase ano ano sofoɔ nyinaa bɛkae
adane aba AWURADE nkyɛn,
na amanaman mmusuakuo nyinaa
abɛkoto n’anim.
Na ahennie wɔ AWURADE,
na ɔdi amanaman so.
Asase so abrane nyinaa bɛdidi na wɔakoto no,
wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ mfuturo mu nyinaa,
ne deɛ anka ne kra nni nkwa no bɛkoto no.
Nkyirimma bɛsom no,
wɔbɛka AWURADE ho asɛm, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ mu.
Wɔbɛba abɛka ne tenenee akyerɛ ɔman a wɔbɛwo wɔn no,
sɛ ɔno na wayɛ.
AWURADE ne me hwɛfoɔ, hwee renhia me.
Ɔma meda adidibea a ɛhɔ wira yɛ frɔmfrɔm,
ɔgya me kɔ nsuo a ɛho dwoɔ ho.
Ɔdwodwo me kra,
ɔde me fa akwantenenee so,
ne din nti.
Sɛ mpo menam owuo sum kabii bɔn no mu a,
mensuro bɔne biara,
ɛfiri sɛ wo ne me na ɛwɔ hɔ,
w’abaa ne wo poma
na ɛkyekyere me werɛ.
Woto me pono,
m’atamfoɔ anim,
wode ngo fɔ me tirim,
me kuruwa yɛ ma bu so.
Ampa ara yie ne adɔeɛ nko na ɛbɛdi m’akyiri
me nkwa nna nyinaa,
na mɛtena AWURADE fie
daa.
Asase ne n’adeɛ dodoɔ yɛ AWURADE dea,
wiase ne wɔn a wɔte mu no wɔ no.
Na ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ, ɛpo so,
na ɔde atintim asukɛseɛ soɔ.
Hwan na ɔbɛforo AWURADE bepɔ no,
na hwan na ɔbɛgyina ne tenabea kronkron hɔ?
Deɛ efi nni ne nsam na n’akomam teɛ,
deɛ ɔmma ne kra ani nsa ahuhudeɛ,
na ɔnka nkontompo ntam.
Ɔno na ɔbɛnya AWURADE nsam nhyira
na ne nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn bɛbu no bem.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔpɛ n’akyiri kwan no abusua,
wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ w’anim, O Yakob Nyankopɔn.
Mo, aponkɛseɛ, momma mo tiri so,
na mo, tete apono, montrɛ mo ho mu,
na animuonyam hene no nhyɛne mu.
Hwan ne animuonyam hene yi?
Ɛyɛ AWURADE, otumfoɔ kɛseɛ, ɔbrane,
AWURADE a ɔyɛ ɔbrane, ɔko mu.
Mo, aponkɛseɛ, momma mo tiri so,
na montrɛ mo tete apono no mu,
na animuonyam hene no nhyɛne mu.
Hwan ne saa animuonyam hene yi?
Asafo AWURADE,
ɔno ne animuonyam Hene no.
AWURADE, wo na mema me kra so mekyerɛ woɔ.
Me Nyankopɔn, wo so na mede me ho matoɔ,
mma m’ani nnwu,
mma m’atamfoɔ ho nnsɛpɛ wɔn, me nti.
Ampa ara, wɔn a wɔhwɛ wo kwan no biara ani renwu,
wɔn a wɔtwa nkontompo kwa no na wɔn ani bɛwuo.
AWURADE, kyerɛ me w’akwan,
na fa me fa w’atempɔn so.
Ma mennante wo nokorɛ mu, na kyerɛkyerɛ me,
ɛfiri sɛ wone me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
m’ani da wo so daa nyinaa.
AWURADE, kae wo mmɔborɔhunu ne w’adɔeɛ
a ɛwɔ hɔ firi tete no.
Nkae me mmɔfraase bɔne ne me mfomsoɔ, na mmom
kae me sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ,
AWURADE, w’ayamyie nti.
AWURADE yɛ, na ɔtene,
enti na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ɔkwan soɔ.
Ɔma ahobrɛasefoɔ nante tenenee mu,
na ɔma ahobrɛasefoɔ sua ne kwan.
AWURADE atempɔn nyinaa yɛ adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ
ma wɔn a wɔdi n’apam ne n’adansesɛm soɔ.
AWURADE, wo din nti fa me bɔne kyɛ me,
na ɛdɔɔso pii.
Onipa biara a ɔsuro AWURADE no,
ɔbɛkyerɛ no kwan a ɔmfa soɔ.
Ne kra bɛtena yiedie mu,
na n’asefoɔ anya asase atena so.
AWURADE yi ne tirim asɛm kyerɛ wɔn a wɔsuro no,
na ɔma wɔhunu n’apam no mu.
M’ani hwɛ AWURADE daa,
na ɔno na ɔbɛyi me nan afiri afidie mu.
Dane w’ani hwɛ me, na dom me,
na meyɛ ankonam, na meyɛ mmɔbɔ.
M’akoma mu ahohia so,
yi me firi m’ahokyere mu.
Hwɛ m’amaneɛ ne m’ahometeɛ,
na fa me bɔne nyinaa kyɛ me.
Hwɛ sɛ m’atamfoɔ dɔɔso,
na wɔde atirimuɔden tane me.
Hwɛ me kra so na gye me,
mma m’ani nnwu, na medwane bɛtoa wo.
Ma pɛyɛ ne teeyɛ nhwɛ me so,
ɛfiri sɛ m’ani da wo so.
Onyankopɔn, gye Israel
firi wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu.
AWURADE, bu me bem,
na me pɛyɛ mu na mebɔɔ me bra,
na mede me ho metoo AWURADE soɔ, manwatiri.
AWURADE, hwehwɛ me mu na sɔ me hwɛ,
nane me sawa ne m’akoma.
Na w’adɔeɛ wɔ m’ani so,
na menam wo nokorɛ mu.
Me ne nnipa huhuo antena,
na me ne nyaatwomfoɔ anhyia mu.
Metane nnipa bɔne dwabɔ,
na me ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ntena.
Mɛhohoro me nsa, bemdie mu,
na matwa w’afɔrebukyia ho mahyia, AWURADE,
sɛ merema wɔate m’aseda dwom,
na maka w’anwanwadeɛ nyinaa.
AWURADE, medɔ wo fie tenabea
ne faako a w’animuonyam teɛ.
Nhwim me kra nka nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho,
anaasɛ me nkwa nka mogyapɛfoɔ ho nkɔ.
Wɔn na mmusuo hyɛ wɔn nsam,
na kɛtɛasehyɛdeɛ ayɛ wɔn nifa ma.
Na me deɛ, pɛyɛ mu na mebɔ me bra:
Gye me, na hu me mmɔbɔ.
Me nan gyina deɛ ɛhɔ da fam,
asafo ahyiaeɛ mu na mɛhyira AWURADE.
AWURADE ne me hann ne me nkwagyeɛ,
hwan na mensuro no?
AWURADE ne me nkwa ahoɔden,
hwan anim na me ho mpopoɔ?
Nnipa bɔne a wɔhyɛ me so
na wɔtane me,
sɛ wɔretoa me abɛsunsuane me a,
wɔawatiwatiri na wɔahwehwe ase.
Sɛ dɔm kyere me so nsraban a,
m’akoma rentu;
sɛ wɔtu me so sa a,
ɛno mu mpo na me ho tɔ me.
Adeɛ baako na masrɛ AWURADE,
ɛno na mɛhwehwɛ akyiri kwan;
sɛ me nna a medie nyinaa
mɛtena AWURADE fie,
na mahwɛ AWURADE animteɛ,
na madwene me tirim wɔ n’asɔrefie.
Na ɔkora me ne sese mu
wɔ hia da,
ɔde me hunta ne ntomadan ahuntaeɛ,
ɔma me so gyina ɔbotan so.
Na afei ɔbɛma me tiri so,
m’atamfoɔ a wɔatwa me ho ahyia no so,
na mabɔ ne ntomadan mu
ayeyie afɔdeɛ,
na mato AWURADE sankuo dwom.
AWURADE, tie me sufrɛ;
hu me mmɔbɔ, na gye me so.
Woaka sɛ: Monhwehwɛ m’anim, nti,
m’akoma se wo sɛ:
AWURADE, w’anim na merehwehwɛ.
Nyi w’anim nhunta me,
mfa abufuo mpamo w’akoa.
Me boafoɔ ne wo,
nto me ntwene, na nnya me,
me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn.
Na m’agya ne me na agya me,
na AWURADE deɛ, ɔgye me.
AWURADE, kyerɛ me wo kwan,
na fa me fa ɔtempɔn tamaa so,
m’atɛfoɔ nti.
Nnane me mma sɛdeɛ m’atamfoɔ pɛ,
na adansekurumfoɔ asɔre atia me,
ne wɔn a wɔpu aniɛdensɛm.
Megye medi sɛ mɛhunu AWURADE ayamyɛ,
ateasefoɔ asase so.
Ma w’ani nna AWURADE so,
hyɛ wo ho den na ma wo bo nyɛ duru,
Aane, ma w’ani nna AWURADE so.
AWURADE, wo na mesu mefrɛ woɔ, me botan,
mmua w’ano wɔ me ho;
anyɛ saa na womua w’ano wɔ me ho a,
mɛyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ Amena mu no.
Sɛ mesu mefrɛ wo,
na mema me nsa so
mekyerɛ wo tenabea kronkron hɔ a,
tie me nkotosrɛ.
Ntwe me mfra abɔnefoɔ ne abusuyɛfoɔ
a wɔne wɔn yɔnkonom kasa asomdwoeɛ soɔ,
na wɔn akoma mu deɛ, bɔne wɔ mu.
Yɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn nneyɛɛ
ne wɔn abrabɔ bɔne teɛ,
susu wɔn nsa ano nnwuma so ma wɔn,
tua wɔn deɛ wɔayɛ so ka.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn ani nni AWURADE nneyɛɛ ne ne nsa ano nnwuma so:
Ɔbɛdwiri wɔn, na ɔrento wɔn nsi hɔ.
Ayeyie nka AWURADE,
ɛfiri sɛ watie me nkotosrɛ.
AWURADE ne m’ahoɔden ne me kyɛm.
Mede m’akoma mato ne so, na waboa me,
enti m’akoma ho asane no,
na mede me dwom meda no ase.
AWURADE ne ne nkurɔfoɔ ahoɔden,
deɛ wasra no no nkwagyeɛ aban ne no.
Boa wo man, na hyira w’apɛgyadeɛ,
na yɛne wɔn, na ma wɔn so daa.
Mo ɔsoro asafo, momfa animuonyam mma AWURADE,
momfa animuonyam ne tumi mma AWURADE.
Aane, monhyɛ AWURADE din animuonyam,
monsɔre AWURADE, ahokeka kronkron mu.
AWURADE nne wɔ nsuo so,
animuonyam Nyankopɔn ma aprannaa bom,
AWURADE wɔ nsuo bebree so.
AWURADE nne mu yɛ den sɛ,
AWURADE nne mu wɔ animuonyam.
AWURADE nne bubu ntweneduro,
AWURADE bubu Lebanon ntweneduro.
Na ɔma wɔhurihuri sɛ nantwie ba,
Lebanon ne Sirion sɛ okoo ba.
AWURADE nne pa gya a ɛdɛre.
AWURADE nne ma ɛserɛ so hɔ him,
AWURADE ma Kades serɛ so hɔ po.
AWURADE nne ma aforoteɛ ko awoɔ,
na ɛma kwaeɛ mu da hɔ,
na n’asɔrefie mufoɔ nyinaa ka sɛ: Animuonyam nka Nyankopɔn.
AWURADE tenaa ase wɔ nsuo a ayiri so,
na AWURADE bɛtena hɔ sɛ ɔhene daa.
AWURADE bɛma ne man ahoɔden,
AWURADE de asomdwoeɛ bɛhyira ne man.

fragment.content: Dwom a wɔto de dwiraa Asɔredan no ho. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Mɛma wo so, AWURADE, ɛfiri sɛ woayi me,
na woamma m’atamfoɔ ani annye, me nti.
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mesu mefrɛɛ wo,
na wosaa me yadeɛ.
AWURADE, woatwe me kra afiri Asamando,
woama me nkwa na mankɔ Amena mu.
Monto AWURADE dwom, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefoɔ,
na monyi ne din kronkron no ayɛ.
Na n’abufuo kyɛre kakraa bi,
na n’adɔeɛ deɛ, ɛtena hɔ kyɛre sɛ nkwa berɛ.
Osu bɛsoɛ anadwo,
na adeɛ kye a, na anigyeɛ aba.
Na me deɛ, mesee m’ahodwoɔ mu sɛ:
Merenhinhim ara da.
AWURADE, wode w’anisɔ ama me
atim denden sɛ bepɔ,
na wode w’ani huntaa no,
m’akoma tui.
Wo, AWURADE, na mesu mefrɛɛ woɔ,
na mekoto mesrɛɛ AWURADE sɛ:
Ɛdeɛn mfasoɔ na ɛwɔ me so
wɔ m’Amena mu korɔ mu?
Mfuturo bɛda wo ase anaa?
Ɛbɛka wo nokorɛ akyerɛ anaa?
AWURADE, tie, na hu me mmɔbɔ!
AWURADE, bɛboa me!
Woama m’abooboo adane me asa,
woasane me ho ayitoma,
na wode anigyeɛ abɔ me abɔsoɔ,
na m’animuonyam ato wo dwom, na annyae da.
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mɛda wo ase daa.
Wo, AWURADE, na madwane abɛtoa woɔ,
mma m’anim nngu ase da biara da.
Fa wo tenenee so gye me,
yɛ aso ma me,
yɛ ntɛm gye me.
Yɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea botan
ne srɔnsrɔn so aban sɛ wɔbɛgye me nkwa.
Na wone me botantim ne me tenabea srɔnsrɔn,
na wo din nti wobɛkyerɛ me kwan na woakɔgya me.
Wobɛyi me afiri afidie a wɔahunta asum me no mu,
na wo ara ne m’aban a ɛyɛ den.
Wo nsam na mede me honhom mehyɛ,
AWURADE, nokorɛ Nyankopɔn, woagye me.
Metane wɔn a wɔdi atorɔ ahuhudeɛ akyire,
na me deɛ, mebata AWURADE ho.
Mɛdi ahurisie, na m’ani agye w’adɔeɛ ho,
sɛ woahwɛ m’amanehunu,
na woahunu me kra ahohia.
Na woanyi me anhyɛ ɔtamfoɔ nsa,
wode me nan agyina deɛ ɛtrɛ.
AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na me ho dwan me.
Awerɛhoɔ ama m’ani ne me kra ne me honam atwintwam.
Na me nkwa ahwere yea mu,
na me mfeɛ ahwere ahomeguo mu.
M’amumuyɛ nti m’ahoɔden so ahwan,
na me nnompe ahodwo.
M’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa nti mayɛ ɔhohorafoɔ,
na mayɛ me ho tefoɔ so duru,
na m’amannifoɔ suro me,
wɔn a mefiri adi a wɔhu me dwane me.
Nnipa werɛ afiri me sɛ owufoɔ,
mayɛ sɛ adeɛ a wɔto twene.
Na mete nnipa bebree nsekudie,
ahudeɛ atwa me ho ahyia,
sɛdeɛ me ho agyina a wɔakorɔ no mu
wɔabɔ wɔn tirim sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me kra.
Na me deɛ, wo, AWURADE, so na mede me ho matoɔ.
Mese: Wone me Nyankopɔn.
Wo nsam na me mmerɛ wɔ,
gye me m’atamfoɔ ne m’ataafoɔ nsam.
Te w’anim kyerɛ w’akoa,
fa w’adɔeɛ so gye me nkwa.
AWURADE mma m’anim nngu ase,
na mesu mefrɛ wo.
Ma abɔnefoɔ anim ngu ase,
na wɔntotɔre mum Asamando.
Ma atorofoɔ ano mmua,
wɔn a wɔka ɔteneneeni ho nsɛm a ɛyɛ den
ahokyerɛ ne aniammɔho mu no.
Wo papa a wode asie ama wɔn a wɔsuro wo no
sɛdeɛ asi so fa!
Ɛno na woyi kyerɛ wɔn a wɔdwane bɛtoa woɔ no, nnipa anim.
Wode w’anim bɔ wɔn ho ban
de wɔn hunta firi nnipa a wɔabɔ kyenku anim,
wode wɔn sie ɔsese mu
firi tɛkyerɛma birebire ho.
Nhyira ne AWURADE
sɛ wama n’adɔeɛ ayɛ nwanwa ama me,
kuro a ahohiahia wɔ.
Nso me deɛ, mekaa no m’ahoyera mu sɛ:
Wɔatwa me afiri w’ani so.
Nanso mesu mefrɛɛ woɔ no,
wotee me nkotosrɛ.
Monnɔ AWURADE, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa.
AWURADE hwɛ wɔn a wɔdi nokorɛ so,
na ɔtua deɛ ɔdi ahantansɛm no ka ma no boro so.
Monhyɛ mo ho den na monsi mo bo,
mo a motwɛn AWURADE nyinaa.
Nhyira ne deɛ wɔde ne mmarato akyɛ no,
na wɔakata ne bɔne soɔ.
Nhyira ne onipa a AWURADE mmu n’amumuyɛ ngu ne soɔ,
na nnaadaa nni ne honhom mu.
Na memuaa m’ano no, me nnompe hodwoe,
m’apinisie a mesii no daa nyinaa nti.
Na awia ne anadwo wo nsa yɛɛ me so duru,
me mu nsuo twee, na mekusaa sɛ awia berɛ mu.
Mekaa me bɔne mekyerɛɛ wo,
na mankora m’amumuyɛ so.
Mekaa sɛ: Mɛka me mmarato makyerɛ AWURADE.
Wo na wode me bɔne so mmusuo kyɛeɛ.
Yei nti teeni biara mmɔ wo mpaeɛ da a ɔbɛhu woɔ no.
Ampa ara, sɛ asu kɛseɛ yiri a, ɛremfa ɔyaa korɔ.
Wone me huntabea,
wobɛbɔ me ho ban na me ho annwan me,
na wode nkwagyeɛ nnwom atwa me ho ahyia.
Na wo AWURADE aka sɛ: Mɛbue w’adwene mu na makyerɛ wo
ɔkwan a wobɛfa soɔ,
m’ani wɔ wo so, na mɛtu wo fo.
Monnyɛ sɛ apɔnkɔ anaa mfunumupɔnkɔ a wɔnnim de,
nnareka ne ɛho homa na wɔde to wɔn ano mu twe wɔn,
anka wɔrentwe mmɛn wo.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ yea dɔɔso,
na deɛ ɔde ne ho to AWURADE soɔ no,
wɔde adɔeɛ bɛdi no barehyia.
Ateneneefoɔ, momma mo ani nnye AWURADE ho, na monni ahurisie!
Akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa, momfa anigyeɛ nhuro!
Ateneneefoɔ, momfa anigyeɛ nhuro AWURADE mu,
ɛsɛ wɔn a wɔtene no sɛ wɔyi no ayɛ.
Momfa sankuo nna AWURADE ase,
momfa sankuo a ɛso homa du nto no dwom!
Monto dwom foforɔ mma no,
mommɔ sankuo yie nka ɛnne ho!
Na AWURADE asɛm tene,
na ne nnwuma nyinaa wɔ nokorɛ mu.
Ɔdɔ asɛntenenee ne atemmuo,
AWURADE adɔeɛ ahyɛ asase so ma.
AWURADE de n’asɛm na ɛyɛɛ ɔsoro,
na ɔde n’anomu honhom yɛɛ emu asafo nyinaa.
Ɔka ɛpo nsuo boa ano kuo,
ɔde ebunu sie deɛ ɛhɔ dɔ.
Ma asase nyinaa sofoɔ nsuro AWURADE,
wɔn a wɔte wiase nyinaa mfɛre no;
na ɔno na ɔka a, ɛba mu,
ɔno na ɔhyɛ a, ɛgyina hɔ.
AWURADE ma amanaman agyina dane hunu,
ɔma aman adwene yɛ ɔkwa.
AWURADE agyina deɛ, ɛgyina hɔ daa,
n’akomam adwene wɔ hɔ ma awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa.
Nhyira ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn Nyankopɔn ne AWURADE,
ne ɔman a wayi wɔn de ayɛ ɔno ara n’apɛgyadeɛ.
AWURADE firi soro hwɛ,
ɔhunu nnipa mma nyinaa.
Ɔte ne tenaberɛ na ɔhwɛ
asase sotefoɔ nyinaa.
Ɔno na ɔnwono wɔn nyinaa akoma,
ɔhu wɔn nnwuma nyinaa mu.
Ɔhene biara mfa ɛdɔm dodoɔ nni nkonim,
ɔbrane mfa ahoɔden kɛseɛ nnye ne ho.
Nkwagyeɛ mu, ɔpɔnkɔ yɛ ade hunu
na wɔmfa n’ahoɔden dodoɔ nnye onipa.
Hwɛ, AWURADE ani wɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no so,
ɛwɔ wɔn a wɔn ani da n’adɔeɛ soɔ no so,
sɛ ɔbɛgye wɔn kra afiri owuo mu,
na wama wɔanya nkwa ɛkɔm mu.
Yɛn kra twɛn AWURADE,
yɛn boafoɔ ne yɛn kyɛm ne no.
Na ne mu na yɛn akoma bɛtɔ yɛn yam,
ɛfiri sɛ yɛde yɛn ho ato ne din kronkron so.
AWURADE, ma w’adɔeɛ ntena yɛn so,
sɛdeɛ yɛn ani da wo soɔ no.

fragment.content: Dawid deɛ a ɔtoeɛ berɛ a ɔdanee sɛ ɔbɔdamfoɔ Abimelek anim na ɔpamm no maa no kɔeɛ no.

block_quote.content: Mɛhyira AWURADE nna nyinaa,
n’ayeyie wɔ m’anomu daa yi.
AWURADE mu na me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho,
ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛte, na wɔn ani agye.
Mo ne me nkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ,
na momma yɛmmom mma ne din so.
Mahwehwɛ AWURADE, na wabua me,
na wagye me afiri deɛ mesuro nyinaa mu.
Wɔn a wɔhwɛɛ no no anim tee,
na wɔn anim angu ase.
Ohiani yi teaa mu, na AWURADE tiee no,
na ɔgyee no n’ahohia nyinaa mu.
AWURADE bɔfoɔ bɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no ho nsraban hyia,
na ɔgye wɔn.
Monka nhwɛ na monhunu sɛ AWURADE yɛ,
nhyira ne onipa a ɔdwane kɔtoa no.
AWURADE akronkronfoɔ, monsuro no!
na biribiara remmɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no.
Gyata mmuruwa bɛdi hia na ɛkɔm ade wɔn,
na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ AWURADE no adepa biara remmɔ wɔn.
Mma, mommra, monyɛ aso mma me!
Mɛkyerɛ mo AWURADE suro.
Mo mu hwan na ɔhwehwɛ nkwa,
na ɔpɛ onyinkyerɛ sɛ ɔbɛhunu papa?
Kora wo tɛkyerɛma, bɔne ho,
ɛne w’ano, nnaadaasɛm ho.
Yi bɔne ho akwa, na yɛ papa,
hwehwɛ asomdwoeɛ, na ti no.
AWURADE ani wɔ ateneneefoɔ so,
na n’aso tie wɔn sufrɛ.
AWURADE ani sa nnebɔneyɛfoɔ,
sɛ ɔbɛhye wɔn ase, asase so.
Ateneneefoɔ su frɛ, na AWURADE tie,
na ɔgye wɔn firi wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu.
AWURADE bɛn wɔn a wɔn akoma abubuo,
na ɔgye wɔn a wɔn honhom apɛkyɛ.
Ɔteneneeni amaneɛ dɔɔso,
na AWURADE gye no ne nyinaa mu.
Ɔhwɛ ne nnompe nyinaa,
sɛdeɛ emu baako mpo mmu.
Bɔne bɛkum ɔbɔnefoɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtane ɔteneneeni no bɛbrɛ mu.
AWURADE gye ne nkoa kra,
na wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa wɔremmu wɔn fɔ.
AWURADE, wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ham no nham,
wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ko no nko!
Sɔ ɛkyɛm ne nkatanim mu,
na sɔre bɛboa me.
Twe pea na si wɔn a wɔtaa me no kwan,
ka kyerɛ me kra sɛ: W’agyenkwa ne me!
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me wuo no anim ngu ase na wɔn ani nwu,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no mfa ahohora nsane wɔn akyi!
Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ ntɛtɛ, mframa anim,
na ma AWURADE bɔfoɔ nsum wɔn ngu!
Ma wɔn akwan mu nnuru sum na ɛnyɛ torotorotoro,
na AWURADE bɔfoɔ ntaa wɔn!
Na wɔasum me fidie wɔn amena mu kwa,
na wɔatu me kra amena kwa.
Ma ɔsɛeɛ mmɛfiri no awora,
na ma ne fidie a wasum ahunta no nyi no,
ma ɔmfa bubububu nhwe mu!
Na me kra bɛdi ahurisie AWURADE mu,
na ne ho asane no, ne nkwagyeɛ mu.
Me nnompe nyinaa bɛka sɛ:
AWURADE, hwan na ɔte sɛ wo
a wogye ɔmanehunufoɔ
deɛ ɔyɛ den sene no no nsam
ne ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani firi ne dwotwafoɔ no nsam.
Adansefoɔ nkontompofoɔ sɔre;
adeɛ a mennim na wɔbisa me.
Wɔde bɔne tua me papa ka,
me kra adi basugya.
Na me deɛ, wɔyare a,
mefira ayitoma,
mede mmuada mebrɛɛ me kra ase,
na mebɔɔ mpaeɛ maa no sane bɛguu me kokom.
Meyɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ m’adamfo ne me nua,
mesii me tiri ase twann
sɛ obi a ɔregyam ne na.
Na ɛnam sɛ merekɔhwe aseɛ nti,
wɔn ani gye na wɔbɔ kyenku,
nkwahumafoɔ ne nnipa a mennim wɔn bɔ me so kyenku,
wɔya ara na wɔnnyae.
Sɛ asansanfoɔ pɛ nkyewankyewa ho tena di fɛw no,
wɔtwɛree wɔn se guu me so.
AWURADE, wobɛhwɛ ara akɔsi da bɛn?
Gye me kra firi wɔn sɛeɛ mu,
m’ade korɔ firi agyata nsam!
Mɛda wo ase edwa kɛseɛ mu,
mɛyi wo ayɛ ɔman dodoɔ mu.
Mma m’atamfoɔ atorofoɔ no
ani nnnye me ho,
mma wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no mmmu me anikyeɛ!
Na wɔnka asomdwoeɛ nsɛm,
na wɔdwene nkontomposɛm tia
wɔn a wɔdwo, asase so.
Na wɔtrɛ wɔn anomu bayaa wɔ me so,
wɔse: Wiɛ, wiɛ,
yɛn ani ahunu!
AWURADE, woahunu, mmua w’ano,
AWURADE, mfiri me nkyɛn nkɔ akyiri!
Nyane, na sɔre bɛbu me atɛn,
me Nyankopɔn ne m’AWURADE, bɛdi m’asɛm!
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, fa wo tenenee so bɛbu me atɛn,
na mma wɔn ani nnnye me ho!
Mma wɔnnka no wɔn akoma mu sɛ:
Wiɛ, deɛ yɛpɛ ni!
Mma wɔnnka sɛ: Yɛamene no.
Wɔn a wɔn ani gye m’amanehunu ho nyinaa,
ma wɔn ani nwu na wɔn anim ngu ase.
Wɔn a wɔdi me so akokurokosɛm no,
ma aniwuo ne ahohora nsi wɔn aduradeɛ!
Wɔn a me tenenee sɔ wɔn ani no,
ma wɔnni ahurisie na wɔn ani nnye;
ma wɔnka daa sɛ:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ,
sɛ n’akoa yiedie sɔ n’ani.
Na me tɛkyerɛma bɛka wo tenenee
ne w’ayeyie daa nyinaa.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. AWURADE akoa Dawid deɛ.

block_quote.content: Ɔbɔnefoɔ mmarato kasa
wɔ n’akoma mu:
Nyankopɔn suro biara
nni n’ani so.
Na ɔbu ne ho bi ɔno ara ani so
sɛ wɔrenhunu n’amumuyɛ na wɔakyi.
N’anomu nsɛm yɛ ahuhusɛm ne nnaadaa,
wagyae nimdeɛsua ne papayɛ.
Ɔdwene amumuyɛdeɛ ne kɛtɛ so,
ɔde ne nan asi ɔkwan a ɛnyɛ so;
bɔne deɛ, ɔnkyi.
Ao, AWURADE, w’adɔeɛ kɔduru soro,
na wo nokorɛ kɔduru wiem tɔnn.
Wo tenenee te sɛ Nyankopɔn mmepɔ,
w’atemmuo te sɛ ebunu a emu dɔ.
AWURADE, wogye nnipa ne mmoa nkwa.
Ao, Onyankopɔn, hwɛ sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ no si so fa!
Na nnipa mma de wɔn ho kɔhyɛ wo ntaban nwunu ase.
Wo fie mu sradeɛ meemee wɔn,
na woma wɔnom w’anigyeɛ asubɔnten.
Ɛfiri sɛ wo nkyɛn na nkwa nsutire wɔ,
wo hann mu na yɛhunu hann.
Ma w’adɔeɛ nkyɛre mma wɔn a wɔni woɔ,
ne wo tenenee mma akoma mu teefoɔ.
Mma ɔhantanni nan nntia me,
na mma abɔnefoɔ nsa nnsum me!
Ɛnneɛ na amumuyɛfoɔ atotɔ,
wɔasum wɔn ahwehwe fam a wɔntumi nsɔreɛ.
Nha wo ho nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nti,
mma wo bo nnha wo amumuyɛfoɔ ho;
na ɛrenni da bi na wɔatwa wɔn agu sɛ ɛserɛ,
na wɔakusa sɛ wura mono a wɔatwa.
Bata AWURADE ho, na yɛ papa,
tena asase so, na di nokorɛ,
na ma w’ani nka AWURADE ho,
na wama wo deɛ w’akoma pɛ.
Fa wo kwan hyɛ AWURADE nsam,
na fa wo ho to ne so, na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ,
na wayi wo tenenee adi sɛ adekyeeɛ,
ne wo bem sɛ owigyinaeɛ.
Yɛ komm ma AWURADE, na tɔ wo bo ase twɛn no.
Nha wo ho, deɛ ne kwan asi no yie no nti,
onipa a ɔdi ne bo soɔ no nti.
Ma abufuo ntwa, na gyae bo bɔne yɛ,
nha wo ho, na ɛbɛwie bɔne nko,
na wɔbɛyi nnebɔneyɛfoɔ hɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtwɛn AWURADE no, wɔn na wɔbɛnya asase no adie.
Aka kakraa bi na ɔbɔnefoɔ nni hɔ,
na wɔhwehwɛ ne tenaberɛ a, na ɔnni hɔ.
Na ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛtena asase no so,
na wɔagye wɔn ani asomdwoeɛ bebree mu.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ susu ɔteneneeni ho asɛm,
na ɔtwɛre ne se gu ne so,
AWURADE sere no,
ɛfiri sɛ wahunu sɛ ne da reba.
Abɔnefoɔ atwe nkrantɛ,
na wɔakuntunu wɔn tadua mu
sɛ wɔbɛma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani ahwe ase,
na wɔaku wɔn a wɔn abrabɔ yɛ:
Wɔn nkrantɛ bɛwɔ wɔn ara wɔn akoma mu,
na wɔn tadua abubu.
Adeɛ kakra a onipa tenenee wɔ no yɛ
sene abɔnefoɔ bebree ahonyadeɛ dodoɔ,
na abɔnefoɔ abasa bɛbubu,
na AWURADE wowa ateneneefoɔ.
AWURADE nim wɔn a wɔdi mu no nna,
na wɔn agyapadeɛ bɛtena hɔ daa.
Wɔn ani renwu berɛ bɔne mu,
na wɔbɛmee, ɛkɔm nna mu.
Na abɔnefoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛyera,
na AWURADE atamfoɔ bɛyɛ sɛ ɛserɛ so nhwiren,
wɔbɛhye awie sa sɛ wisie.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ fɛm, na ɔntua,
na ɔteneneeni hunu mmɔbɔ, na ɔma.
Na wɔn a wahyira wɔn na ɛbɛtena asase so,
na wɔn a wabɔ wɔn dua no, wɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
AWURADE na ɔde onipa anammɔn sisi yie,
na ne kwan sɔ n’ani,
sɛ ɔhwe ase a, ɔrentɔ fam tim,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE kura ne nsam.
Mayɛ abɔfra, na afei mabɔ akora,
nanso menhunuu onipa tenenee a wɔapa no
anaasɛ n’asefoɔ resrɛ aduane.
Ɔhunu mmɔbɔ daa, na ɔde fɛm,
na n’asefoɔ nso yɛ nhyira.
Firi bɔne ho na yɛ papa,
na woatena hɔ daa;
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE dɔ atɛntenenee,
na ɔrennya n’ahotefoɔ.
Ɔhwɛ wɔn so daa,
na abɔnefoɔ asefoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
Ateneneefoɔ bɛtena asase so,
na wɔatena so daapem.
Ɔteneneeni ano ka nyansasɛm,
na ne tɛkyerɛma bu atɛntenenee;
ne Nyankopɔn mmara wɔ n’akomam,
na ne nan nwatiri.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ tɛ ɔteneneeni,
na ɔhwehwɛ sɛ ɔku no.
AWURADE rennya no ne nsam,
na sɛ wɔbu no atɛn a, ɔremmu no fɔ.
Twɛn AWURADE, na fa ne kwan so,
na ɔbɛma wo so, na woanya asase no atena so;
sɛ wɔhye abɔnefoɔ ase a, wobɛhunu.
Mahunu ɔbɔnefoɔ a ɔdi tumi,
na ɔdennane sɛ dua frɔmm a anya asiyɛ,
na obi twaa mu no, na hwɛ, ɔnni hɔ,
na mehwehwɛɛ no, nanso manhu no.
Kari onipa a ɔyɛ pɛ, na hwɛ deɛ ɔtene;
sɛ saa onipa no awieeɛ yɛ asomdwoeɛ.
Na mmaratofoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛsɛe wɔn nyinaa prɛko,
abɔnefoɔ ase deɛ, wɔbɛhye.
Na ateneneefoɔ nkwagyeɛ firi AWURADE,
ɔne wɔn dwanekɔhyɛbea, ahohia da mu.
Na AWURADE boa wɔn, na ɔgye wɔn,
ɔyi wɔn firi abɔnefoɔ nsam, na ɔgye wɔn nkwa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔde wɔn ho to ne so.

fragment.content: Dawid dwom a wɔde bɔ nkaeɛ afɔdeɛ.

block_quote.content: Ao, AWURADE, ntwi m’anim w’abufuo mu,
na ntwe m’aso w’anibereɛ mu;
na w’agyan awowɔ me aka mu,
na wo nsa aduru me so.
W’abufuhyeɛ nti
ahoɔden bi nni me honam mu,
me bɔne nti
nkwahosan bi nni me nnompe mu;
na me mfomsoɔ aboro me tiri so,
ɛdɛn me so sɛ adesoa duruduro.
M’akuro bɔn na aporɔ
m’agyimisɛm nti.
Mapompono na mapua koraa,
da mu nyinaa mede awerɛhoɔ menam foofoo.
Na ahyehyekuro ayɛ m’asene mu ma,
na ahoɔden bi nni me honam mu;
mahodwo na mabubu pasaa,
m’akoma apinisie nti mesu denden.
AWURADE, deɛ mepɛ nyinaa da w’anim,
na m’apenepene nhunta wo.
M’akoma bɔ paripari, m’ahoɔden atu,
na m’aniwa hann mpo nni me ho bio.
M’adɔfo ne me nnamfo afiri me haw no ho akɔgyina nkyɛn,
na m’abusuafoɔ gyinagyina akyirikyiri.
Na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra no asum me mfidie,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no ka me sɛeɛ ho asɛm,
na wɔdwene nnaadaasɛm da mu nyinaa.
Na me deɛ, mete sɛ ɔsotifoɔ a ɔnte asɛm,
na mete sɛ emum a ɔmmue n’ano.
Na mayɛ sɛ onipa a ɔnte asɛm
na n’anomu nni ntuatuaano.
Na wo, AWURADE, na m’ani da wo soɔ,
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, wobɛbua.
Na mese: Mma wɔn ani nnnye wɔ me ho,
na sɛ me nan watiri a, wɔanhoahoa wɔn ho wɔ me so.
Na mereyɛ mahwe ase,
na me yea wɔ m’anim daa.
Na meka me mfomsoɔ,
me bɔne nti me werɛ aho.
Na m’atamfoɔ ho yɛ wɛwɛwɛ, wɔn ho yɛ den,
na wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no dɔɔso.
Na wɔde bɔne tua papa so ka,
papa a medi akyire nti wɔpɛ me ho asɛm.
AWURADE, nnya me,
me Nyankopɔn, mma wo ne me ntam nnware.
Yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me,
AWURADE, m’agyenkwa!

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ Yedutun. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Mekaa sɛ: Mɛhwɛ m’akwan yie,
na mamfa me tɛkyerɛma manyɛ bɔne.
Mede nnareka bɛsɔ m’ano,
sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ wɔ m’anim yi.
Medanee mum meyɛɛ komm,
memuaa m’ano, papa ho,
nanso me yea mu yɛɛ den.
M’akoma yɛɛ hyerehyere wɔ me mu,
meredwendwen no, na ogya no redɛre,
na mede me tɛkyerɛma mekasae.
AWURADE, ma menhunu m’awieeɛ
ne me nna kakra a wɔasusuo no.
Ma menhunu me kyɛre a mammɛkyɛre.
Hwɛ, woayɛ me nna nsaama pɛ,
na me mfeɛ nyɛ hwee w’anim.
Ampa ara, onipa asi so sɛ deɛn ara a,
na ɔyɛ huruhuro ara kwa.
Ampa ara, onipa biara nam sɛ sunsum kwa.
Ampa ara, wɔha wɔn ho huruhuro ho,
ɔhyɛ da so, na ɔnnim deɛ ɔbɛboa ano.
Na afei, AWURADE,
ɛdeɛn na meretwɛn?
Wo so na m’ani da.
Gye me firi me mmarato nyinaa mu,
mfa me mma, na ɔkwasea mmmɔ me ahohora.
Matɔre mum, memmue m’ano,
ɛfiri sɛ wo na woayɛ.
Yi wo haw firi me so.
Wo nsa ano hweɛ rehye me.
Sɛ wode amumuyɛ ho animka
twe onipa aso a,
woma n’ahoɔfɛ hye sɛdeɛ nweweboaa yɛ.
Ampa ara, nnipa nyinaa yɛ ahuruhuro.
AWURADE, tie me mpaebɔ,
na yɛ aso tie me sufrɛ.
Mmua w’ano me nisuo ho,
na meyɛ wo hɔhoɔ,
meyɛ ɔmamfrani sɛ m’agyanom nyinaa.
Yi w’ani firi me so, na mente m’anim,
ansa na mafiri ha, na wɔanhu me bio.
Twɛn na metwɛnee AWURADE,
na ɔyɛɛ aso maa me, na ɔtee me sufrɛ.
Na ɔyii me firii ɔsɛeɛ amena mu,
firii atɛkyɛ mu,
na ɔde me nan sii ɔbotan so,
ɔmaa m’anammɔn tintimii.
Na ɔde dwom foforɔ ahyɛ m’anomu,
yɛn Nyankopɔn ayeyie.
Nnipa bebree bɛhunu asuro,
na wɔabata AWURADE ho.
Nhyira ne onipa a
ɔde n’ani ato AWURADE soɔ,
na ɔnnane n’ani nkyerɛ ahantanfoɔ
ne wɔn a wɔmane di atorɔ.
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn,
w’anwanwadeɛ ne w’adwene, woama no adɔɔso ama yɛn,
wɔrentumi mfa biribiara nto wo ho;
anka mɛka na makasa ho,
ɛdɔɔso sene sɛ wɔbɛtumi akan.
Wompɛ afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛdeɛ,
woasiesie aso de ama me,
wommisa ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ
ne bɔne ho afɔdeɛ.
Ɛnna mekaa sɛ: Hwɛ, mereba,
wɔatwerɛ me ho asɛm nwoma mmobɔeɛ no mu.
Deɛ mepɛ ne sɛ mɛyɛ deɛ wo, me Nyankopɔn, wopɛ,
na wo mmara wɔ m’akomam.
Maka tenenee ho asɛmpa
asafo kɛseɛ mu,
hwɛ, meremmua m’ano,
AWURADE, wonim.
Mankora wo tenenee m’akomam,
maka wo nokorɛ ne wo nkwagyeɛ,
mansi w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ so
asafo kɛseɛ mu.
Wo, AWURADE, worensi me
wo mmɔborɔhunu so,
w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ
bɛbɔ me ho ban daa.
Na bɔne a wɔnnim ano
atwa me ho ahyia,
m’amumuyɛ asɔ me mu
a ɛmma menhunu adeɛ bio,
ɛdɔɔso sene me tiri so nwi,
na m’akoma agya me.
AWURADE, ma no nyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛgye me,
AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me!
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra
asɛe no no ani nwu,
na wɔn anim ngu ase,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne nsane wɔn akyi, na wɔnnane ahohorafoɔ.
Wɔn a wɔse me sɛ: Wiɛ, wiɛ no,
ma wɔn ho nnwiri wɔn, wɔn aniwuo akatua so.
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ nyinaa
nni ahurisie, na wɔn ani nnye wo ho;
ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagyeɛ nka daa sɛ:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ.
Na me deɛ, meyɛ mmɔbɔ na meyɛ ohiani deɛ,
nanso AWURADE dwene me ho.
Wone me boafoɔ ne me gyefoɔ, me Nyankopɔn,
ntwentwɛn wo nan ase!
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔdwene mmɔborɔni ho,
AWURADE bɛgye no, da bɔne mu.
AWURADE bɛhwɛ no so,
na wama no nkwa,
na wɔahyira no asase so.
Na worenyi no nhyɛ n’atamfo a wɔpɛ no nsa.
AWURADE bɛwowa no yadeɛ mpa so;
ne yadeɛ a ɔyare da hɔ nyinaa, wodane ma no si no yie.
Me na mekaa sɛ: AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
sa me kra yadeɛ, na mayɛ wo bɔne!
M’atamfoɔ kasa me ho bɔne sɛ:
Da bɛn na ɔbɛwuo na ne din ayera?
Na sɛ ɔba bɛhwɛ me a, ɔka atorosɛm,
n’akoma tase nsɛnhunu fa,
ɔfiri adi kɔbɔ dawuro.
Wɔn a wɔtane me nyinaa tutu me ho asu,
wɔsusu me ho bɔne ka sɛ:
Abusudeɛ akuta no,
na afei ɔda hɔ yi, ɔrensɔre bio.
M’adamfo pa mpo a mede me ho metoo ne soɔ
a ɔdii m’aduane bie no, wama ne nantin so atia me.
Na wo, AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na ma me so, na mentua wɔn so ka!
Yei ho na mɛhunu sɛ wopɛ me:
Sɛ m’atamfoɔ renni me so ahurisie.
Na me deɛ, wosɔ me mu ma megyina hɔ, me mu a medie mu,
na wode me gyina w’anim pintinn daa.
Nhyira ne AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn,
ɛfiri teteete de rekɔ daa.
Amen ne Amen.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma nnweneho dwom.

block_quote.content: Sɛdeɛ ɔforoteɛ pere
hwehwɛ nsuwa no,
sɛ me kra pere hwehwɛ wo,
Onyankopɔn, ne no.
Onyankopɔn, nkwa Nyankopɔn ho sukɔm de me kra.
Da bɛn na mɛba mabɛfiri Nyankopɔn anim?
Me nisuo ayɛ me aduane
awia ne anadwo,
sɛ wɔse me daa sɛ:
Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
Mekae yeinom,
na mehwie me kra wɔ me mu,
sɛdeɛ me ne asafokuo
nante kɔɔ Nyankopɔn fie,
na me ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔnam yuu hyɛ fa no
de ayeyie ne aseda nnwom kɔeɛ no.
Me kra, adɛn na woaboto sɛɛ,
na wosi me mu apini?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ
ne me Nyankopɔn.
Me kra aboto wɔ me mu,
enti mekae wo,
Yordan ne Hermon mmepɔ asase so,
Misar bepɔ so.
Ebunu frɛ ebunu,
wo nsuo a ɛworo guo no gyegyeegye no mu,
w’asorɔkyeɛ ne w’aworɔ nyinaa
abu afa me so.
Adekyeeɛ bi AWURADE bɛyi n’adɔeɛ adi,
na anadwo mato no dwom
mabɔ me nkwa Nyankopɔn mpaeɛ.
Mɛbisa me Nyankopɔn ne me botan no, sɛ:
Adɛn nti na wo werɛ afiri me?
Adɛn nti na ɔtamfoɔ hyɛ a ɔhyɛ me soɔ nti
memfa awerɛhoɔ mennanteɛ?
Ahohora a m’ahohiahiafoɔ bɔ me no
yɛ me sɛ me nnompe redwerɛ,
sɛ daa wɔbisa me sɛ:
Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
Me kra, adɛn na woaboto sɛɛ,
na wosi apini wɔ me mu?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so, na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ ne me Nyankopɔn.
O Onyankopɔn, bu me bem,
na wo ne ɔman a ɛnyɛ no nni asɛm mma me.
Gye me firi nkontomponi ne omimfoɔ nsam.
Na wone me dwane kɔtoa Nyankopɔn,
adɛn nti na woto me twene?
Adɛn nti na ɔtamfoɔ hyɛ a ɔhyɛ me soɔ nti
memfa awerɛhoɔ mennanteɛ?
Ma wo hann ne wo nokorɛ
mmɛgya me,
na ɛmfa me nkɔ wo bepɔ kronkron so
ne wo tenabea.
Na makɔ Nyankopɔn afɔrebukyia ho,
m’ahurisie anigyeɛ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn,
na mede sankuo mada wo ase,
Onyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn.
Me kra, adɛn na woaboto sɛɛ,
na wosi apini wɔ me mu?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so, na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ ne me Nyankopɔn.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma nnweneho dwom.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, yɛde yɛn aso ate,
yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn sɛ:
Woayɛ adwuma bi wɔn berɛ so,
tete mmerɛ no mu.
Wode wo nsa pamm amanaman,
na wɔn deɛ, woduaa wɔn.
Wobɔɔ aman, na wɔn deɛ,
wotrɛɛ wɔn mu.
Na ɛnyɛ wɔn ara afena na wɔde nyaa asase no,
nanso ɛnyɛ wɔn ara nsa na ɛgyee wɔn,
na mmom ɛyɛ wo nifa ne wo basa
ne w’anim hann,
ɛfiri sɛ wopɛ wɔn.
Wo, Onyankopɔn, wone me Hene,
hyɛ na Yakob nnya nkwagyeɛ ara nko.
Wo so na yɛnam sum ahohiahiafoɔ guo,
wo din mu na yɛtiatia wɔn a wɔsɔre tia yɛn no soɔ.
Na memfa me ho mento me tadua so,
na m’afena nso rennye me.
Na woagye yɛn yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ nsam,
na woahyɛ wɔn a wɔtane yɛn aniwuo.
Nyankopɔn mu na yɛhoahoa yɛn ho da mu nyinaa,
na yɛyi wo din ayɛ daapem.
Nanso woato yɛn agu, na woabɔ yɛn ahohora,
na wo ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ.
Womaa yɛdanee yɛn akyiri kyerɛɛ yɛn ahodwanfoɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtane yɛn fom yɛn fa.
Wode yɛn maa sɛ nnwan a wɔdie,
na woabɔ yɛn ahwete amanaman mu.
Woantɔn wo nkurɔfoɔ annye hwee,
woamfa wɔn annye aboɔden.
Wode yɛn asi hɔ ama wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho nsopa,
ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia no fɛdie, ne ehuro.
Wode yɛn ayɛ akasabebuo amanaman mu,
woma aman bobɔ wɔn tiri nko wɔ yɛn ho.
Daa nyinaa m’ahohora da m’anim,
na aniwuo akata me so,
deɛ ɔbɔ me ahohora na ɔsopa me no nne
ne ɔtamfoɔ ne ɔweretɔfoɔ nti.
Yei nyinaa aba yɛn so,
nanso yɛn werɛ mfirii wo,
na yɛntwaa w’apam no ho nkontompo.
Yɛn akoma nsanee n’akyi,
na yɛn anammɔn nteree wo kwan ho.
Nanso woabubu yɛn pasaa, deɛ sakraman wɔ,
na wode esum kabii akata yɛn so.
Sɛ yɛn werɛ afiri yɛn Nyankopɔn din
anaasɛ yɛatrɛ yɛn nsam akyerɛ onyame foforɔ a,
ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔbɛhwehwɛ?
Na ɔno na ɔnim akoma mu ahuntasɛm.
Na wo nti na wɔku yɛn daa nyinaa,
wɔbu yɛn sɛ nnwan a wɔrekɔku wɔn.
AWURADE, nyane ɛ, adɛn nti na woda?
Sɔre ɛ, nto yɛn ntwene koraa.
Adɛn nti na woyi w’ani hunta,
na wo werɛ firi yɛn amaneɛ ne yɛn so hyɛ no?
Na wɔabrɛ yɛn kra ase kɔ mfuturo mu,
yɛn yafunu butu fam.
Sɔre bɛboa yɛn ɛ,
na gye yɛn, w’adɔeɛ nti!

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Sosannim” sankuo nne so. Kora mma nnweneho, adɔdeɛ dwom.

block_quote.content: Asɛm pa ayɛ m’akoma ma abu so.
Meka adeɛ a mayɛ a ɛfa ɔhene ho,
me tɛkyerɛma yɛ ɔtwerɛfoɔ a ne nsa yɛ hare atwerɛdua.
Wo ho yɛ fɛ sene nnipa mma,
wɔde adom ahyɛ w’anomu ma.
Enti na Onyankopɔn ahyira wo daa.
Otumfoɔ, fa w’afena bɔ w’asene,
fa w’animuonyam ne w’ahensɛm bɔ abɔsoɔ.
Na fa w’ahensɛm no te mu kɔ w’anim
ma nokorɛ ne tenenee a wɔabrɛ no aseɛ,
na wo nifa nkyerɛkyerɛ w’adeɛ a ɛyɛ hu.
W’agyan ano yɛ nnam,
aman bɛhwehwe ase w’anim,
ɛwɔ ɔhene atamfoɔ akoma mu.
Onyankopɔn, w’ahennwa wɔ hɔ daa daa,
w’ahennie poma yɛ tenenee poma.
Wodɔ tenenee, na wotane abɔnefosɛm,
enti na Onyankopɔn, wo Nyankopɔn,
de anigyeɛ ngo asra woɔ sene wo mfɛfoɔ.
Kurobo ne pɛprɛ ne bɛwewonua yi hwa wo ntadeɛ nyinaa mu,
sankuo a wɔbɔ no asommɛn aban mu ma w’ani gye.
Ahemfo mmammaa wɔ wo mmaa animuonyamfoɔ mu,
wo dɔyerɛ abɛgyina wo nifa, Ofir sika mu.
Ɔbabaa, tie, na hwɛ, na yɛ aso,
na ma wo werɛ mfiri wo man ne w’agya fie.
Na ɔhene ani asɔ w’ahoɔfɛ,
na ɔne wo wura, na sɔre no.
Na Tiro babaa de ayɛyɛdeɛ ba,
na ɔman mu adefoɔ bɛdɛfɛdɛfɛ wo.
Ɔhene babaa wɔ animuonyam kɛseɛm ɔdan mu,
wɔde sikatam abu n’aduradeɛ.
Ɔhyɛ mmobɔmu atadeɛ, na wɔde no brɛ ɔhene,
wɔde mmaabunu a wɔyɛ ne mfɛfoɔ di n’akyi bɛbrɛ wo.
Wɔde anigyeɛ ne ahosan na ɛde wɔn reba,
wɔkɔhyɛne ɔhene aban mu.
Wo mma bɛsi w’agyanom ananmu,
wode wɔn bɛsisi asase nyinaa so ahene.
Mɛma wɔakae wo din, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu,
enti na aman bɛyi wo ayɛ daa daa.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom. Wɔnto no “Alamot” sankuo nne so.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn yɛ yɛn dwanekɔbea ne ahoɔden,
ahohia mu boafoɔ pa a wɔanya no nhunuiɛ.
Enti sɛ asase ani dane butu,
na mmepɔ tutu gu po bunu mu,
na emu nsuo woro na ɛhuru
na n’asorɔkyeɛ ma mmepɔ woso mpo a, yɛrensuro.
Asuo bi, ne mmɔmu ma Nyankopɔn kuro ani gye,
ɔsorosoroni tenabea kronkron no.
Onyankopɔn te mfimfini, ɛnwoso,
Onyankopɔn boa no anɔpahema.
Amanaman yɛ hoo, ahennie wosowoso,
ɔma ne nne so ma asase nane.
Asafo AWURADE ne yɛn wɔ hɔ,
Yakob Nyankopɔn ne yɛn abankɛseɛ.
Mommra mmɛhwɛ AWURADE nnwuma,
ɔsɛeɛ ko a wama no aba asase soɔ.
Ɔma akodie gyae kɔsi asase ano,
ɔbubu tadua mu na ɔtwitwa pea mu asinasini,
ɔde ogya hye nteaseɛnam.
Monyɛ komm na monhunu sɛ mene Onyankopɔn.
Wɔmma me so amanaman mu,
wɔmma me so asase so.
Asafo AWURADE ne yɛn wɔ hɔ,
Yakob Nyankopɔn ne yɛn abankɛseɛ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom.

block_quote.content: Aman nyinaa, mommɔ mo nsam,
momfa anigyeɛ nhuro mmɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn.
Na AWURADE a ɔwɔ sorosoro no ho yɛ hu,
ɔyɛ ɔhenkɛseɛ asase nyinaa so.
Ɔbrɛ aman ase de hyɛ yɛn ase,
na ɔde nkurɔfoɔ hyɛ yɛn nan ase.
Ɔyi yɛn apɛgyadeɛ ma yɛn,
Yakob a ɔdɔ no no animuonyam.
Onyankopɔn de anigyeɛ huro kɔ ɔsoro,
AWURADE de totorobɛnto gyegyeɛ kɔ.
Monto Nyankopɔn dwom, monto ayeyie dwom,
monto dwom mma yɛn hene, monto ayeyie dwom.
Na Onyankopɔn ne asase nyinaa so hene,
mommɔ sankuo nto nnweneho dwom.
Onyankopɔn di amanaman so hene,
Onyankopɔn te n’ahennwa kronkron so.
Aman ahene boaboa wɔn ho ano,
Abraham Nyankopɔn man.
Na asase so akyɛm yɛ Onyankopɔn dea,
wɔama no so kɛse.
AWURADE yɛ kɛse, na wɔyi no ayɛ sɛ,
yɛn Nyankopɔn kuro mu,
ne bepɔ kronkron so.
Tenabea a ɛyɛ fɛ,
asase nyinaa anika,
ɛne Sion bepɔ,
atifi fam nkyɛn mu no,
ɔhenkɛseɛ kuro no.
Onyankopɔn ama wɔahu no
kuro yi aban mu sɛ abankɛseɛ.
Na hwɛ, ahemfo bɛhyiae,
wɔboom yuu bae.
Wɔbɛhunui, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn,
wɔbɔɔ hu, na wɔdwanee tonom.
Nketenkete kutaa wɔn,
yea kaa wɔn sɛ ɔbaa a ɔreko awoɔ.
Wode apueeɛ mframa
bobɔɔ Tarsis ahyɛn.
Sɛ yɛteeɛ no, sɛ yɛhunuu no ne no,
asafo AWURADE kuro mu,
yɛn Nyankopɔn kurom,
Onyankopɔn ma n’ase tim daa.
Onyankopɔn, yɛkaee w’adɔeɛ
w’asɔrefie hɔ.
Onyankopɔn, sɛ wo din teɛ no,
saa na w’ayeyie teɛ de kɔsi asase ano ano;
tenenee ahyɛ wo nsa nifa ma.
Ma Sion bepɔ ani nnye,
ma Yuda mmammaa nni ahurisie
w’atemmuo nti.
Momfa Sion ho ntwa ho kɔntɔnkrɔn,
monkan n’abantenten,
momfa mo ani nkari n’afasuo,
monhwehwɛ n’aban mu yie,
na moaka akyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛbɛdi mo akyire no,
sɛ saa Nyankopɔn yi yɛ
yɛn Nyankopɔn daa daa,
ɔbɛyɛ yɛn kwankyerɛfoɔ de akɔsi owuo mu.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom.

block_quote.content: Aman nyinaa, montie yei,
mo a mote wiase nyinaa, monyɛ aso.
Nnipa mma mpapahwekwaa oo,
mmarima mma a wɔwɔ din oo,
adefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ nyinaa.
M’ano bɛka anyansasɛm,
na m’akomam nsusuiɛ yɛ nhunumu ara nko.
Mɛbrɛ m’aso ase matie abebusɛm,
mede sankubɔ mɛkyerɛ me bɛ ase.
Adɛn nti na mensuro nna bɔne mu,
nna a m’atɛfoɔ amumuyɛ twa me ho hyia mu?
Wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn ahonyadeɛ so,
na wɔde wɔn adedodoɔ hoahoa wɔn ho.
Onua rentumi nnye onipa da,
ɔremma Onyankopɔn ne mpatadeɛ,
na wɔn kra gyeɛ boɔ yɛ den,
na ɛma no gya hɔ koraa,
sɛ ɔntena ase ara daa,
na wanhunu Adamena.
Na ɔhunu sɛ anyansafoɔ wuwu,
na saa nso na nkwasea ne agyimifoɔ sɛeɛ,
na wɔgya wɔn ahodeɛ ma ebinom.
Wɔn tirim ne sɛ wɔn adan bɛtena hɔ daa,
na wɔn afie atena hɔ akɔsi awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ so;
wɔde wɔn din toto wɔn nsase.
Nanso onipa a ɔwɔ anidie mu no, ɔrentena mu,
ɔte sɛ mmoa a wɔyi wɔn hɔ.
Ɔkwan a nkwasea fa soɔ nie,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ wɔn anomu asɛm no di wɔn akyi.
Wɔboa Asamando sɛ nnwan;
Owuo hwɛ wɔn so,
na teneneefoɔ bɛtiatia wɔn so anɔpa,
na wɔn deɛ, Asamando bɛsɛe wɔn ahoɔfɛ,
na wɔannya tenabea bio.
Na me kra deɛ, Onyankopɔn bɛgye no Asamando nsam,
na ɔbɛgye me.
Sɛ obi nya ne ho a, nsuro,
sɛ ne fie animuonyam redɔɔso a, nsuro,
na ɔwu a, ɔremfa emu biribiara nkɔ,
n’animuonyam rensiane nni n’akyi.
Sɛ ɔhyira ne kra ne nkwa berɛ mu,
nso wɔyi wo ayɛ sɛ woyɛ wo ho yie a,
ɔbɛkɔ n’agyanom abusua mu,
wɔrenhunu hann ara da.
Onipa a ɔwɔ anidie mu na ɔnni nhunumu no,
ɔte sɛ mmoa a wɔyi wɔn hɔ.
Onyankopɔn, Tweaduampɔn AWURADE rekasa,
na ɔfrɛ asase
firi owia apueeɛ de kɔsi n’atɔeɛ.
Sion, ahoɔfɛ a ɛwie pɛyɛ no mu na
Onyankopɔn firi hran.
Yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛba, na ɔrenyɛ komm.
Ogya di n’anim rehye adeɛ,
na ahum atu huu atwa ne ho ahyia.
Ɔrefrɛ ɔsorofoɔ firi ɔsoro aba, ne asase,
sɛ ɔrebɛbu ne man atɛn:
Mommoaboa m’ahotefoɔ ano mma me,
wɔn a wɔnam afɔrebɔ so ne me wɔ apam no.
Na ɔsoro bɛka ne tenenee akyerɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔrebɛbu atɛn.
Me man, montie, na merebɛkasa;
Israel tie, na merebɛdi wo adanseɛ:
Me, Onyankopɔn, meyɛ wo Nyankopɔn.
Ɛnyɛ wo kum afɔdeɛ nti na mɛka w’anim,
na wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ wɔ m’anim daa.
Meremfa wo fie mu nantwinini,
wo nnwammuo mu mpapo,
ɛfiri sɛ kwaeɛ mu mmoa nyinaa wɔ me,
mmepɔ apem so mmoa.
Menim mmepɔ so ntakraboa nyinaa,
na wiram mmoadoma nyinaa wɔ me hɔ.
Sɛ ɛkɔm de me a, anka merense wo,
na wiase ne ne mayɛ wɔ me.
Medi anantwinini nam?
Na menom mpapo mogya?
Bɔ aseda afɔdeɛ ma Onyankopɔn,
na tua w’aboadeɛ ma deɛ ɔwɔ ɔsorosoro no;
na frɛ me hiada mu,
na mɛgye wo na woahyɛ me animuonyam.
Na ɔbɔnefoɔ deɛ, Onyankopɔn se no sɛ:
Adɛn nti na woka m’ahyɛdeɛ,
na wode w’ano bɔ m’apam din,
na wo korɔ yi ara wokyiri animka,
na woto me nsɛm gu w’akyire?
Sɛ wohunu owifoɔ a, wopɛ n’asɛm,
na wo ne awaresɛefoɔ bɔ.
Wogyaa w’ano mu kɔ bɔne mu,
na wo tɛkyerɛma toatoa nnaadaasɛm.
Wotena ase ka wo nua ho nsɛm,
wo na ba mpo, wosopa no.
Woayɛ yeinom, na mayɛ komm nti,
wosusu sɛ mete sɛ wo ara,
mɛka w’anim na mede mataataa w’anim.
Mo a mo werɛ firi Onyankopɔn no, monnwene yei ho ɛ,
na mantete mo asinasini a ɔgyefoɔ biara nni hɔ.
Deɛ ɔde aseda bɔ afɔdeɛ no hyɛ me animuonyam,
na deɛ n’akwan teeɛ no,
mɛkyerɛ no Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom; ɔkɔɔ Batseba ho a Odiyifoɔ Natan baa ne nkyɛn no, na ɔtoeɛ.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ, sɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ no,
wo mmɔborɔhunu a ɛdɔɔso nti pepa me mmarato.
Hohoro me ho firi m’amumuyɛ mu koraa,
na prapra me ho firi me bɔne mu.
Na mahunu me mmarato no,
na me bɔne wɔ m’anim daa.
Wo nko ara na mafom woɔ,
na mayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ w’ani so bɔne,
na woadi bem wo kasa mu,
na wo ho ate, w’atemmuo mu.
Hwɛ, wɔwoo me amumuyɛ mu,
na bɔne mu na me na nyinsɛnee me.
Hwɛ, wopɛ nokorɛ me sawa mu,
na ma menhunu nyansa me mu ahuntaeɛm.
Fa adwera yi me ho bɔne, na me ho afi;
dware me, na mayɛ fitaa asene nwera.
Ma mente anigyeɛ ne abotɔyam nsɛm,
na nnompe a woabubuo no adi ahurisie.
Yi w’ani firi me bɔne ho hunta,
na pepa m’amumuyɛ nyinaa.
Onyankopɔn, bɔ akoma a emu teɛ ma me,
na yɛ honhom foforɔ a aseɛ tim wɔ me mu.
Nto me mfiri w’anim ntwene,
na nyi wo kronkronyɛ honhom mfiri me so.
Ma mennya wo nkwagyeɛ ho abotɔyam bio,
na ayamyie honhom nsɔ me mu.
Mɛkyerɛ mmaratofoɔ w’akwan,
na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adane aba wo nkyɛn.
Onyankopɔn, me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
gye me firi mogya ho fɔ mu,
na me tɛkyerɛma ato wo tenenee ho ahurisie dwom.
AWURADE, bue m’ano fafa,
na mede m’ano makyerɛ w’ayeyie.
Na wompɛ afɔrebɔ, anka mɛbɔ,
ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ nsɔ w’ani.
Nyankopɔn afɔdeɛ ne honhom a abubuo;
Onyankopɔn, akoma a abubuo, na apɛkyɛ na worempoɔ.
Ma no nyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ Sion yie;
to Yerusalem afasuo!
Ɛno na wobɛpɛ tenenee afɔdeɛ,
ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne afɔdeɛ mu,
ɛno na wɔde anantwinini bɛkɔ w’afɔrebukyia soɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid nnweneho dwom. Ɔtoe berɛ a Edomni Doeg bɛka kyerɛɛ Saulo sɛ Dawid aba Ahimelek fie no.

block_quote.content: Ɔkatakyie, adɛn na wohoahoa wo ho bɔne ho?
Nyankopɔn adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ
daa nyinaa.
Nkontomponi, wo tɛkyerɛma dwene mmusubɔ ho
te sɛ yiwan a ano yɛ tahwetahweɛ.
Wopɛ bɔne sene papa,
wopɛ atorɔ sene sɛ wobɛka deɛ ɛtene.
Nkɔnkɔnsa tɛkyerɛma,
wopɛ amammɔsɛm ara nko.
Onyankopɔn nso bɛbɔ wo ahwe fam koraa,
ɔbɛyi wo hɔ atu wo afiri wo tenabea,
na watutu w’ase afiri ateasefoɔ asase so.
Teneneefoɔ nso bɛhunu asuro,
na wɔasere no sɛ:
Hwɛ, onipa a wamfa
Onyankopɔn anyɛ ne dwanekɔbea,
na ɔde ne ho too n’ahodeɛ bebree no soɔ,
na ɔhyɛɛ ne ho den, n’anibereɛ mu, no nie.
Na me deɛ, mete sɛ ngodua frɔmfrɔm,
Nyankopɔn fie,
mede me ho meto Nyankopɔn adom so
daa daa.
Mɛyi wo ayɛ daa,
sɛ wo na woyɛeɛ,
na mɛtwɛn wo din, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ,
w’ahotefoɔ anim.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid nnweneho dwom. Wɔnto no “Mahalat” sankuo nne so.

block_quote.content: Ogyegyentwie se n’akomam sɛ:
Nyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.
Wɔasɛe, na wɔyɛ amumuyɛdeɛ a wɔkyire,
obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.
Onyankopɔn firi soro
hwɛ nnipa mma,
sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma,
obi a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan.
Nanso wɔn nyinaa amane,
wɔn nyinaa aporɔ,
obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa,
ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
Amumuyɛfoɔ anhunu de,
wɔn a wɔdi me man sɛdeɛ wɔdi aduane,
na wɔnsɔre Onyankopɔn?
Ɛno na wɔn ho popoeɛ,
deɛ ahopopoɔ nnie hɔ,
na Onyankopɔn petee wɔn a wɔbɔɔ wo so nsraban nnompe,
woahyɛ wɔn aniwuo, na Onyankopɔn apa wɔn.
Hwan na ɔde Israel nkwagyeɛ bɛfiri Sion aba?
Da a Onyankopɔn de ne man agyapadeɛ bɛsane aba no,
Yakob bɛdi ahurisie, na Israel ani agye.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid nnweneho dwom. Ɔtoo no berɛ a Sififoɔ bɛka kyerɛɛ Saulo sɛ: Dawid abɛhunta yɛn nkyɛn no.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, fa wo din so gye me,
na fa wo tumi di m’asɛm ma me.
Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso tie m’anomu nsɛm;
na ananafoɔ asɔre atia me,
na atirimuɔdenfoɔ rehwehwɛ me kra,
wɔamfa Onyankopɔn anyɛ wɔn ani so biribi.
Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn ne me boafoɔ,
AWURADE nko ne deɛ ɔsɔ me kra mu.
Ɔbɛma m’atɛfoɔ bɔne asane akɔ wɔn so,
fa wo nokorɛ yi wɔn hɔ.
Mɛbɔ ayamyie afɔdeɛ ama wo;
AWURADE, mɛyi wo din ayɛ sɛ ɛyɛ.
Na wagye me, amaneɛ nyinaa mu,
na m’ani ahunu deɛ mepɛ m’atamfoɔ ho.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid nnweneho dwom.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, yɛ aso tie me mpaebɔ,
na nhunta wo ho mfiri me nkotosrɛ ho.
Wɛn w’aso ma me, na gye me so.
M’adwene mu nnwane wɔ m’abooboo mu, na mesi apini,
ɔtamfoɔ nne
ne ɔbɔnefoɔ ahodwan nti.
Na wɔbɔ mmusuo gu me so,
na wɔde abufuo tane me.
M’akoma pere wɔ me mu,
na owuo ho hu agu me so.
Suro ne ahopopoɔ aba me so,
na ahoyera akata me so.
Na mese: O, sɛ mewɔ ntaban sɛ aburuburo deɛ ɛ,
anka mɛtu makɔtena baabi.
Aane, anka mɛdwane makɔ akyirikyiri,
na makɔtena serɛ so.
Anka mɛyɛ ntɛm madwane mafiri mframa kɛseɛ
ne ahum yi mu.
AWURADE, yɛ wɔn basabasa, paepae wɔn tɛkyerɛma mu,
na mahunu amimdie ne aperedie, kuro no mu.
Awia ne anadwo wɔnam
n’afasuo so twa ho hyia,
na amumuyɛ ne ɔhaw wɔ mu.
Amammɔsɛm wɔ mu,
na nhyɛsoɔ ne nnaadaa
mpa n’abɔntene so.
Na ɛnyɛ ɔtamfoɔ na ɔbɔ me ahohora,
ɛno deɛ, anka mɛtie.
Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔkyiri me na ɔkyerɛ ne ho wɔ me soɔ,
anka mede me ho bɛhunta no.
Na wo dasani a me ne wo bɔ soɔ,
me yɔnko ne me manni,
wo a wo ne me di atirimusɛm dɛdɛ,
na yɛnam yɔɔ kɔ Nyankopɔn fie.
Ma owuo nto nsi wɔn so,
ma wɔnsiane nkɔ Asamando anikan,
na nsɛmmmɔne wɔ wɔn tenabea ne wɔn mu.
Me deɛ, mɛsu mafrɛ Onyankopɔn,
na AWURADE abɛgye me.
Anwummerɛ ne anɔpa ne awigyina
na mɛdwene me tirim na masi apini,
na ɔbɛte me nne.
Wagye me kra asomdwoeɛ mu,
na wɔammɛn me,
na wɔn a wɔne me anya dɔɔso.
Onyankopɔn bɛte na wabua wɔn.
Na ɔno na ɔte hɔ firi teteete.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔnsakyera,
nanso wɔnsuro Onyankopɔn.
Ɔtene ne nsa ne nnamfonom so,
wabu n’apam so.
N’anomu nsɛm yɛ fekɔɔ sene bɔta,
na ɔko wɔ n’akomam.
Ne nsɛm mu dwo bɛtɛɛ sene ngo,
nanso ɛyɛ mfena a wɔatwe.
Dane w’adesoa to AWURADE so,
na ɔbɛsɔ wo mu,
ɔremma ɔteneneeni
ntwe n’anan mu da.
Na wo, Onyankopɔn, wode wɔn
bɛkɔ ɔsɛeɛ amena mu,
mogyapɛfoɔ ne nnaadaafoɔ
renni wɔn nna fa,
na me deɛ, mede me ho meto wo so.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid abebuo dwom. Wɔnto no “Yohat elem rehokim” sankuo nne so. Ɔtoe berɛ a Filistifoɔ kyeree no Gat no.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na ɔdasani repɛ me amene me,
daa nyinaa ɔde ɔko hiahia me ho.
M’atɛfoɔ repɛ me amene me daa nyinaa,
na nnipa pii ama wɔn ho so ne me reko.
Ɛda a mesuro no,
mede me ho metwere wo.
Nyankopɔn mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ,
Nyankopɔn so na mede me ho matoɔ,
merensuro, onipa bɛtumi ayɛ me dɛn?
Da biara wɔtutu me nsɛm ano sisi,
bɔne nko ara na wɔdwene me ho.
Wɔboa ano hyia ma wɔtɛ me,
na wɔkari m’anammɔn
berɛ a wɔtwɛn me kra.
Wɔde amumuyɛ bɛnya kwan adwane anaa?
Onyankopɔn, fa aman hwe fam abufuo so.
Wo na woabu me kyini a mekyini yi ano,
fa me nisuo gu wo kotokuo mu.
Ɛnni wo nwoma mu anaa?
Ɛno na m’atamfoɔ bɛsane wɔn akyire,
ɛda a mesu mefrɛ no.
Yei na menim sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ m’afa.
Nyankopɔn mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ,
AWURADE mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ.
Nyankopɔn so na mede me ho matoɔ,
merensuro, nnipa bɛtumi ayɛ me dɛn?
Onyankopɔn, w’aboadeɛ wɔ me hɔ,
mɛbɔ aseda afɔdeɛ mama wo.
Na woagye me kra afiri owuo mu,
worenyi me nan mfiri asehweɛ mu anaa?
Na manante Nyankopɔn anim,
nkwa hann mu.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid abebuo dwom. Wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Ɔtoo no ɔbodan no mu berɛ a ɔdwanee Saulo no.

block_quote.content: Hu me mmɔbɔ, Onyankopɔn,
hu me mmɔbɔ,
na wo na me kra dwane bɛtoa woɔ,
na wo ntaban ase nwunu mu na mepɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea
kɔsi sɛ ahohia yi bɛtwa mu.
Mesu mefrɛ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn,
mefrɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔdi ma me wie.
Ɔbɛsoma afiri soro abɛgye me,
ɔbɔ deɛ ɔregye me amene me no ahohora.
Onyankopɔn bɛsoma n’adom ne ne nokorɛ.
Me kra da agyata mu,
meda wɔn a wɔhome gyaframa mu.
Nnipa mma a wɔn se yɛ mpea ne agyan,
na wɔn tɛkyerɛma yɛ nkrantɛ nnamnnam.
Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tena soro,
ma w’animuonyam so asase nyinaa so.
Wɔsum m’anammɔn fidie,
me kra brɛɛ ase,
wɔtuu me kwan mu amena,
wɔn ankasa ahwehwe mu.
M’akoma atim, Onyankopɔn,
m’akoma atim,
mɛto dwom na mayi ayɛ.
Me kra, nyane,
bɛnta ne sankuten, nyane,
me nso mɛnyane anɔpahema.
AWURADE, mɛda wo ase aman mu,
mɛto wo ayeyie dwom aman mu,
na w’adɔeɛ so kɔduru soro,
na wo nokorɛ kɔduru wiem tɔnn.
Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tena ɔsoro,
ma w’animuonyam so asase nyinaa so.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Dawid abebuo dwom.

block_quote.content: Mo atumfoɔ, ampa ara, moka asɛntenenee anaa?
O, nnipa mma, mobu atɛntenenee anaa?
Dabi, modi asɛmmɔne, akoma mu,
mo nsam akakabensɛm na mokari de ma, asase soɔ.
Abɔnefoɔ bɔ ko firi ɔyafunum,
wɔfiri wɔn na yam fom kwan di atorɔ.
Wɔn borɔ te sɛ ɔwɔ borɔ,
wɔte sɛ ahuritia sotifoɔ a wasi n’aso
a ɛntie ntafowayifoɔ
a wɔyi nkonyaa nyansam.
Onyankopɔn, bubu wɔn se, wɔn anomu,
AWURADE, tutu gyata aburuwa sebɔmmɔfoɔ.
Ma wɔn nwe sɛ nsuo a ɛretwe,
ɔkuntunu ne bɛmma mu a,
ma no nyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔabu ano.
Ɔsene sɛ nwa a wɔapɛkyɛ no,
sɛ ɔba a ɔbaa apɔn a ɔnhunuu owia da.
Ansa na mo nkukuo bɛte nkasɛɛ no nka no,
sɛ ɛyɛ mono oo, ɛreben oo, ɔde abufuhyeɛ bɛpra ne nyinaa agu.
Ɔtenenee ani bɛgye sɛ wahunu aweretɔ,
ɔbɛhohoro ne nan ase ɔbɔnefoɔ mogya mu.
Na nnipa bɛka sɛ: Ampa, akatua wɔ hɔ ma ɔteneneeni,
ampa, Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ a ɔbu atɛn asase soɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Dawid abebuo dwom. Ɔtoo no berɛ a Saulo soma baa ne fie sɛ wɔnku no no.

block_quote.content: Me Nyankopɔn, gye me firi m’atamfoɔ nsam,
bɔ me ho ban, wɔn a wɔsɔre tia me no ho.
Gye me amumuyɛfoɔ mu,
na gye me nkwa firi mogyapɛfoɔ nsam.
Na hwɛ, wɔtɛ me kra,
akokobirefoɔ boaboa wɔn ho ano tia me.
AWURADE, ɛnyɛ me mmarato anaa me bɔne nti.
Ɛnyɛ amumuyɛ nti na wɔtu mmirika siesie wɔn ho.
Sɔre bɛboa me, na fa w’ani hwɛ.
Na wo, AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn,
nyane bɛhwɛ amanaman nyinaa,
nhunu amumuyɛfoɔ nkontompofoɔ mmɔbɔ.
Wɔsane ba anwummerɛ,
wɔpɔ so sɛ akraman,
na wɔdi kuro mu kyinhyia.
Hwɛ, wɔde wɔn ano woro kasa,
nkrantɛ wɔ wɔn ano, na “hwan na ɔteɛ?”
Na wo, AWURADE, wosere wɔn,
wodi amanaman nyinaa ho fɛw.
M’ahoɔden, wo na mehwɛ wo kwan,
na Onyankopɔn yɛ m’abankɛseɛ.
Me Nyankopɔn de n’adom bɛhyia me,
Onyankopɔn bɛma mahunu deɛ mepɛ, m’atɛfoɔ ho.
Nku wɔn, na me man werɛ amfi;
fa w’ahoɔden bɔ wɔn pansam, na fa wɔn hwe fam,
yɛn kyɛm ne wo, AWURADE.
Wɔn anomu nsɛm yɛ nsɛmmɔne nko,
enti ma wɔnkye wɔn, wɔn ahantan mu,
ne nseɛ ne atorɔ a wɔdie no nti.
Hye wɔn abufuo mu,
hye wɔn na wɔantena hɔ,
na ma wɔnhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔdi Yakob so hene
kɔsi asase ano.
Na wɔsane ba anwummerɛ,
wɔpɔ so sɛ akraman
na wɔdi kuro mu kyinhyia.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔdwane hwehwɛ aduane,
na sɛ wɔmmee a, wɔtena hɔ anadwo.
Na me deɛ, mɛto w’ahoɔden ho dwom,
na mato w’adɔeɛ ho ahurisie dwom anɔpa,
sɛ woayɛ me abankɛseɛ
ne me hia da mu dwanekɔbea.
M’ahoɔden, wo na mɛto wo dwom,
na Onyankopɔn ne m’abankɛseɛ,
m’adom Nyankopɔn.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Susan Edut” sankuo nne so. Dawid abebuo dwom. Wɔmfa nkyerɛkyerɛ adeɛ. Ɔtoo no berɛ a ɔne Mesopotamia ne Soba Siriafoɔ koeɛ, na Yoab sane kɔkumm Edomfoɔ mpem dummienu nkyene bɔn mu no.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, woasum yɛn agu, woabɔ yɛn apansam,
wo bo afu; ma yɛn ho mmra yɛn ho bio.
Woama asase awoso, woapae mu,
fa n’asinasini sisi anim, na ɛhinhim.
Woama wo man ahunu deɛ ɛyɛ den,
woama yɛanom ntintan nsa.
Wode frankaa ama w’afɛrefoɔ
sɛ wɔmfa mma wɔn ho so, nokorɛ nti.
Deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔagye w’adɔfo nti
fa wo nifa gye yɛn nkwa, na gye yɛn so.
Onyankopɔn akasa n’ahoteɛ mu:
Mɛdi ahurisie, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu,
na masusu Sukot bonhwa.
Gilead wɔ me, na Manase wɔ me,
na Efraim yɛ me tiri so dadekyɛ;
Yuda yɛ m’ahempoma.
Moab yɛ me dwaresɛn,
Edom so na mɛto me mpaboa maguo,
me nti, Filistifoɔ asase, teateam.
Hwan na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuro denden no mu,
hwan na ɔbɛgya me akɔ Edom?
Ɛnyɛ wo, Onyankopɔn, na woasum yɛn aguo yi,
na wo, Onyankopɔn, ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ?
Bɛboa yɛn ahohia mu,
na onipa mmoa yɛ ɔkwa.
Yɛde Onyankopɔn na ɛbɛyɛ mmaninneɛ,
na ɔno na ɔbɛtiatia yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ soɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid deɛ.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, tie me sufrɛ,
yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ.
Mefiri asase ano mesu mefrɛ wo
m’akoma ahometeɛ mu,
wode me bɛkɔ
ɔbotan a ɛware sene me so.
Na wo na woayɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea,
abantenten a ɛyɛ den, ɔtamfoɔ anim.
Mɛtena wo ntomadan mu daa,
mɛhyɛ wo ntaban a ɛkata me soɔ no ase.
Na wo, Onyankopɔn, woate me bɔhyɛ,
wode wɔn a wɔsuro wo din agyapadeɛ ama me.
Wobɛto ɔhene nna so,
na ne mfeɛ akɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ so.
Ɔbɛtena Nyankopɔn anim daa,
fa adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ hwɛ no so.
Ɛno na mɛto dwom pa mama wo din daa,
na mama m’aboadeɛ daa daa.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ Yedutun. Dawid dwom.

block_quote.content: Ampa, me kra yɛ komm hwɛ Onyankopɔn ara;
ne nsam na menya nkwagyeɛ.
Ampa ara, ɔne me botan ne me nkwagyeɛ,
m’abankɛseɛ, merenhinhim bebree bi.
Mobɛha ɔbaakofoɔ akɔsi da bɛn,
na mo nyinaa adwiri no
sɛ ɔfasuo a akyea ne ɛban a agoɔ?
Ampa ara, wɔatu agyina sɛ wɔbɛtu no so.
Wɔpɛ atorɔdie,
wɔde wɔn ano hyira,
nanso wɔn mu deɛ, wɔdome.
Ampa, me kra, yɛ komm hwɛ Onyankopɔn ara,
na ne nsam na menya deɛ m’ani da soɔ.
Ampa ara, ɔne me botan ne me nkwagyeɛ,
m’abankɛseɛ, merenhinhim.
Nyankopɔn nsam na me nkwagyeɛ ne m’animuonyam wɔ,
me botan a ɛyɛ den, me dwanekɔhyɛbea ne Onyankopɔn.
Nkurɔfoɔ, momfa mo ho nto ne so daa.
Monyi mo yam nkyerɛ no,
Onyankopɔn ne yɛn dwanekɔhyɛbea.
Ampa ara, nnipa mma yɛ huhuo,
mmarima mma yɛ atorɔdeɛ.
Wɔgu nsaniam a, ɛhwan kɔ soro,
wɔn nyinaa yɛ huhuo.
Mommfa mo ho nnto amimdie so,
na monnyɛ dwotwa ho ahokyerɛ.
Sɛ ahonyadeɛ dɔre a, mommfa mo akoma nnto so.
Na Onyankopɔn akasa prɛko,
mprenu na mateɛ:
Sɛ tumi yɛ Nyankopɔn dea,
na wo, AWURADE, na adom wɔ woɔ.
Na wobɛtua onipa ka
sɛdeɛ n’adwuma teɛ.

fragment.content: Dawid dwom. Ɔwɔ Yuda serɛ soɔ no, na ɔtoeɛ.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, wone me Nyankopɔn,
mehwehwɛ wo anɔpahema,
wo ho sukɔm de me kra,
me honam ahodwo repɛ wo hɔ biribi,
asase pɛsɛɛ a nsuo nni soɔ ma no tɔ piti wɔ so.
Saa na mehwɛɛ woɔ wɔ kronkronbea hɔ,
sɛ mɛhunu wo tumi ne w’animuonyam.
Na w’adɔeɛ yɛ sene nkwa,
mede m’ano bɛyi wo ayɛ.
Saa na mete aseɛ yi mɛhyira woɔ,
wo din mu na mɛma me nsa soɔ.
Ɛbɛmee me kra sɛ ekyim ne sradeɛ,
na mede ahosan mu anoteɛ bɛyi wo ayɛ.
Sɛ mekae wo me kɛtɛ so a,
medi wo ho dadwene adasuo mu.
Na woayɛ me boafoɔ,
na wo ntaban ase nwunu mu na medi ahurisie.
Me kra bata wo ho di w’akyi,
wo nsa nifa sɔ me mu.
Na wɔn a wɔpɛ me kra asɛe no no
bɛsiane akɔ asase ase tɔnn.
Wɔde wɔn bɛto afena ano,
wɔbɛyɛ sakraman deɛ.
Na ɔhene deɛ, n’ani bɛgye Nyankopɔn ho,
obiara a ɔka ne ntam no de bɛhyehyɛ ne ho,
na wɔbɛmua wɔn a wɔdi atorɔ ano.
Onyankopɔn, tie me nne,
m’abooboo mu,
bɔ me nkwa ho ban, na ɔtamfoɔ ammɛyi me hu.
Fa me hunta firi nnipa bɔne kokoam agyinatuo ho,
firi amumuyɛfoɔ gyegyeegye ho.
Wɔn na wɔse wɔn tɛkyerɛma ano sɛ afena,
wɔkuntunu tadua mu rebɛto wɔn mmɛmma, ɛne nsɛm fo,
sɛ wɔbɛto abɔ deɛ ɔyɛ pɛ no kokoam,
wɔto bɔ no mpofirim, na wɔnsuro.
Wɔhyɛ wɔn asɛmmɔne mu den,
wɔkeka sɛ wɔbɛhunta asum fidie,
wɔka sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛhu yɛn?
Wɔbɔre hwehwɛ amumuyɛ,
wɔawie wɔn tirim pɔ no,
wɔabɔre abɔre, na onipa tirim ne n’akomam dɔ.
Na Onyankopɔn bɛto bɛmma abɔ wɔn,
wɔbɛpira mpofirim,
na wɔbɛhwe ase, na wɔn tɛkyerɛma so asɛm abua wɔn atifi,
wɔn a wɔhu wɔn nyinaa ho bɛpopo.
Na nnipa nyinaa bɛsuro,
na wɔaka Nyankopɔn adwuma,
na wɔahunu ne nneyɛɛ mu.
Ɔteneneeni ani bɛgye AWURADE ho,
na wadwane akɔtoa no,
na akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa bɛhyehyɛ wɔn ho.
Onyankopɔn, wɔde abodwoɔ yi wo ayɛ wɔ Sion,
na wo na wɔde aboadeɛ ma woɔ.
O mpaebɔ tiefoɔ,
wo nkyɛn na nnipa nyinaa ba.
Amumuyɛdeɛ boroo me so,
wo na woakata yɛn mmarato soɔ.
Nhyira ne deɛ woyi no
na woma no bɛn wo sɛ ɔntena w’abannwa soɔ.
Wo fie nnepa bɛmee yɛn,
w’asɔrefie kronkron nnepa no.
Wode asɛntenenee a ɛyi hu bua yɛn,
yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
wo na asase ano nyinaa ani da wo soɔ,
ne wɔn a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri po so.
Wode w’ahoɔden de mmepɔ tintim hɔ,
wode tumi amia.
Woma ɛpo huuyɛ,
emu asorɔkyeɛ huuyɛ gyae,
na woma aman kitikitiyɛ ano dwo.
Na wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nti
wɔn a wɔte ahafi nohoa suro,
woma wɔn a wɔte apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ nohoa tɔnn
to ahosan dwom.
Woabɛhwɛ asase agugu so nsuo,
woama ɛso aduane abu so bebree.
Nyankopɔn asubɔnten no, nsuo ayɛ mu ma,
womaa wɔn aburoo gyinae,
womaa no sii so sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ.
Woguguu n’akofie so nsuo
de honoo emu apɔapɔ,
wode osuo yɛɛ no bɛtɛɛ,
wohyiraa ne fire so.
Woabɔ w’ayamyɛ afirinhyia abotire,
na sradeɛ sosɔ w’akwan so.
Ɛsosɔ serɛ so adidibea so,
na mpampa de abotɔyam hyehyɛ wɔn ho.
Nnwankuo ahyɛ adidibea no ma,
aburoo nso akata abɔn no mu,
wɔdi ahurisie bɔ ose,
anigyeɛ dwom nko ara na wɔtoɔ.
Asase nyinaa, monni ahurisie mmɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn,
monto dwom mma ne din animuonyam,
monhyɛ no animuonyam nyi no ayɛ.
Monse Onyankopɔn sɛ: Wo nnwuma yɛ hu ampa.
Wo tumi kɛseɛ nti w’atamfo bɛkoto wo.
Asase nyinaa bɛsɔre wo
na wɔato wo dwom,
wɔbɛto dwom ama wo din.
Mommra mmɛhwɛ Nyankopɔn nneyɛɛ,
n’adeɛ a ɔyɛ de di nnipa mma soɔ yɛ hu.
Ɔmaa ɛpo danee asase pɛsɛɛ,
wɔde anammɔn twaa asu kɛseɛ,
ɛno nti yɛn ani gye ne ho.
Deɛ ɔde ne tumi di hene daa no,
ɔwɔ amanaman ho ani.
Mma mansotwefoɔ mmma wɔn ho so.
Aman, monhyira yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na momma wɔnte n’ayeyie yie.
Ɔde yɛn aka ateasefoɔ ho,
na wamma yɛn nan anwati.
Na wo, Onyankopɔn, na woakari yɛn ahwɛ,
woanane yɛn ahwɛ sɛ wɔnane dwetɛ hwɛ mu.
Wode yɛn ahyɛ asau mu,
wode adesoa dompee asoa yɛn.
Woama ɔdasani anante yɛn tiri so,
yɛafa ogya ne nsuo mu,
nanso woayi yɛn aba deɛ nnepa abu soɔ hɔ.
Mede ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ bɛkɔ wo fie,
mɛma wo m’aboadeɛ,
deɛ mede mebuee m’ano,
ne deɛ m’ano kaa m’ahohia mu no.
Mede nnwan a wɔadɔre
ne adwennini a ɛyɛ hwam bɛbɔ wo ɛhyeɛ afɔdeɛ,
mede anantwie ne mpapo bɛbɔ afɔdeɛ.
Mo a mosuro Onyankopɔn nyinaa,
mommra mmɛtie, na mɛka deɛ wayɛ ama me.
Mede m’ano mesu mefrɛɛ no,
na mede me tɛkyerɛma meyii no ayɛ.
Sɛ medi ahuhudeɛ akyiri m’akomam a,
anka AWURADE rentie me.
Ampaneampa, Onyankopɔn atie me,
wayɛ aso atie me mpaebɔ.
Nhyira ne Onyankopɔn
a wannane me mpaebɔ ani,
na wanyi n’adɔeɛ amfiri me soɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dwom a wɔto no asankuo ano.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, dom yɛn, na hyira yɛn,
te w’anim kyerɛ yɛn.
Na ma wɔnhunu w’akwan wɔ asase so,
wo nkwagyeɛ amanaman nyinaa mu.
Onyankopɔn, aman bɛyi wo ayɛ,
aman nyinaa bɛyi wo ayɛ.
Aman ani bɛgye na wɔato ahosan nnwom,
sɛ wobu aman atɛntenenee
na wokyerɛkyerɛ asase so aman kwan.
Onyankopɔn, aman bɛyi wo ayɛ,
aman nyinaa bɛyi wo ayɛ.
Asase abɔ n’aduane, Onyankopɔn,
yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛhyira yɛn.
Onyankopɔn bɛhyira yɛn,
na wɔn a wɔte asase ano nyinaa asuro no.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid sankuo dwom.

block_quote.content: Ma Onyankopɔn nsɔre na n’atamfo nhwete,
na ma wɔn a wɔkyiri no nnwane n’anim.
Sɛ wisie tu korɔ no, sɛ bɔ wɔn guo ara ne no;
sɛ akraa nane ogya ho no,
sɛ abɔnefoɔ bɛsɛe Nyankopɔn anim ne no.
Na teneneefoɔ deɛ, wɔn ani bɛgye,
wɔbɛdi Nyankopɔn anim ahurisie
na wɔn ho asane wɔn, anigyeɛ mu.
Monto Nyankopɔn dwom, monto dwom mma ne din,
montoto kwan yie mma deɛ ɔte adeɛ so nam ɛserɛ so reba,
ne din de AWURADE, na monni n’anim ahurisie.
Nwisiaa se ne akunafoɔ sɛnnifoɔ ne Onyankopɔn,
ne tenabea kronkron mu.
Onyankopɔn ma ɔhokwafoɔ nya mpɔn-ne-mma,
ɔtu apokyerɛfoɔ ma wɔbɛdi yie,
na mansotwefoɔ deɛ, wɔte nkyɛkyerɛ so.
