Onyankopɔn, wofirii adi dii wo man anim,
wofaa ɛserɛ pradada soɔ no,
asase wosoe, ɔsoro nso sosɔɔ nsuo
Nyankopɔn anim,
Sinai yi ara wosoe Onyankopɔn,
aane, Israel Nyankopɔn, anim.
Onyankopɔn, wotɔɔ adɔeɛ suo guu w’agyapadeɛ so,
na ɛtɔ piti a, wo na woma no yɛ yie.
W’asafo tenaa so;
Onyankopɔn, w’ayamyɛ mu wosiesie maa amanehunufoɔ.
AWURADE bɛka n’anomu asɛm,
mmaa a wɔka nkonim asɛmpa no asafo so.
Atamfoɔ dɔm ahemfo bɛdwanedwane,
na ɔbaa a ɔte fie no akyekyɛ asadeɛ mu.
Motete nnwammuo ntam a,
ɛte sɛ aburuburo ntaban a wɔde dwetɛ agu ho,
ne ne ntakra a sika fɛfɛ hran ho.
Otumfoɔ bɔ ahemfo gu asase no so a,
ɛhoa sɛ nsukyerɛmma Salmon so.
Basan mmepɔ yɛ Nyankopɔn mmepɔ,
Basan mmepɔ yɛ mmepɔ atentene.
Adɛn na mo mmepɔ atentene
mode ani bɔne hwɛ bepɔ a Onyankopɔn pɛ sɛ ɔtena soɔ no?
Ampa, AWURADE bɛtena so daa.
Nyankopɔn ko teaseɛnam yɛ mpempem bubuanwea,
AWURADE wɔ wɔn mu te sɛ Sinai kronkronbea no mu.
Woaforo kɔ soro,
woafa nnommumfoɔ nnommum,
woagye nnipa mu ayɛyɛdeɛ, mansotwefoɔ mu mpo,
na AWURADE Nyankopɔn atena hɔ.
Nhyira ne AWURADE
a ɔsoa yɛn adesoa ma yɛn daa daa,
ɔno Onyankopɔn no ne yɛn nkwagyeɛ.
Ɔno Onyankopɔn no ne yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
na AWURADE na owuo mu fire wɔ no.
Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn bɛpiepie n’atamfo ti,
ɔbɛpie deɛ wasi atimum
na ɔkyea n’afodie mu no ti.
Na AWURADE aka sɛ:
Mɛfa wɔn mafiri Basan maba bio,
mede wɔn bɛsane afiri po bunu mu aba,
na wode wo nan akeka mogya mu,
na w’akraman tɛkyerɛma anya atamfoɔ no ho biribi atafere.
Onyankopɔn, wɔhunu w’adi a worebɛfire,
me Nyankopɔn ne me hene adi a ɔrebɛfiri, kronkronbea hɔ.
Nnwontofoɔ di kan, asankubɔfoɔ di akyire
wɔ mmabaa a wɔka mpintin ntam.
Monhyira Onyankopɔn, mo asafo ahyiaeɛ mu,
mo a mofiri Israel abura mu, monhyira AWURADE.
Benyamin akumaa, wɔn sodifoɔ, wɔ hɔ,
Yuda atitire, wɔn asafohene ahodoɔ,
Sebulon atitire ne Naftali atitire wɔ hɔ.
Wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ de wo tumi ama wo,
Onyankopɔn, hyɛ deɛ woayɛ ama yɛn yi mu den.
W’asɔrefie a ɛwɔ Yerusalem nti,
ahemfo de ayɛyɛdeɛ bɛbrɛ wo.
Ka mmɛwa mu aboa ne anantwininikuo
ne anantwie mma a ɛyɛ aman no anim,
na wɔde dwetɛ mpɔ abɛsom.
Pansam aman a wɔpɛ akodie mu.
Akunini firi Misraim bɛba,
Etiopia bɛtene ne nsa ntɛm ama Onyankopɔn.
Asase so ahennie, monto Onyankopɔn dwom,
monto dwom mma AWURADE.
Monto mma deɛ ɔte tete soro mu soro.
Hwɛ, ɔma wɔte ne nne a ɛyɛ tumi nne.
Momfa tumi mma Onyankopɔn,
n’animuonyam kata Israel so,
na ne tumi wɔ wiem tɔnn.
Nyankopɔn, wo ho yɛ hu, wo tenabea kronkron mu,
Israel Nyankopɔn
de tumi ne ahoɔden ma ne man.
Nhyira ne Onyankopɔn.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Sosannim” sankuo nne so. Dawid deɛ.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, gye me nkwa,
na nsuo aduru me kra ho.
Matɔ amena kuronkuron atɛkyɛ
a gyinabea nni hɔ mu,
maduru ebunu
a nsuo bu kata me soɔ mu.
Me sufrɛ ama mabrɛ,
me mene mu awe,
mahwɛ me Nyankopɔn kwan
ama m’ani abu.
Wɔn a wɔtane me kwa dɔɔso
sene me tiri so nwi,
m’asɛefoɔ a wɔyɛ m’atamfoɔ atorofoɔ dɔɔso,
deɛ memfaeɛ no,
wɔse mennane memma.
Onyankopɔn, wonim me nkwaseasɛm,
na me mfomsoɔ nhunta wo.
AWURADE, asafo AWURADE Nyankopɔn,
mma wɔn a wɔtwɛn woɔ ani nnwu me ho,
Israel Nyankopɔn,
mma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ no anim nngu ase, me nti.
Na wo nti na magye ahohora,
na aniwuo ahyɛ m’ani so ma.
Madane me nuanom mu ɔhɔhoɔ,
mayɛ me na mma mu ɔnanani.
Na wo fie no ho dɔ ahyɛ me ma mmoroso,
na wɔn a wɔbɔ wo ahohora ahohorabɔ aba me so.
Na me kra suu mmuada mu,
na ɛdanee me ahohorabɔ.
Mede ayitoma meyɛɛ me ntoma
na mayɛ wɔn akasabebuo.
Wɔn a wɔtete kuro pono mu ka me ho asɛm,
na nsanomfoɔ de me to dwom.
Na me deɛ, mebɔ wo, AWURADE, mpaeɛ,
adom berɛ mu,
Onyankopɔn, w’adɔeɛ kɛseɛ nti,
fa wo nkwagyeɛ nokorɛ gye me so.
Yi me firi atɛkyɛ mu, na mammem,
ma wɔnyi me mfiri wɔn a wɔkyiri me nsam
ne abunu mu.
Mma asuo a ayire no mmfa me,
na mma ebunu mmmene me,
na mma amena nnka me nnhyɛ mu mmmua n’ano.
AWURADE, gye me so, na w’adɔeɛ yɛ,
dane w’ani kyerɛ me,
sɛdeɛ wo mmɔborɔhunu bebree no teɛ.
Na nyi w’ani nhunta w’akoa,
na me ho dwane me, gye me so ntɛm.
Twe bɛn me kra, na bɛgye no,
m’atamfoɔ nti gye me.
Wonim m’ahohora
ne m’aniwuo ne me nsopa,
w’ani tua m’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa.
Ahohora apɛkyɛ m’akoma, na abɔ me yadeɛ,
na mehwɛ deɛ ɔrebɛma me due kwan a, obi mma,
mehwehwɛ awerɛkyekyefoɔ a, menhunu bi.
Wɔde bɔnwoma yɛɛ m’aduane,
na me sukɔm mu wɔmaa me nsa kekakeka sɛ mennom.
Ma wɔn pono a ɛsi wɔn anim nnane sɛ apa,
na wɔdi yie a, ma no nyɛ afidie mma wɔn.
Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu,
na wɔanhunu adeɛ,
na ma wɔn sisi mpopo daa,
ma w’ani mmere wɔn so,
na w’awerɛhoɔ ne w’abufuo nka wɔn.
Ma wɔn tenabea nnane amamfo,
na obiara nntena wɔn ntomadan mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔtaa deɛ wo ara woabɔ no no,
na wɔka wɔn a woapira wɔn no yea kyerɛ.
Ma amumuyɛ mmɔ wɔn amumuyɛ so,
na mma wɔmmma wo tenenee mu.
Ma wɔnyi wɔn mfiri ateasefoɔ nwoma mu,
na mma wɔnntwerɛ wɔne ateneneefoɔ din mmmom.
Na me deɛ, meyɛ ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ɔwerɛhoni,
Onyankopɔn, ma wo nkwagyeɛ mma me so.
Mede dwontoɔ bɛyi Nyankopɔn din ayɛ,
na mede aseda makamfo no.
Na ɛbɛsɔ AWURADE ani yie
asene nantwinini a ɔwɔ mmɛn na ne tɔte mu apaeɛ.
Ahobrɛasefoɔ hunu a, wɔn ani bɛgye,
mo a mohwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan,
mo akoma nnya nkwa.
Na AWURADE tie ahiafoɔ,
na ɔnto ne nkurɔfoɔ nneduafoɔ ho mpe.
Ma ɔsoro ne asase nyi no ayɛ,
ɛpo ne deɛ ɛkeka ne ho wɔ mu nyinaa.
Na Onyankopɔn bɛgye Sion
na wakyekyere Yuda nkuro,
na wɔatena mu, na ayɛ wɔn dea.
Na ne nkoa asefoɔ bɛnya adi,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ ne din no atena mu.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid deɛ. Wɔde bɔ nkaeɛ.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm bɛgye me,
AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra ani nwu
na wɔn anim ngu ase,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne nsane wɔn akyi
na wɔnnane ahohorafoɔ.
Wɔn a wɔse “wiɛ, wiɛ” no,
ma wɔnsane wɔn akyi,
wɔn aniwuo akatua ho.
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ nyinaa nni ahurisie
na wɔn ani nnye wo ho,
na ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagyeɛ no nka daa sɛ:
Ma wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ.
Na me deɛ, meyɛ mmɔbɔ, na meyɛ ohiani.
Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm ma me.
Wone me boafoɔ ne me gyefoɔ,
AWURADE, ntwentwɛn wo nan ase.
Wo AWURADE na madwane mabɛtoa woɔ,
m’anim rengu ase da biara da.
Fa wo tenenee yi me, na gye me,
yɛ aso ma me, na gye me nkwa.
Yɛ sɛ ɔbotan a mɛtena so maba hɔ daa.
Woahyɛ sɛ wɔnnye me nkwa,
na wone me botan ne me ho fasuo.
Me Nyankopɔn, gye me firi ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam,
gye me omumuyɛfoɔ ne otirimuɔdenfoɔ nsam.
Na wo, AWURADE, ne m’anidasoɔ,
deɛ mefiri me mmɔfraase mede me ho metoo ne soɔ.
Wo na mefiri yafunum mede m’akyiri metweree woɔ,
woyii me firii me na yam,
wo na mɛyi wo ayɛ daa.
Mayɛ nnipa bebree ani so anwanwadeɛ,
na wone me dwanekɔhyɛbea a ɛyɛ den.
W’ayeyie ne w’anidie
bɛhyɛ m’anomu ma da mu nyinaa.
Nto me ntwene nkɔkoraaberɛ,
na sɛ m’ahoɔden sa a, nnya me.
Na m’atamfoɔ ka me ho asɛm,
na wɔn a wɔtɛ me kra bom tu agyina
ka sɛ: Onyankopɔn apa no;
monti no nkye no,
na obi nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye no.
Onyankopɔn, mma me ne wo ntam nnware,
me Nyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
Me kra ho asɛmpɛfoɔ ani bɛwu na wɔayera,
ahohora ne nsopa bɛkata wɔn a
wɔpɛ me bɔne so.
Na me deɛ, mɛtwɛn ara daa,
na mede bi maka w’ayeyie nyinaa ho.
M’ano bɛka wo tenenee,
ɛbɛka wo nkwagyeɛ da mu nyinaa
a mennim ano.
Mede AWURADE Nyankopɔn ahoɔdenneɛ bɛba abɛkae wo tenenee
a ɛyɛ wo nkutoo dea no.
Onyankopɔn, wo na wofiri me mmɔfraase kyerɛkyerɛɛ me,
na maka w’anwanwadeɛ no mabɛduru sɛsɛɛ.
Onyankopɔn, nkɔkoraaberɛ ne ɛdwono mu nso mpa me,
kɔsi sɛ mɛka wo tumi ho asɛm makyerɛ nkyirimma,
na maka wo mmaninyɛ makyerɛ wɔn a wɔbɛba nyinaa.
Na, Onyankopɔn,
wo tenenee kɔ sorosoro,
wo a woayɛ ade akɛseɛ,
Onyankopɔn, hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ?
Wo a woma yɛhunu amaneɛ bebree a ɛyɛ ya,
wobɛma yɛanya nkwa bio,
na woatwe yɛn
afiri asase akunu mu asane aba.
Wobɛma me kɛseyɛ adɔ,
na woadane w’ani akyekyere me werɛ.
Me nso mede bɛnta bɛyi wo ayɛ,
me Nyankopɔn, ne wo nokorɛ,
mede sankuten bɛto wo,
O Israel Hotefoɔ no, dwom.
Meto ayeyie dwom ma wo a,
m’ano ne me kra
a woagye no no ho bɛsane no.
Mede me tɛkyerɛma
nso bɛka wo tenenee ho asɛm daa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no ani awu,
na wɔn anim agu ase.
Onyankopɔn, fa w’atemmuo ma ɔhene,
ne wo tenenee ma ɔhene ba.
Ma no mfa tenenee nni wo man so,
na ɔmfa atemmuo nhwɛ w’amanehunufoɔ.
Mmepɔ bɛso asomdwoeɛ ama ɔman,
na nkokoɔ nso de tenenee aba.
Ɔbɛbu ɔman mu amanehunufoɔ atɛn,
na wagye ahiafoɔ mma nkwa,
na wabubu nhyɛsofoɔ mu pasapasa.
Owia ne ɔsrane da so wɔ hɔ yi,
wɔbɛsuro wo, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
Ɔbɛba sɛ osuo a ɛtɔ gu ɛserɛ a wɔahu soɔ so,
sɛ osu kɛseɛ a ɛtɔ dwodwo asase mu.
Ɔteneneeni bɛsi frɔmm ne berɛ so,
na asomdwoeɛ pii bɛba akɔduru sɛ ɔsrane nni hɔ bio.
Ɔbɛdi hene afiri po so akɔsi po so,
de afiri asubɔnten no so akɔsi asase ano.
Wɔn a wɔte serɛ so bɛkoto n’anim,
na n’atamfo atafere mfuturo.
Tarsis ne nsupɔ mu ahemfo
bɛba abɛyɛ ayɛ,
Saba ne Seba ahemfo bɛba abɛkyɛ adeɛ.
Na ahemfo nyinaa bɛkoto asɔre no,
amanaman nyinaa bɛsom no.
Na ɔbɛgye ohiani a ɔsu frɛ no,
ne ɔmanehunufoɔ a ɔnni boafoɔ.
Ɔbɛkora ɔbrɛfoɔ ne ohiani,
na wagye ahiafoɔ nkwa.
Ɔbɛgye wɔn afiri nhyɛsoɔ ne atirimuɔdensɛm mu,
na wɔn mogya boɔ ayɛ den n’anim.
Na ɔbɛnya nkwa,
na ɔde Seba sika no bi bɛma no,
na ɔno nso bɛbɔ mpaeɛ ama no daa,
ahyira no da mu nyinaa.
Asase no so aburoofuo bɛduru mmepɔ atifi,
ɛso aba bɛwoso
sɛ Lebanon,
na nkuro no asoa
sɛ asase so nwira.
Ne din bɛtena hɔ daa,
na owia wɔ hɔ yi ne din asi so,
na nnipa de no ahyira wɔn ho,
na amanaman nyinaa ahyira no.
Nhyira ne AWURADE Nyankopɔn,
Israel Nyankopɔn a ɔno nko yɛ anwanwadeɛ,
na nhyira ne n’animuonyam din daa,
na n’animuonyam nhyɛ asase nyinaa ma.
Amen ne Amen.
Yisai ba Dawid mpaebɔ asa.
Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn yɛ ma Israel,
ma wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ.
Na me deɛ, anka me nan reyɛ amane,
m’anammɔn reyɛ awatiri.
Na metwee ahokyerɛfoɔ ho ninkunu,
ɛfiri sɛ mehunuu abɔnefoɔ yie a wɔdie no.
Wɔnhunu owuo mu aninyanneɛ,
na wɔwɔ honam ne ahoɔden.
Ɔdasani haw deɛ, wɔnni bi,
nanso wɔnnwane wɔn ho sɛ nnipa binom.
Enti ahantan adi wɔn kɔn ho barehyia,
na akakabensɛm asi wɔn aduradeɛ.
Srade ama wɔn ani apupu,
wɔn akoma mu adwene firi bu so.
Wɔsi atwetwe na wɔde adwemmɔne ka amimdie asɛm,
wɔka akokurokosɛm.
Wɔma wɔn ano to ɔsoro,
na wɔn tɛkyerɛma nenam asase so.
Enti wɔn nkurɔfoɔ twe bɛdane wɔn,
na wɔnya nsuo kuruwa ma nom.
Na wɔse: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Onyankopɔn bɛhunu,
nimdeɛ wɔ ɔsorosoroni no tirim anaa?
Hwɛ, yeinom ne abɔnefoɔ,
nanso wɔn ho dwo wɔn daa, wɔama wɔn adeɛ adɔɔso.
Ampa ara, mate m’akoma ho kwa,
na mahohoro me nsa bemdie mu kwa,
nanso wɔaha me da mu nyinaa
na wɔatwe m’aso anɔpa biara.
Sɛ mese: Mɛka no sɛɛ deɛ a,
anka matwa wo mmasantene nkontompo.
Na mesusuu ho sɛ mɛhunu adeɛ yi,
ɛyɛɛ m’ani so den dodo,
kɔsii sɛ mekɔɔ Nyankopɔn kronkron mu hɔ na
mekɔhunuu deɛ akyire ɛkɔwiee wɔn.
Ampa ara, wode wɔn gyina deɛ ɛhɔ yɛ torɔ,
wode wɔn hwe fam bubu wɔn pasaa.
Hwɛ sɛ wɔadane sɛ amamfo seesei ara,
ehu ama wɔawie sa.
Sɛ daeɛ a wɔaso anyane,
na wo, AWURADE, wokanyane wo ho a,
woma ani pa wɔn sunsumban soɔ.
Sɛ ɛyɛ m’akoma awerɛho
na me sawa mu wowɔ me a,
anka meyɛ ɔkwasea a mennim de,
na mayɛ sɛ aboa, w’ani so.
Na me deɛ, mɛtena wo nkyɛn daa,
woasɔ me nsa nifa mu.
Wonam w’atirimpɔ so kyerɛkyerɛ me kwan,
na akyire yi no, woagye me akɔ animuonyam mu.
Hwan na mewɔ no ɔsoro?
Na sɛ wowɔ me a, menhwehwɛ asase so hwee.
Ma me honam ne m’akoma nwie sa,
Onyankopɔn ne m’akoma botan ne me kyɛfa daa.
Na hwɛ, wɔn a wɔfiri wo nkyɛn kɔ akyiri no bɛyera,
wobɛsɛe wɔn a wɔfiri wo nkyɛn kɔbɔ adwaman nyinaa.
Na me deɛ, Nyankopɔn nkyɛn tena yɛ ma me,
mede AWURADE Nyankopɔn mayɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea
na maka wo nnwuma nyinaa.
Onyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woasum yɛn agu koraa,
na w’abufuo rehye w’adidibea nnwan?
Kae w’asafo a wotɔɔ wɔn teteete,
woagye wɔn sɛ w’agyapadeɛ mantam no,
Sion bepɔ a wobɛtenaa soɔ no.
Ma wo nan so bɛhwɛ daa amamfo no,
ɔtamfoɔ asɛe kronkronbea hɔ ade nyinaa.
W’atamfo teateam w’ahyiaeɛ mu,
wɔasi wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ de ayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ.
Wɔyɛɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔma mmonnua so kɔ soro
de rebɛbu kwae mu nnupa,
na afei — ɛho nnwinneɛ nyinaa,
wɔde akuma ne asaeɛ abubu.
Wɔde ogya ato wo kronkronbea hɔ,
wɔagu deɛ wo din tenaeɛ no ho fi.
Wɔkae wɔn akoma mu sɛ:
Momma yɛmmia wɔn nkɔ fam prɛko.
Wɔahyehye Nyankopɔn ahyiaeɛ nyinaa asase so.
Yɛnhunu yɛn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ,
odiyifoɔ bi nni hɔ bio,
na yɛn mu biara nnim da ko a ɛbɛkɔ akɔsie.
Onyankopɔn, ɔhohiahiafoɔ nka ahohorasɛm nkɔsi da bɛn?
Ɔtamfoɔ ngu wo din ho fi daa anaa?
Adɛn nti na wotwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa?
Yi firi wo kokom, wie wɔn.
Nanso Onyankopɔn ne me hene firi teteete,
ɔyɛ ɔgyeɛ adwuma asase so.
Wo na wode w’ahoɔden paee po mu,
wobobɔɔ nsuo atweaseɛ ti, nsuo no ani.
Wopɛkyɛɛ dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn ti,
wode no yɛɛ ɛserɛ sofoɔ aduane.
Wo na woyii nsuo ani ne asubɔnten,
womaa asukɛseɛ a ɛsene daa wee.
Adekyeeɛ yɛ wo deɛ, anadwo nso wɔ wo,
wo na woasiesie akanea ne owia.
Wo na woatwa asase ano nyinaa hyeɛ,
wo na woyɛɛ ahuhuro ne awɔ berɛ.
Kae yei sɛ atamfoɔ bɔɔ AWURADE ahohora,
AWURADE, na ɔman agyegyentwie guu wo din ho fi.
Mfa w’anyankuku kra nhyɛ mmoa nsa,
mma wo werɛ mmfiri wo mmɔborɔfoɔ kra da.
Ma w’ani mmra apam no so,
na atirimuɔdensɛm tenabea ayeyɛ asase so nkokoam ma.
Mma deɛ wɔhyɛ no soɔ mmfa ahohora nnsane mmma,
ma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani nyi wo din ayɛ.
Onyankopɔn, sɔre, bɛdi wo ara w’asɛm,
kae sɛdeɛ nkwasea bɔ wo ahohora da mu nyinaa.
Mma wo werɛ mmfiri w’atamfo nne,
wɔn a wɔsɔre tia woɔ no gyegyeegye a ɛkɔ soro daa yi.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Asaf dwom.

block_quote.content: Onyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase da wo ase,
na wo din abɛn; wɔka w’anwanwadeɛ kyerɛ.
Mɛba berɛ a ɛsɛ mu,
na me ara mabɛbu atɛntenenee.
Asase ne wɔn a wɔte soɔ nyinaa mu hodwo a,
me na mede mu afadum mesisi hɔ.
Mese ahokyerɛfoɔ sɛ: Monnyɛ ahokyerɛ.
Na mese abɔnefoɔ sɛ: Mommma abɛn no so.
Mommma mo abɛn so nnkɔ soro,
monnto bamkɔn nnkasa.
Na ɛmfiri apueeɛ, na ɛmfiri atɔeɛ,
nanso ɛmfiri mmepɔ serɛ so,
na mmom Onyankopɔn na ɔbu atɛn,
ɔbɛbrɛ oyi ase, na wama oyi so.
Na kuruwa bi wɔ AWURADE nsam,
na emu bobesa ani firi ahuro,
mfrasa ayɛ mu ma, na ɔhwie bi; ampa ara,
aseɛ puo mpo, asase so abɔnefoɔ nyinaa bɛfefe anom.
Na me deɛ, mɛka ɛho asɛm daa,
mɛto Yakob Nyankopɔn ayeyie dwom,
na abɔnefoɔ mmɛn nyinaa, mɛbubu,
teneneefoɔ mmɛn na wɔbɛma soɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa asankuo nto. Asaf dwom.

block_quote.content: Yuda mu na wɔahunu Onyankopɔn,
ne din so Israel mu.
Ne sese si Salem,
na ne tenabea wɔ Sion.
Ɛhɔ na ɔbubuu tadua mu mmɛmma,
ɔkyɛm ne nkrantɛ ne ɔsa.
W’anim yɛ nyam,
na ɛhran sene asadeɛ mmepɔ no.
Wɔasɛe abrane akokoɔdurufoɔ no,
wɔatɔ nko da wɔn nna,
na ahoɔdenfoɔ no mu biara anhunu ne nsa.
Yakob Nyankopɔn, w’ateatea nti
na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ nyinaa adeda nnahɔɔ.
Wo na wo ho yɛ hu,
na sɛ wo bo refu a,
hwan na ɔbɛtumi agyina w’anim?
Wofiri soro maa wɔtee atemmuo,
asase suroe na ɛtɛm dinn,
berɛ a Onyankopɔn sɔre bɛbuu atɛn,
sɛ ɔbɛgye wɔn a wɔdwoɔ asase soɔ nyinaa no.
Na nnipa abufuhyeɛ dane wo ayeyie,
wode abufuhyeɛ a ɛboro soɔ bɔ abɔsoɔ.
Monhyɛ AWURADE, mo Nyankopɔn, bɔ, na momfa mma no.
Ma wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa
mfa ayɛyɛdeɛ mmrɛ deɛ ne ho yɛ hu no.
Ɔhu atumfoɔ home gu,
ne ho yɛ asase so ahemfo hu.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ Yedutun. Asaf dwom.

block_quote.content: Mɛma me nne so makyerɛ Onyankopɔn,
na masu mafrɛ no;
mɛma me nne so makyerɛ Onyankopɔn,
na ɔbɛyɛ aso ama me.
M’ahohia da mu na mehwehwɛɛ AWURADE,
me nsam atene anadwo nyinaa,
na ɛmpa aba, me kra po awerɛkyekyerɛ.
Mekae Onyankopɔn a, mesi apini,
medwene a, me honhom tɔ piti.
Wokura m’anisuatɛtɛ mu,
ɛpempem me, na mentumi menkasa.
Medwene tete nna no,
tete mmerɛ no mu mfeɛ.
Mekae m’anadwo dwom, medwene m’akomam,
na me honhom hwehwɛm pɛsɛpɛsɛ.
AWURADE bɛto atwene daa,
na ɔrennom bi bio anaa?
N’adɔeɛ awie mutwa koraa anaa?
N’asɛm a ɔkaeɛ no asa ama awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa anaa?
Onyankopɔn werɛ afiri adom,
anaasɛ ɔde abufuo atwe ne mmɔborɔhunu ato ne yam?
Ɛnna mese: Me dadwene a ɛda me soɔ ne sɛ,
ɔsorosoroni no nifa asakyera.
Mɛkae AWURADE nneyɛɛ maka,
aane, mɛkae wo tete anwanwadeɛ,
na masusu w’adwuma nyinaa ho,
na madwene wo nneyɛɛ ho.
Onyankopɔn, wo kwan wɔ kronkronyɛ mu,
hwan na ɔyɛ nyame kɛseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn?
Wone Onyankopɔn a woyɛ anwanwadeɛ,
woama wɔahunu wo tumi, aman mu.
Wode wo nsa na agye wo man,
Yakob ne Yosef mma no.
Asuasu hunuu wo, Onyankopɔn,
asuasu hunuu wo, na wɔbɔɔ binim,
abunu nso wosowosoe.
Amununkum tɔɔ osuo bibibibi,
ewiem tɔnn gyegyee,
w’agyan nso pepaa anyinam,
w’aprannaa boboom, ahum a ɛdi kyinhyia mu.
Anyinam hyerɛn wiase,
asase popoe na ɛwosoe.
Wo kwan faa ɛpo mu,
na wo tempɔn nsuo pii mu,
na wɔanhunu w’anammɔn.
Wonam Mose ne Aaron nsa so
bɛgyaa wo man sɛ nnwankuo.
Me man, monyɛ aso mma me nkyerɛkyerɛ,
monwɛn mo aso mma m’anomu nsɛm.
Mɛbue m’ano mmebuo mu,
mɛyi atetesɛm adi sɛ akasabebuo.
Deɛ yɛateɛ na wɔama yɛahunu
na yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn no,
yɛremfa nhunta wɔn mma,
yɛreka nkyirimma AWURADE ayeyisɛm,
ne ne tumidie, ne n’anwanwadeɛ a wayɛ no.
Ɔde adanseɛ tintim Yakob mu,
na ɔhyɛɛ mmara Israel mu,
ɛno na ɔde hyɛɛ yɛn agyanom
sɛ wɔmma wɔn mma nhunu,
na nkyirimma,
mma a wɔbɛwo wɔn no, ahunu,
na wɔsi so a, wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn mma,
sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ani nto Nyankopɔn so,
na wɔn werɛ mmfiri Nyankopɔn nneyɛɛ,
na wɔnni ne mmara nsɛm so.
Na wɔanyɛ sɛ wɔn agyanom,
mma asoɔdenfoɔ ne atuatefoɔ,
mma a wɔmfa wɔn akoma nsi tee,
na wɔn honhom nni Nyankopɔn nokorɛ.
Efraim mmabanin, taduakurafoɔ, bɛmmatofoɔ,
wɔdane wɔn ani ɔko da.
Wɔanni Nyankopɔn apam so,
na ne mmara nso, wɔampɛ sɛ wɔnante mu.
Na wɔn werɛ firii ne nneyɛɛ
ne n’anwanwadeɛ a ɔde kyerɛɛ wɔn no.
Ɔyɛɛ anwanwadeɛ wɔn agyanom anim,
Misraim asase so, Soan petee mu.
Ɔpaee ɛpo mu de wɔn twaa mu,
na ɔmaa nsuo gyinaa sɛ ekuo.
Ɔde mununkum gyaa wɔn awia,
na anadwo nyinaa ɔde ogya kanea nso gyaa wɔn.
Ɔpaee abotan mu ɛserɛ so,
na ɔmaa wɔnom sɛ asukɛseɛ.
Ɔmaa nsubɔntene firii ɔbotan mu bae,
na ɔmaa nsuo senee sɛ asutene.
Nanso wɔkɔɔ so ara yɛɛ no bɔne,
tee ɔsorosoroni no anim atua anwea pradada so.
Na wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe wɔn akoma mu,
bisaa no aduane sɛdeɛ wɔn kɔn dɔeɛ,
na wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn sɛ:
Onyankopɔn bɛtumi ato pono ɛserɛ so anaa?
Hwɛ, ɔbɔɔ ɔbotan ma nsuo tui,
na asubɔnten senee;
paanoo nso, ɔbɛtumi ama,
na wapɛ nam ama ne man anaa?
Enti AWURADE teeɛ no, ne bo fui,
na ogya sɔɔ Yakob mu,
na abufuo nso sɔre tiaa Israel,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔannye Onyankopɔn anni,
na wɔamfa wɔn ho anto ne nkwagyeɛ so.
Nanso ɔhyɛɛ ewiem tɔnn ɔsoro,
na ɔhinii ɔsoro apono,
na ɔtɔɔ mana guu wɔn so sɛ wɔnni,
na ɔde ɔsoro aduane maa wɔn.
Atumfoɔ aduane na onipa diiɛ,
ɔmaa wɔn aduane di mee.
Ɔmaa apueeɛ mframa bɔe ɔsoro,
na ɔde ne tumi twee anafoɔ mframa bae,
na ɔtɔɔ nam guu wɔn so sɛ mfuturo,
ne ntakraboa sɛ mpoano anwea.
Na ɔmaa wɔtotɔɔ wɔn nsraban mu
de twaa wɔn tenabea ho hyiae.
Na wɔdi mee boroo so,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔmaa wɔn wɔn akɔnnɔdeɛ.
Wɔnnya nnyaee wɔn akɔnnɔ no,
wɔn aduane da so wɔ wɔn anomu no,
Nyankopɔn abufuo sɔre tiaa wɔn,
na ɔkunkumm wɔn mu abrane no mu bi,
na ɔde Israel mmeranteɛ hwehwee fam.
Yei nyinaa mu na wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne,
na wɔannye n’anwanwadeɛ no anni.
Enti ɔmaa wɔn nna yeraa sɛ ahuro,
ne wɔn mfeɛ ehu mu.
Ɔreku wɔn no, na wɔhwehwɛɛ no,
na wɔsane bɛpɛɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan ntɛm,
na wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn ne wɔn botan,
na ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn ne wɔn gyefoɔ.
Wɔde wɔn ano dɛfɛdɛfɛɛ no,
na wɔde wɔn tɛkyerɛma dii atorɔ kyerɛɛ no,
na wɔn akoma deɛ, ɛntim ne ho,
na wɔanni n’apam mu nokorɛ.
Na ɔno deɛ, ɔyɛ ntimmɔborɔ nti,
ɔkataa wɔn amumuyɛ so,
na wansɛe nnipa;
na ɔtaa sianka n’abufuo,
na wanhwanyan n’awerɛhoɔ nyinaa.
Na ɔkaee sɛ wɔyɛ ɔhonam,
mframa a ɛkorɔ na ɛnsane n’akyiri bio.
Mprɛ ahe ara na wɔante n’anim atua ɛserɛ soɔ,
na wɔanho ne werɛ anwea pradada soɔ!
Na wɔsane sɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe,
na wɔyii Israel Kronkronni no ahi.
Wɔankae ne tumi,
da a ɔyii wɔn firii ɔhohiahiafoɔ nsam,
na ɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ Misraim
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, Soan petee mu no.
Ɔdanee wɔn nsubɔntene mogya,
na wɔantumi annom wɔn nsuwansuwa.
Ɔsomaa ahuriiɛ bɛguu wɔn so maa wɔbɛwee wɔn,
ne mponkyerɛne maa wɔbɛsɛee wɔn.
Ɔde wɔn nnɔbaeɛ maa mmɛbɛ,
na ɔde wɔn adwumadeɛ maa ntutummɛ.
Ɔde asukɔtweaa sɛee wɔn bobe,
na ɔde nsukyenkyeneeɛ bɔɔ wɔn akyee nnua,
na ɔyii wɔn afieboa maa asukɔtweaa,
ne wɔn mmoakuo maa asraman.
Ɔtoo n’abufuo hyehyeɛ no guu wɔn so,
anibereɛ, ahi ne ahohia,
abɔfoɔ bɔne a ɔsomaa wɔn baa wɔn soɔ no.
Ɔbɔɔ kwan maa n’abufuo,
wankora wɔn kra amfiri owuo mu,
na ɔyii wɔn nkwa maa owuyadeɛ.
Na ɔkumm Misraim mmakan nyinaa,
wɔn ahoɔden asefire, Ham ntomadan mu.
Na ɔgyaa ne man sɛ nnwan,
na ɔkaa wɔn sɛ mmoakuo, ɛserɛ so,
na ɔgyaa wɔn dwoodwoo kɔe na wɔansuro,
na wɔn atamfoɔ deɛ, ɛpo no kataa wɔn so.
Na ɔde wɔn baa ne kronkronbea hyeɛ so,
bepɔ a ne nsa nifa gyeeɛ no so.
Ɔpampamm amanaman, wɔn anim,
na ɔtwee wɔn awunnyadeɛ so ntonto kyɛɛ no homa so,
na ɔmaa Israel mmusuakuo tenatenaa wɔn ntomadan mu.
Nanso wɔsɔɔ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn hwɛe tee no atua,
na n’adansesɛm no, wɔanni so.
Na wɔwae twaa nkontompo sɛ wɔn agyanom,
wɔmanee sɛ tadua daadaafoɔ.
Wɔde wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea huruu ne bo,
na wɔde wɔn ahoni maa no twee ninkunu.
Onyankopɔn tee, na ne bo fui,
na Israel ho yɛɛ no nwunu koraa.
Na ɔgyaa Silo tenabea no,
ntomadan a ɔsii nnipa mu no.
Ɔde n’ahoɔden hyɛɛ nnommumfa mu,
na ɔde n’animuonyam hyɛɛ ɔtamfoɔ nsa.
Ɔgyaa ne man maa nkrantɛ,
na ne bo fuu n’agyapadeɛ.
Ogya hyee wɔn mmeranteɛ,
na wɔn mmabaa nso, wɔanto wɔn ayeforɔ dwom.
Wɔn asɔfoɔ totɔɔ nkrantɛ ano,
na wɔn akunafoɔ annya asuyɛ.
Na AWURADE nyanee sɛ obi a ɔfiri nna mu,
sɛ ɔkatakyie a nsa ma no huro,
na ɔbobɔɔ n’atamfo maa wɔsanee wɔn akyi,
ɔbɔɔ wɔn daa adapaa.
Nso wampɛ Yosef ntomadan no,
na Efraim abusuakuo no, wamfa;
na mmom ɔfaa Yuda abusuakuo,
Sion bepɔ a wadɔ no no.
Na ɔsii ne kronkronbea sɛ ɔsoro
sɛ asase a ɔde atim hɔ daa no.
Na ɔyii n’akoa Dawid,
na ɔfaa no firii nnwammuo mu.
Ɔmaa no firii nnwammereɛ a wɔma nufoɔ akyiridie bae,
sɛ ɔmmɛyɛne ne man Yakob
ne n’agyapadeɛ Israel.
Na ɔyɛnee wɔn akoma mudie so,
na ɔde ne nsam nimdeɛ kyerɛɛ wɔn kwan.
Onyankopɔn, amanaman aba w’agyapadeɛ mu,
wɔagu w’asɔrefie kronkron ho fi,
wɔama Yerusalem ayɛ agoago.
Wɔde wo nkoa amu
ama ewiem nnomaa adi,
wɔde w’ahotefoɔ nam ama asase so mmoa.
Wɔahwie wɔn mogya agu sɛ nsuo
de atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia,
na deɛ ɔsie wɔn nni hɔ.
Yɛayɛ ahohora ama wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho,
fɛdie ne ahiyie ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia.
Ɛnkɔsi da bɛn, AWURADE, na wo bo bɛfu daa,
na wo ninkuntwe adɛre sɛ ogya?
Hwie w’abufuo gu amanaman
a wɔnni woɔ
ne ahennie
a wɔmmɔ wo din no so,
na wɔamene Yakob,
na wɔahye ne tenabea ase.
Nkae akanefoɔ amumuyɛ mfa ngu yɛn so,
yɛ ntɛm ma w’ayamhyehyeɛ mmɛhyia yɛn,
na wɔabrɛ yɛn ase fɔmm.
Di boa yɛn, yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
wo din animuonyam nti na yi yɛn,
na wo din nti kata yɛn bɔne so.
Adɛn nti na amanaman nka sɛ:
Wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
Ma wɔnhunu amanaman mu, yɛn anim,
sɛ wotɔ wo nkoa mogya a wɔka guiɛ no so were.
Ma ɔpokyerɛni apinisie nnuru w’anim,
sɛ wo nsa kɛseyɛ teɛ no, kora owuo mma.
Na ahohora a wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho de abɔ wo, AWURADE, no,
dane no mprɛnson gu wɔn kokom.
Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo man ne w’adidibea nnwan no,
yɛbɛda wo ase daa,
yɛbɛka w’ayeyie akyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Sonannim Edut” sankuo nne so. Asaf adansedie. Dwom.

block_quote.content: Israel dwanhwɛfoɔ, yɛ aso,
wo a woka Yosef sɛ nnwankuo,
wo a wote Kerubim soɔ, pue hran.
Efraim ne Benyamin ne Manase anim
na ma wo homene soɔ,
na bra bɛgye yɛn.
Onyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, wo bo bɛfu
atia wo man mpaebɔ akɔsi da bɛn?
Wode nisuo yɛɛ aduane maa wɔdii,
na wode nisuo maa wɔnomee.
Wode yɛn yɛɛ ntɔkwa maa wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho,
na yɛn atamfoɔ sereseree wɔ wɔn mu.
Asafo Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
Wotuu obobe firii Misraim bae,
wotutuu amanaman na wobɛtɛe.
Woyii n’anim kwan, na ɛgyee nhini,
na ɛyɛɛ asase ma.
Ne nwunu kataa mmepɔ so,
na ne nhoma kataa Nyankopɔn tweneduro so.
Ɛbaebaee ne mman mu kɔduruu ɛpo ho,
na n’abasa frɔmfrɔm kɔɔ asubɔnten no ho.
Adɛn nti na woabubu ne ban,
ma wɔn a wɔnam kwan soɔ nyinaa tete no yi?
Kwaeɛm kɔkɔte sɛe no,
na petee mu mmoa we.
Asafo Nyankopɔn, sane w’akyiri ɛ!
Brɛ w’ani ase firi soro hwɛ,
na bɛhwɛ obobe yi,
na bɛwowa deɛ wo nifa tɛeɛ no,
ne ɔba a woafa no ayɛ wo deɛ no pintinn.
Wɔde ogya ahye no, wɔatwitwa no,
w’anim ateatea nti wɔresɛe.
Fa wo nsa kata wo nifa nipa no so,
onipa ba a woafa no ayɛ wo deɛ pintinn no so,
na yɛrentwe mfiri wo nkyɛn.
Ma yɛnnya nkwa, na yɛmmɔ wo din.
AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no Gatfoɔ sankuo nne so. Asaf deɛ.

block_quote.content: Mommɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn, yɛn ahoɔden,
monhuro mma Yakob Nyankopɔn.
Monto dwom na monyan mpintin,
mommɔ sanku dɛdɛ ne bɛnta.
Monhyɛne totorobɛnto ɔsrane foforɔ so,
ɔsrane korokumatwa mu, mma yɛn afahyɛ da.
Na ɛne sɛnnahɔ ma Israel,
atorɔmudeɛ ma Yakob Nyankopɔn.
Ɔde adi adanseɛ, Yosef mu,
ɛberɛ a ɔfirii adi faa Misraim asase soɔ,
metee obi a menni no kasa.
Meyii ne mmatiri firii adesoa ase,
ne ne nsa firii kɛntɛn ho;
wofrɛɛ ahohia mu, na meyii wo wɔ mu,
mefiri aprannaa mu megyee wo so.
Mesɔɔ wo mehwɛɛ Meriba asuo ho.
Me man, tie, na menni wo adanseɛ,
O Israel, sɛ wobɛtie me a!
Mma onyame nanani bi nntena wo mu,
na nsɔre onyame nanani biara.
Me ara mene AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn
a meyii wo Misraim asase so mebaeɛ no,
trɛ wo anomu tɛtrɛɛ na menhyɛ no ma.
Nanso me man antie me nne,
na Israel ampene me.
Na megyaa wɔn wɔn akoma denyɛ mu,
maa wɔnantee wɔn ara tirim agyina a wɔtuiɛ mu.
Ao, sɛ me man tie me ɛ,
sɛ Israel nante m’akwan so ɛ!
Anka ɛrenkyɛ na mabrɛ wɔn atamfoɔ ase,
na madane me nsa matia wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ.
Anka AWURADE atamfoɔ bɛbrɛ wɔn ho ase ama no,
na wɔn berɛ akyɛre akɔsi daa.
Na ɔde ayuo mu ayuo pa bɛyɛne wɔn,
na mede abotan mu woɔ bɛma woamee.
Onyankopɔn gyina Nyankopɔn asafo mu,
ɔbu atɛn anyame ntam.
Da bɛn na mobɛbu ntɛnkyea,
na moahwɛ abɔnefoɔ anim akɔsie?
Monni ɔbrɛfoɔ ne awisiaa asɛm,
monni asɛntenenee mma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne mmɔborɔni.
Monnye ɔbrɛfoɔ ne ohiani,
monhwim wɔn mfiri abɔnefoɔ nsam.
Wɔnnim de, na wɔnte aseɛ,
esum mu na wɔnante korɔ,
asase nnyinasoɔ nyinaa rewoso.
Me deɛ, maka sɛ: Moyɛ anyame,
na mo nyinaa yɛ ɔsorosoroni no mma,
nanso mobɛwuwu sɛ nnipa pɛ,
na moatotɔ sɛ ahemfo mu biara.
Ao! Onyankopɔn, sɔre ɛ, bu asase atɛn,
na wo na wobɛdi adeɛ, amanaman nyinaa mu.
Onyankopɔn, nyɛ komm,
mmua w’ano, na nhome, Onyankopɔn.
Na hwɛ, w’atamfo yɛ gyegyeegye,
na wɔn a wɔkyiri woɔ ama wɔn tiri so.
Wo man tiri so na wɔrepam anyansapam,
na wɔkɔ wɔn a wɔahunta no tiri so agyina.
Wɔka sɛ: Mommra mma yɛnku wɔn ase mfiri ɔman no mu,
na wɔankae Israel din bio.
Na wɔde akoma korɔ tu agyina,
wo tiri so na wɔpam.
Edom ntomadan ne Ismaelfoɔ,
Moab ne Hagarfoɔ,
Gebal ne Amon ne Amalek,
Filistifoɔ asase ne wɔn a wɔte Tiro.
Asiria nso de ne ho bataa wɔn ho,
wɔaboa Lot mma.
Yɛ wɔn sɛ Midian, sɛ Sisera,
sɛ Yabin, Kison subɔn mu.
Wɔsɛee wɔ Endor,
na wɔyɛɛ sɛ nwira dodoɔ maa asase.
Yɛ wɔn ne wɔn adehyeɛ sɛ Oreb ne Seeb,
na yɛ wɔn ahemfo nyinaa sɛ Sebah ne Salmuna,
wɔn a wɔka sɛ:
Momma yɛmfa Nyankopɔn afie nni, no.
Me Nyankopɔn, yɛ wɔn sɛ ahum a ɛdi kyinhyia,
sɛ mframa anim ntɛtɛ.
Sɛ ogya a ɛhye kwaeɛ
na ogyaframa tafere mmepɔ ho no,
saa ara na fa w’ahum taa wɔn,
na fa wo mframa denden no yi wɔn hu.
AWURADE, ma wɔn ani nwu,
na wɔmmisa wo din akyiri kwan.
Ma wɔn anim ngu ase na wɔmmɔ twi daa,
na wɔmmɔ adapaa na wɔnyera,
na wɔnhunu sɛ
wo a wo din de AWURADE no,
wo nko ara ne ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no Gatfoɔ sankuo nne so. Kora mma dwom.

block_quote.content: Sɛdeɛ wo tenabea hɔnom si yɛ fɛ,
asafo AWURADE.
Me kra ani gyina, ɛtɔ piti mpo,
AWURADE adihɔ no nti,
m’akoma ne me honam di ahurisie
ma Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ.
Nso apatuprɛ anya ɛdan,
na asomfenakatakyi anya ebuo
a ɔbɛto ne mma agu mu,
ɛne w’afɔrebukyia no, asafo AWURADE,
me Hene ne me Nyankopɔn.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔte wo fie,
wɔbɛkɔ so ayi wo ayɛ.
Nhyira ne onipa a n’ahoɔden wɔ wo mu,
na Sion atempɔn no wɔ n’akomam.
Wɔtwam nisuo bɔn no mu a,
wɔdanedane no deɛ mmasuo wɔ,
bereamporɔsuo nso de nhyira pii kata so.
Wɔnante firi ahoɔden mu kɔ ahoɔden mu
bɛpue Nyankopɔn anim, Sion.
AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso, Yakob Nyankopɔn!
Yɛn kyɛm, Onyankopɔn, hwɛ,
na hwɛ deɛ woasra no no anim.
Na wo fie dakorodie yɛ
sene nna apem.
Mepɛ me Nyankopɔn fie nammɔnnampan mu tena mmom
sene sɛ mɛtena abɔnefoɔ ntomadan mu.
Na owia ne kyɛm ne AWURADE Nyankopɔn.
AWURADE ma adom ne animuonyam,
ɔmfa papa nkame
wɔn a wɔnam tee no.
Asafo AWURADE, nhyira ne onipa
a ɔde ne ho to wo soɔ.

fragment.content: Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom.

block_quote.content: AWURADE, woadom w’asase,
wode Yakob agyapadeɛ asane aba,
wode wo man mfomsoɔ akyɛ,
woakata wɔn bɔne nyinaa so.
Woatwe w’anibereɛ nyinaa,
woadane afiri w’abufuo hyehyeɛ no mu.
Yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na twa wo bo a ɛfu yɛn no to wo yam.
Wo werɛ bɛho atia yɛn akɔsi daa anaa?
Wobɛtwe w’abufuo mu akɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ mu?
Worensane mma yɛn nkwa,
na wo man ani nnye wo ho?
AWURADE, ma yɛnhunu w’adɔeɛ,
na fa wo nkwagyeɛ ma yɛn.
Mɛtie deɛ Onyankopɔn AWURADE bɛka.
Ampa, ɔka asomdwoeɛsɛm kyerɛ ne man ne n’ahotefoɔ,
na mma wɔnnsane nnkɔ nkwaseadeɛ mu.
Ampa ara, ne nkwagyeɛ bɛn wɔn a wɔsuro no,
na animuonyam atena yɛn asase so.
Adom ne nokorɛ bɛhyia,
na tenenee ne asomdwoeɛ adi mfeano.
Nokorɛ bɛfifiri asase so,
na tenenee afiri soro ahwɛ.
Nso AWURADE bɛma papa,
na yɛn asase bɛma ne nnɔbaeɛ.
Tenenee bɛdi n’anim,
na asi n’anammɔn kwan so.
AWURADE, brɛ w’aso ase tie me,
na meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani.
Hwɛ me kra so, na meyɛ ɔhotefoɔ;
wo, me Nyankopɔn, gye w’abɔfra
a ɔde ne ho twere woɔ.
O AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na wo na mesu mefrɛ wo da mu nyinaa.
Ma w’akoa kra ani nnye,
na wo, AWURADE, na mema me kra so mema.
Na wo, AWURADE, woyɛ, na wode kyɛ,
na w’adɔeɛ dɔɔso ma wɔn a wɔfrɛ woɔ nyinaa.
AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ,
na tie me nkotosrɛ nne.
M’ahohia da mu mɛfrɛ wo,
na wobɛgye me so.
Obiara nte sɛ wo, anyame mu, AWURADE,
na biribiara nte sɛ wo nnwuma.
Amanaman a woyɛeɛ nyinaa bɛba
abɛkoto w’anim, AWURADE,
na wɔabɛhyɛ wo din animuonyam.
Na woyɛ kɛseɛ, na woyɛ anwanwadeɛ,
wo nkutoo ne Onyankopɔn.
AWURADE, kyerɛ me wo kwan,
mɛnante wo nokorɛ mu;
ka m’akoma bom ma no nsuro wo din.
O AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mede m’akoma nyinaa bɛda wo ase,
na mahyɛ wo din animuonyam daa,
sɛ w’adɔeɛ so wɔ me soɔ,
na woayi me kra afiri Asamando bunu mu.
Onyankopɔn, ahantanfoɔ asɔre atia me,
na atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo rehwehwɛ me kra,
na wɔamfa wo ansi wɔn ani so.
Na wo, AWURADE, woyɛ Onyankopɔn mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne ɔdomfoɔ,
wo boasetɔ kyɛ, na w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ dɔɔso.
Dane w’ani kyerɛ me, na dom me,
fa w’ahoɔden ma w’akoa,
na gye w’afenaa ba nkwa.
Yɛ me ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ma no nsi me yie,
na m’atamfoɔ nhunu, na wɔn ani nwu,
sɛ wo, AWURADE, woaboa me akyekyere me werɛ.
AWURADE kuro a ɔkyekyereeɛ wɔ mmepɔ kronkron so.
AWURADE dɔ Sion apono sene Yakob tenabea nyinaa.
Wɔka wo ho animuonyamsɛm,
Nyankopɔn kuro.
Sɛ mebɔ Misraimfoɔ, Babelfoɔ, Filistifoɔ, Tirofoɔ ne Etiopiafoɔ
din wɔ wɔn a wɔni me mu mpo a,
yeinom wɔwoo wɔn hɔ ara.
Na Sion ho deɛ, wɔbɛka sɛ:
Wɔwoo wɔn nyinaa mmaako mmaako wɔ ne mu,
na ɔno na ɔma n’ase tim, ɔsorosoroni no.
Sɛ AWURADE twerɛ aman din a, ɔbɛka sɛ:
Oyi, wɔwoo no hɔnom.
Na nnwontofoɔ ne asafoɔ bɛka sɛ:
Me mmasuo nyinaa wɔ wo mu.

fragment.content: Kora mma dwom a wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Mahalat Leannot” sankuo nne so. Esrahini Heman nnweneho dwom.

block_quote.content: AWURADE, me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
mesu mefrɛ, w’anim, awia ne anadwo,
ma me mpaebɔ nnuru w’anim,
na brɛ w’aso ase ma me nteamu.
Na nnebɔne afono me kra,
na me kra rebɛn Asamando.
Wɔkane me fra wɔn a wɔkɔ Amena mu mu,
mayɛ sɛ ɔbarima a ɔnni mmoa biara.
Wɔato me atwene awufoɔ mu
sɛ atɔfoɔ a wɔde wɔn agu ɛda mu
a wonkae wɔn bio,
na wɔatwa wɔn afiri wo nsam.
Wode me ato Amena donkodonko mu,
esum mu, ebunu ase tɔnn.
W’abufuhyeɛ hyɛ me so,
na woma w’asorɔkyeɛ nyinaa gu me so.
Woayi m’amannifoɔ
afiri me nkyɛn kɔ akyirikyiri,
wode me ayɛ wɔn akyiwadeɛ,
woato me mu a meremfiri adie.
Amaneɛ ama m’ani akusa,
mefrɛ wo, AWURADE, da mu nyinaa,
metrɛ me nsam mekyerɛ wo.
Wobɛyɛ anwanwadeɛ akyerɛ awufoɔ,
anaasɛ nsamanfoɔ bɛsɔre ayi wo ayɛ?
Wɔbɛka w’adɔeɛ ɛda mu
anaa wo nokorɛdie ɔsɛeɛ amena mu?
Wɔbɛhunu w’anwanwadeɛ, esum mu,
ne wo tenenee awerɛfire asase so?
Na me deɛ, wo, AWURADE, na mesu mefrɛ,
na me mpaebɔ tua wo nhema.
AWURADE, adɛn na woto me kra twene,
adɛn nti na wode w’anim hunta me?
Meyɛ mmɔborɔni, na mereyɛ mawu firi me mmɔfraase,
wo ho hu akuta me, na metɔ ntintan.
W’abufuo abu afa me so,
wo ho hu atware me;
atwa me ho ahyia te sɛ nsuo da mu nyinaa,
ɛbom twa me ho kanko.
Woayi ɔdɔfo ne adamfo afiri me nkyɛn kɔ akyirikyiri,
na me manni kɔ sum mu.
Mɛto AWURADE adɔeɛ ho dwom daa,
mede m’ano bɛka wo nokorɛdie makyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ;
na mɛka sɛ: Adɔeɛ bɛsi so daa,
ɔsoro hɔ na wode nokorɛdie atintim.
Me ne deɛ mayi no no apam apam bi,
maka ntam makyerɛ m’akoa Dawid:
Mɛma w’asefoɔ atim akɔsi daa,
na mama w’ahennwa asi so akɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ so.
Na ɔsoro yi wo, AWURADE, anwanwadeɛ ayɛ,
ne wo nokorɛ nso wɔ akronkronfoɔ asafo mu.
Na hwan na ɔwɔ wiem a wɔde no bɛto AWURADE ho,
hwan na ɔsɛ AWURADE, anyame mma mu?
Onyankopɔn a ne ho yɛ hu, akronkronfoɔ dwabɔ kɛseɛ no mu,
na wɔsuro no sene wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa.
AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn,
hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ?
Otumfoɔ AWURADE, wo nokorɛdie atwa wo ho ahyia.
Wo na wodi ɛpo mfumpaabuo soɔ,
sɛ n’asorɔkyeɛ sɔre a, wo na wodwodwo ano.
Wo na woabubu Rahab pasaa sɛ ɔtɔfoɔ,
wode wo tumi nsa abɔ w’atamfo apansam.
Ɔsoro wɔ wo, asase nso wɔ wo;
wiase ne ne mayɛ, wo na wohyɛɛ aseɛ.
Atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam, wo ara na wobɔeɛ,
Tabor ne Hermon di wo din mu ahurisie.
Tumi basa ne mmarimayɛ wɔ wo,
wo nsa yɛ den, wɔama wo nifa so.
Tenenee ne atemmuo ne w’ahennwa nnyinasoɔ,
adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ gyina w’anim.
Nhyira ne ɔman a wɔnim osebɔ
na wɔnante wo, AWURADE, anim hann mu.
Wo din mu na wɔn ho bɛsɛpɛ wɔn daa nyinaa,
na wo tenenee mu na wɔama wɔn soɔ.
Na wɔn ahoɔden ahyehyɛdeɛ ne wo,
na w’adom mu na wɔama yɛn abɛn soɔ.
Na AWURADE na yɛn kyɛm wɔ no,
na Israel Kronkronni no na yɛn hene wɔ no.
Da bi wokasaa anisoadehunu mu
kyerɛɛ w’ahotefoɔ sɛ:
Madi maboa ɔbarima bi,
mama obi a wɔayi no firi ɔman no mu so.
Mahunu m’akoa Dawid,
mede me ngo kronkron masra no.
Ɔno na me nsa bɛma no atim,
na me basa nso ahyɛ no den.
Ɔtamfoɔ bi rensisi no,
na obusuyɛfoɔ bi renhyɛ no so.
Na mɛbubu n’anim ahohiahiafoɔ,
na mabobɔ wɔn a wɔtane no.
Na me nokorɛdie ne m’adɔeɛ ne no bɛtena,
na me din mu na wɔbɛma n’abɛn soɔ.
Na mede ne nsa bɛsi po mu,
na mede ne nifa masi nsubɔntene so.
Ɔno deɛ, ɔbɛfrɛ me sɛ: Wone m’agya,
me Nyankopɔn ne me nkwagyeɛ botan!
Na me nso mede no bɛyɛ m’abakan,
asase so ahemfo mu pumpuni.
Mɛkora m’adɔeɛ mama no daa,
na m’apam atim hɔ ama no.
Mɛma n’asefoɔ atena hɔ daa,
ne n’ahennwa sɛ ɔsoro nna.
Sɛ ne mma gya me mmara
na wɔnnante m’atemmudeɛ mu,
sɛ wɔgu m’ahyɛdeɛ ho fi
na wɔnni me mmaransɛm so a,
ɛno deɛ mede abaa bɛba abɛtwe wɔn aso, wɔn mmarato ho,
na mede ɔhaw ahodoɔ mabɛtwe wɔn aso, wɔn amumuyɛ ho.
Na m’adɔeɛ deɛ, merenyi memfiri ne ho,
na merenyɛ me nokorɛdie no ho nsakyirinsayam.
Merengu m’apam ho fi,
na merensakyera deɛ afiri m’anomu no.
Maka me kronkronyɛ ho ntam baako,
merenni Dawid hwammɔ.
N’asefoɔ bɛtena hɔ daa,
na n’adwa ayɛ m’anim sɛ owia.
Ɛbɛtim hɔ sɛ ɔsrane daa,
sɛ ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ a ɔwɔ wiem.
Na wo ara deɛ, woato atwene na ayɛ wo nwunu,
na woafa deɛ woasra no no abufuo.
Woapo w’akoa apam,
woagu n’abotire ho fi de ato fam.
Woadwiri ne ban nyinaa agu,
woama n’aban akɛseɛ ayɛ agoago.
Wɔn a wɔtwam ɔkwan no soɔ nyinaa fom no fa,
wayɛ ahohora ama wɔn a wɔtete ne ho.
Woama n’ahohiahiafoɔ nifa so,
woama n’atamfo nyinaa ani agye.
Aane, woadane n’afena ano nso,
na woamma no annyina ɔsa mu.
Woama n’animuonyam apa,
na woato n’adwa atwene fam.
Woatwa ne mmeranteberɛ nna so,
wode aniwuo abum ne so.
Ɛnkɔsi da bɛn, AWURADE, na wode wo ho bɛhunta daa
ama w’abufuo adɛre sɛ ogya?
Kae me nna tiaa a ɛyɛ:
Ade hunu yi ara nti na wobɔɔ nnipa mma nyinaa?
Ɔdasani bɛn na ɔte ase a ɔrenhunu owuo,
na ɔbɛyi ne kra afiri Asamando nsam?
Ɛhe na wo kane adɔeɛ no wɔ, AWURADE,
deɛ wokaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Dawid, wo nokorɛ mu no?
AWURADE, kae wo nkoa ahohora
a ɛfiri aman dodoɔ no nyinaa mu a ɛda me koko soɔ.
AWURADE, w’atamfo bɔ ahohora,
wɔbɔ deɛ woasra no no anammɔn ahohora!
Nhyira nka AWURADE daa.
Amen ne Amen.
AWURADE, wo na woayɛ yɛn dwanekɔbea,
awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
Wo deɛ, wɔnnya mmɔɔ mmepɔ
na wonnya nyii asase ne wiase adie no,
na wofiri tete akyirikyiri kɔsi daakye akyirikyiri yɛ Onyankopɔn.
Woma ɔdasani dane mfuturo, na wose:
Onipa mma, monsane mmra mo mfuturo mu.
Na mfirinhyia apem yɛ w’ani so
sɛ nnora da a ɛtwaa mu
ne anadwo mu dasuo.
Woma wɔsene kɔ sɛ susuansuo,
wɔte sɛ daeɛ, anɔpa wɔfefɛ sɛ wira,
anɔpa ɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm, na ɛfefɛ,
anwummerɛ wɔtwa, na atwintwam.
Na yɛresa w’abufuo mu,
na yɛahye w’abufuhyeɛ no ano.
Wode yɛn amumuyɛ asi w’anim,
wode yɛn kokoam bɔne aba w’anim hann no mu.
Na yɛn nna nyinaa atwam kɔ w’abufuo mu,
yɛahwere yɛn mfeɛ sɛ asomusɛm bi.
Yɛn mfirinhyiam nna, emu wɔ mfeɛ aduɔson,
na sɛ ɛboro so a, na ɛreduru aduɔwɔtwe,
na emu ahohoahoadeɛ yɛ ɔbrɛ ne ahuhudeɛ,
na ɛtwaa mu ntɛm so, na yɛtu kɔe.
Hwan na ɔhunu w’abufuo ano den a ɛyɛ,
ne w’anibereɛ, sɛ wo ho suro teɛ?
Ma yɛnhunu yɛn nna kan sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ,
na yɛanya nyansa akoma.
AWURADE, sane w’akyi, da bɛn ara?
Na ma wo nkoa nyɛ wo mmɔbɔ.
Fa w’adɔeɛ ma yɛmmee nhema,
na yɛadi ahurisie, na yɛn ani agye yɛn nna nyinaa mu.
Ma yɛn ho nsane yɛn, sɛ nna a wobrɛɛ yɛn ase wɔ mu
ne mfeɛ a yɛhunuu mu bɔne no.
Ma w’adwuma nna adi mma wo nkoa,
na w’animuonyam nna adi, wɔn mma so.
Na AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn animteɛ mmra yɛn so,
na yɛn nsa ano adwuma no, ma no nyɛ yie mma yɛn,
aane, yɛn nsa ano adwuma ma no nyɛ yie.
Deɛ ɔte ɔsorosoroni no huntabea, mekyerɛ
deɛ ɔtena Otumfoɔ no nwunu ase no
bɛse AWURADE sɛ: Me dwanekɔbea ne m’abankɛseɛ,
me Nyankopɔn a mede me ho meto wo soɔ.
Ampa ara, ɔno na ɔbɛgye wo afiri ofirisumfoɔ fidie mu
ne owuyadeɛ sɛeɛ mu.
Ɔde ne ntakra bɛkata wo so,
na ne ntaban ase na wobɛkɔ akɔhyɛ,
ɔkyɛm ne nkataboɔ ne ne nokorɛ.
Worensuro anadwo bumbɔ,
bɛmma a ɛtu nam awia,
ɔyaredɔm a ɛnenam sum mu,
nsane yadeɛ a ɛsɛe ade awia ketee.
Apem totɔ wo nkyɛn
na ɔpedu totɔ wo nifa a,
wo deɛ, ɛrenka wo.
W’ani nko na wode bɛhwɛ,
na woahunu abɔnefoɔ akatua.
Na wo, AWURADE, ne me dwanekɔbea,
aane, ɔsorosoroni no na wode no ayɛ wo tenabea.
Bɔne renka wo,
na ɔhaw remmɛn wo ntomadan.
Na wahyɛ n’abɔfoɔ ama wo,
sɛ wɔnhwɛ wo so, w’akwan nyinaa mu.
Wɔbɛsoa wo wɔn nsam,
na wo nan ampem ɔboɔ.
Wobɛnante gyata ne ahuritia so,
wobɛtiatia gyataburuwa ne ɔtweaseɛ so.
Na sɛ ɔfam me ho yi, mɛgye no,
mɛma no so, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnim me din.
Ɔsu frɛ me, na mɛgye no so,
me ne no bɛtena ahohia mu,
mɛyi no na mahyɛ no animuonyam.
Mɛma no adi nkwa tentene amee,
na mama no ahunu me nkwagyeɛ.
Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔda AWURADE ase
na wɔto dwom ma wo din, ɔsorosoroni,
sɛ wɔka w’adɔeɛ anɔpa
ne wo nokorɛdie anadwo,
sankuhan du ne bɛnta so,
sankuo ho adwempa dwom mu.
Na wo, AWURADE, woma m’ani gye wo nneyɛɛ ho,
wo nsa ano nnwuma ho na mɛdi ahurisie.
AWURADE, sɛdeɛ wo nnwuma si soso fa,
w’adwene mu dɔ pii.
Ogyimifoɔ nnim,
na ɔkwasea nhunu yei mu.
Abɔnefoɔ fifiri sɛ ɛfan
na amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa si so sɛ nhwiren a,
ɛne sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wɔn korakora.
Nanso wo AWURADE deɛ, wokorɔn daa.
Na hwɛ, w’atamfo no, Ao AWURADE,
w’atamfo no deɛ, wɔbɛsɛe,
na wɔbɛhwete amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa mu.
Na woma m’abɛn so sɛ okoo deɛ,
wode ngo foforɔ gu me so.
Na m’ani hunu deɛ mepɛ m’atɛfoɔ so,
na m’aso te deɛ ɛyɛ me dɛ, abɔnefoɔ a wɔsɔre tia me no ho.
Ɔteneneeni bɛfefɛ sɛ abɛ,
ɔbɛnyini sɛ Lebanon so tweneduro.
Wɔn a wɔatɛ wɔn AWURADE fie no
bɛfefɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn abannwa so.
Wɔbɛkɔ so aso aba nkɔkoraaberɛ,
wɔbɛyɛ akɛseɛ ne frɔmfrɔm ara
de akyerɛ sɛ AWURADE tene,
ɔne me botan, na deɛ ɛntene biara nni ne mu.
AWURADE di hene, ɔde animuonyam ahyehyɛ ne ho.
AWURADE ahyehyɛ ne ho, ɔde ahoɔden akyekyere ne ho,
na wiase tim hɔ a ɛrenhinhim.
W’adwa tim hɔ firi tete,
wowɔ hɔ firi daa.
Asutene ama so, AWURADE,
asutene ama wɔn nne so,
asutene ma wɔn huuyɛ so.
Deɛ ɔsene nsukɛseɛ nne, nsuo a ɛwɔ tumi,
ɛpo mu asorɔkyeɛ nne,
ɔne ɔsoro hɔ tumfoɔ AWURADE.
W’adansesɛm yɛ nokorɛ pii;
kronkronyɛ na ɛfata wo fie,
AWURADE, nnasanten nyinaa.
Aweretɔ Nyankopɔn, AWURADE,
aweretɔ Nyankopɔn, pue.
Asase temmufoɔ, ma wo ho so,
tua ahokyerɛfoɔ ka.
AWURADE, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na abɔnefoɔ,
ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na abɔnefoɔ nni ahurisie?
Wɔka asɛmdenden,
amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa di ahantansɛm.
Wo man deɛ, AWURADE, wɔrebɔ no pasaa,
na wɔbrɛ w’agyapadeɛ ase.
Wɔkum okunafoɔ ne ɔhɔhoɔ,
na wɔdi nwisiaa awu;
na wɔka sɛ: AWURADE renhunu,
na Yakob Nyankopɔn remmu.
Ɔman mu agyimifoɔ, monte aseɛ,
na mo, nkwasea, da bɛn na mobɛhunu de?
Deɛ ɔtɛ aso no, ɔrente asɛm,
anaa deɛ ɔnwonoo ani no, ɔrenhunu adeɛ?
Deɛ ɔtwe amanaman aso no, ɔrentenetene,
deɛ ɔkyerɛ nnipa nimdeɛ no, ɔno ɛ?
AWURADE hunu nnipa adwene sɛ ɛyɛ ahuhudeɛ.
Nhyira ne onipa a wo, AWURADE, wotwe n’aso,
na wofiri wo mmara no mu kyerɛkyerɛ no,
sɛ wobɛma no nna bɔne ho abodamu
akɔsi sɛ wobɛfunu amena ama ɔbɔnefoɔ.
Na AWURADE rento ne man ntwene,
na ɔrennya n’agyapadeɛ,
na atemmuo bɛsane akɔ tenenee mu,
na akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa bɛdi akyire.
Hwan na ɔbɛsɔre ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adi asie ama me?
Hwan na ɔbɛgyina ne amumuyɛfoɔ adi asie ama me?
Sɛ ɛnyɛ AWURADE na ɔyɛ me boafoɔ a,
anka aka kumaa na me kra akɔtena kommyɛ mu.
Sɛ mese me nan rewatiri a,
wo, AWURADE, w’adɔeɛ na ɛwowa me.
Me mu dadwene dɔɔso a,
w’awerɛkyekyerɛ gye me kra ani.
Amammɔeɛ adwa a ɛnam mmara so bɔ mmusuo no
ne wo bɛfa yɔnkoɔ anaa?
Wɔbɔ ɔteneneeni kra so kyenku,
na wɔbu mogya a ɛdi bem fɔ.
Nanso AWURADE ayɛ me abankɛseɛ,
na me Nyankopɔn ayɛ me dwanekɔbea botan.
Na ɔde wɔn mmusuo abua wɔn atifi,
na wɔn bɔne nti ɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
AWURADE, aane, yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛyi wɔn hɔ.
Mommra mma yɛnto anigyeɛ dwom mma AWURADE,
momma yɛmmɔ ose mma yɛn nkwagyeɛ botan.
Momma yɛmfa aseda mmra n’anim,
na yɛmfa nnwom nni ahurisie mma no.
Na AWURADE yɛ Onyankopɔn kɛseɛ
ne ɔhenkɛseɛ, anyame nyinaa so.
Ne nsam na asase mu ahuntadeɛ wɔ,
na mmepɔ so srɔnsrɔn nso wɔ no.
Ɔno na ɛpo wɔ no, na ɔno na ɔyɛeɛ,
na asase pɛsɛɛ nso, ne nsa na ɛnwonoeɛ.
Mommra mma yɛmmutu nkoto nsɔre
AWURADE, yɛn yɛfoɔ anim.
Na ɔno ne yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛyɛ n’adidibea nkurɔfoɔ
ne ne nsam nnwan.
Ɛnnɛ mote ne nne no ɛ!
Monnyɛ mo akoma denden sɛ Meriba,
sɛ Masa da no, ɛserɛ so hɔ,
berɛ a mo agyanom gyegyee m’ano,
na wɔsɔɔ me hwɛeɛ no, nanso na wɔanya me nnwuma nhunui.
Mfeɛ aduanan na awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ no ho yɛɛ me ahi,
na mekaa sɛ: Ɔman a wɔfom akoma mu ne wɔn.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔanhunu m’akwan.
Na ɛmaa mekaa m’abufuo mu ntam,
sɛ wɔrennuru me home mu.
Monto dwom foforɔ mma AWURADE,
asase nyinaa, monto dwom mma AWURADE.
Monto dwom mma AWURADE, monhyira ne din,
monka ne nkwagyeɛ mfiri da nkɔ da mu.
Monka n’animuonyam, amanaman mu,
n’anwanwadeɛ, aman nyinaa mu.
Na AWURADE yɛ kɛseɛ, na ɔsɛ ayeyie sɛ,
ne ho yɛ hu, anyame nyinaa so,
na aman anyame nyinaa yɛ abosonhuhuo,
na AWURADE mmom na ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro.
Ɔhran ne animuonyam wɔ n’anim,
tumi ne ahoɔfɛ wɔ ne kronkronbea hɔ.
Aman mmusuakuo, momfa mma AWURADE,
momfa animuonyam ne tumi mma AWURADE.
Momfa AWURADE din animuonyam mma no,
monsoa ayɛyɛdeɛ mmra n’abannwa so.
Monsɔre AWURADE, ahokeka kronkron mu,
asase nyinaa, mo ho mpopo n’anim.
Monka amanaman mu sɛ, AWURADE di hene,
na wiase tim hɔ a ɛrenhinhim,
na ɔbɛdi aman so, tenenee mu.
Ma ɔsoro ani nnye na asase ho nsane no,
ma ɛpo ne ne mayɛ nworo.
Ma petee mu ne deɛ ɛwom nyinaa nni ahurisie,
ɛno na kwaeɛ mu nnua nyinaa bɛto anigyeɛ nnwom,
wɔ AWURADE anim, na ɔreba,
na ɔreba abɛbu asase atɛn.
Ɔrebɛbu wiase atɛn tenenee mu,
ne aman wɔ ne nokorɛ mu.
AWURADE di hene, ma asase ho nsane no, na
nsupɔ bebree no nso ani nnye.
Mununkum ne sum atwa ne ho ahyia,
tenenee ne atemmuo ne n’ahennwa nnyinasoɔ.
Ogya di n’anim, na ɛrehye n’ahohiahiafoɔ hyia.
N’anyinam hran wiase,
asase hunu, na ɛpopo.
Mmepɔ nane sɛ akraa AWURADE anim,
asase nyinaa AWURADE anim.
Ɔsoro ka ne tenenee kyerɛ,
na aman nyinaa hunu n’animuonyam.
Ahonisomfoɔ, mekyerɛ wɔn a wɔde abosonhuhuo
hoahoa wɔn ho no nyinaa ani awu,
mo anyame nyinaa, monkoto no.
Sion te, na n’ani gye,
Yuda mmammaa ho sane wɔn,
AWURADE, w’atemmuo nti.
Na wo AWURADE ne ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so,
wɔama wo so koraa wɔ anyame nyinaa so.
Mo a modɔ AWURADE, monkyiri bɔne.
Ɔhwɛ n’ahotefoɔ kra so,
ɔbɛyi wɔn afiri abɔnefoɔ nsam.
Wɔde hann agu ama ɔteneneeni,
ne anigyeɛ ama akoma mu teefoɔ.
Ateneneefoɔ, mo ani nnye AWURADE ho,
na monyi ne din kronkron ayɛ.
Monto dwom foforɔ mma AWURADE,
na wayɛ anwanwadeɛ,
ne nifa ne ne basa kronkron
adi nim ama no.
AWURADE ama wɔahunu ne nkwagyeɛ,
wayi ne tenenee adi, amanaman anim.
Wakae n’adɔeɛ ne ne nokorɛ
ama Israel fie,
asase ano nyinaa ahunu
yɛn Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.
Nsase nyinaa, mommɔ ose mma AWURADE,
monteam nni ahurisie nto ayeyie dwom.
Monto dwom mma AWURADE sankuo so,
sankuo ne dwontoɔ nne so.
Momfa totorobɛnto ne mmɛn nne mmɔ ose,
Ɔhene AWURADE anim.
Ma ɛpo ne ne mayɛ nworo,
wiase ne wɔn a wɔte mu.
Ma asuo akɛseɛ mmobɔ nsam,
mmepɔ mmom nni ahurisie,
AWURADE anim,
na ɔreba abɛbu asase atɛn.
Ɔbɛbu wiase atɛn, tenenee mu,
ne aman wɔ atɛntenenee mu.
AWURADE di hene, aman ho popo;
ɔte Kerubim so, asase him.
AWURADE yɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Sion,
na wɔama no so aman nyinaa so.
Wɔbɛyi ne din kɛseɛ a ɛho yɛ hu no ayɛ,
ɔno na ɔyɛ kronkron.
Ɔhene tumfoɔ a wodɔ atemmuo,
wo na wobu atɛntenenee,
Yakob mu atemmuo ne tenenee,
wo na wobuo.
Momma AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn so,
na monkoto nsɔre ne nan ase adwa anim.
Ɔno na ɔyɛ kronkron.
Mose ne Aaron wɔ n’asɔfoɔ mu,
na Samuel wɔ wɔn a wɔbɔ ne din mu,
wɔfrɛɛ AWURADE, na ɔgyee wɔn so.
Ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn mununkum dum mu,
wɔdii n’adansesɛm ne ahyɛdeɛ
a ɔde maa wɔn no so.
AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn, wo na wogyee wɔn soɔ,
woyɛɛ wɔn Onyankopɔn a ɔde kyɛ,
ne wɔn nneyɛɛ so weretɔfoɔ.
Momma AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn, so,
na monkoto nsɔre wɔ ne bepɔ kronkron so,
na AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn, ne kronkron.
Asase nyinaa, mommɔ ose mma AWURADE.
Momfa anigyeɛ nsom AWURADE,
na momfa ahurisie dwom mmra n’anim.
Monhunu sɛ AWURADE ne Onyankopɔn,
ɔno na ɔyɛɛ yɛn, ɔno na yɛwɔ no na yɛnne yɛn ho, na
yɛyɛ ne man ne n’adidibea nnwan.
Momfa aseda nhyɛne n’aponkɛseɛ mu,
na momfa ayeyie mmra n’abannwa so.
Monna no ase, monhyira ne din.
Na AWURADE yɛ,
n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa,
na ne nokorɛdie kɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so.
Mɛto adɔeɛ ne atemmuo ho dwom,
wo, AWURADE, na mɛto dwom yi mama woɔ.
Mede nimdeɛ bɛfa pɛyɛ kwan so.
Da bɛn na wobɛba me nkyɛn?
Mede m’akoma pɛyɛ bɛnante
me fie.
Meremma ahuhusɛm
biara nsi m’ani so,
mekyiri ahohwisɛmdie,
ɛremfam me ho.
Akoma kontonkyi mpare me,
bɔne rensɔ m’ani.
Deɛ ɔhunta twiri ne yɔnko no,
ɔno na mɛtwa no;
ahantan ani ne akoma a ɛhoran
merempene no.
M’ani wɔ asase so nokwafoɔ so,
sɛ wɔmmɛtena me ho;
deɛ ɔnam pɛyɛ kwan soɔ no,
ɔno na ɔmmɛsom me.
Deɛ ɔtwa nkontompo
rentena me dan mu,
deɛ ɔkeka atorosɛm
rennyina m’anim.
Daa anɔpa mɛtwitwa asase so
abɔnefoɔ nyinaa,
na matu amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa
mafiri AWURADE kuro mu.

fragment.content: Mmɔborɔni a ne home te no a ɔyi n’abooboo gu AWURADE anim no mpaebɔ.

block_quote.content: Ao, AWURADE, tie me mpaebɔ,
na ma me sufrɛ nnuru w’anim.
Nyi w’anim nhunta me,
da a me ho hia me no,
brɛ w’aso ase ma me,
da a mesu mefrɛ no, yɛ ntɛm gye me so.
Na me nna hi sɛ wisie,
na me nnompe adɔ sɛ mmukyia.
M’akoma abo na akusa sɛ ɛfan,
na m’ani apa m’aduanedie so.
M’apinisie nne nti
me nnompe afemfam me wedeɛm.
Mete sɛ ɛserɛ so nantwinoma,
mayɛ sɛ amamfo so patuo.
Mesiri pɛ, mete sɛ apatuprɛ
a ɔno nko si ɛdan atifi.
Da mu nyinaa m’atamfoɔ bɔ me ahohora,
wɔn a wɔbɔ me so dam de me yɛ ntanka.
Na madi nso sɛ aduane,
na mede esu mafra m’anonneɛ mu.
Ɛnam w’abufuo ne w’anibereɛ so nti,
na womaa me soɔ, na woato me atwene.
Me nna te sɛ sunsum a ɛretwam,
na me deɛ, mekusa sɛ ɛfan.
Na wo, AWURADE deɛ, wowɔ hɔ daa,
na wo nkaeɛ kɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so.
Wobɛsɔre abɛhunu Sion mmɔbɔ,
na ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ wodom no ni,
na ɛberɛ no adu.
Na wo nkoa wɔ n’aboɔ ho akoma,
na wɔn yam hyehye wɔn, ne mfuturo ho.
Na amanaman bɛsuro AWURADE din,
na asase so ahemfo nyinaa asuro w’animuonyam,
sɛ AWURADE akyekyere Sion,
wayi ne ho adi n’animuonyam mu,
wadane n’ani akyerɛ onnibie mpaebɔ,
na wampo wɔn mpaebɔ.
Wɔbɛtwerɛ yei ama nkyirimma,
na ɔman a wɔbɛbɔ wɔn no bɛyi AWURADE ayɛ,
sɛ wafiri ne soro kronkron hɔ abrɛ n’ani ase ahwɛ fam,
AWURADE firi soro na ahwɛ asase,
sɛ ɔbɛtie apokyerɛfoɔ apinisie,
na wasane owuo mma,
na wɔabɔ AWURADE din Sion,
na wɔaka n’ayeyie Yerusalem,
da a aman bɛbom aboaboa wɔn ho ano
ne ahennie, sɛ wɔbɛsom AWURADE.
Wago me tumi mu ɔkwan mu,
watwa me nna so.
Meka sɛ: Me Nyankopɔn,
mmu me nna mu mfa me,
wo mfeɛ kyɛre
kɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so.
Tete nteredee na wohyɛɛ asase aseɛ,
na ɔsoro ne wo nsa ano adwuma.
Ɛno deɛ, ɛbɛsɛe, na wo deɛ, wotim hɔ daa.
Wɔn nyinaa bɛsu sɛ atadeɛ,
wobɛsakyera wɔn sɛ atadeɛ, na wɔasakyera.
Na wone wo ara, na wo mfeɛ rensa da.
Wo nkoa mma bɛtena ase,
na wɔn asefoɔ atim w’anim.
Me kra, hyira AWURADE,
na me mu adeɛ nyinaa nhyira ne din kronkron.
Me kra, hyira AWURADE,
na mma wo werɛ mmfiri ne nneyɛɛ pa nyinaa.
Ɔno na ɔde wo mfomsoɔ nyinaa kyɛ woɔ,
na ɔsa wo nyarewa nyinaa.
Ɔgye wo nkwa firi Amena mu,
ɔde adɔeɛ ne mmɔborɔhunu bɔ wo abotire.
Ɔde adepa hyɛ w’afono ma
na wo mmeranteberɛ yɛ foforɔ sɛ ɔkɔdeɛ.
AWURADE di asɛntenenee,
na ɔbu atɛn gye wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn soɔ nyinaa.
Ɔde n’akwan kyerɛɛ Mose,
ɔmaa Israel mma hunuu ne nneyɛɛ.
Mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne ɔdomfoɔ ne AWURADE,
ne bo kyɛre fu, na n’adɔeɛ dɔɔso.
Ɔrenham nkɔsi daapem,
na ɔrennya yɛn menasepɔ nkɔsi daa.
Ɔnsusu yɛn bɔne so ne yɛn nni,
na ɔnhwɛ yɛn mfomsoɔ nhyɛ yɛn ananmu.
Na sɛ ɔsoro ware sene asase no,
sɛ n’adɔeɛ so, wɔn a wɔsuro no soɔ ne no.
Sɛ apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ ntam ware no,
sɛ wama yɛn ne yɛn mmarato ntam aware ne no.
Sɛ agya yam hyehye no ne mma ho
no, sɛ AWURADE yam yɛ no wɔn a wɔsuro no ho ne no.
Na ɔnim yɛn su,
ɔkae sɛ yɛyɛ mfuturo.
Ɔdasani deɛ, ne nna te sɛ ɛserɛ,
ɔyɛ frɔmm sɛ wiram nhwiren.
Sɛ mframa bɔ fa ne so a, na ɔnni hɔ,
na ne sibea nni no bio.
Na AWURADE adɔeɛ firi daa kɔ daa,
wɔn a wɔsuro no so,
na ne tenenee wɔ hɔ ma mma mma,
ma wɔn a wɔdi n’apam soɔ,
na wɔkae n’ahyɛdeɛ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ.
AWURADE de n’adwa asi soro,
na n’ahennie di ade nyinaa so.
AWURADE abɔfoɔ, monhyira no,
mo ahoɔden mu akatakyie a modi n’asɛm soɔ
na motie ne kasa no.
AWURADE asafo nyinaa, monhyira no,
n’asomfo a moyɛ deɛ ɛsɔ n’ani no.
AWURADE nnwuma nyinaa, monhyira no,
mmeammea a ɔdi tumi nyinaa.
Me kra, hyira AWURADE.
Me kra, hyira AWURADE.
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, woso kɛse,
woahyɛ ɔhran ne animuonyam.
Ɔfira hann sɛ ntoma,
ɔtrɛ ɔsoro mu sɛ ntomadan tam,
ɔde ne mpia sam nsuo so,
ɔde mununkum yɛ ne teaseɛnam,
ɔde mframa ntaban nenam.
Ɔde mframa yɛ n’abɔfoɔ,
ɔde ogya a ɛderɛ yɛ n’asomfo.
Ɔde asase atim ne nnyinasoɔ so,
na anhinhim da biara da.
Wode ebunu kataa so sɛ atadeɛ,
nsuo gyinaa mmepɔ so,
w’animka nti ɛdwanedwanee,
w’aprannaa nne nti na ɛyɛɛ ntɛm kɔeɛ,
mmepɔ memaa wɔn ho so, ɛsene kɔɔ abɔn mu,
deɛ woasiesie ama no hɔ.
Woatwa ɔhyeɛ sɛ ɛnntra,
na ansane ammɛkata asase so.
Ɔyi nsuo aniwa, abɔn mu,
ɛsene nenam mmepɔ ntam.
Ɛma wiram mmoa nyinaa nom bi,
atorɔmo de kum wɔn sukɔm.
Ɛso na ewiem nnomaa teteɛ,
nnua mman mu na wɔfiri ma wɔn nne soɔ.
Ɔfiri ne soro mpia mu gu mmepɔ so nsuo,
wo nnwuma so aba mee asase.
Ɔma wira fifiri ma afieboa,
ne afuomduane a onipa yɛ ho adwuma,
sɛ ɔbɛma aduane afiri asase mu.
Na nsa ama ɔdasani akoma atɔ ne yam,
na wama ngo ayɛ onipa anim dɛhyɛdɛhyɛ,
na aduane awowa ɔdasani akoma.
Wɔma AWURADE nnua nso mee,
Lebanon ntweneduro a ɔduaeɛ no.
Ɛhɔ na nnomaa yɛ wɔn mpirebuo,
asukɔnkɔn wɔ ne fie, pepeaa nnua so.
Mmepɔ atentene yɛ dwanekɔbea ma akyekyeregya,
na abotan yɛ ma mmoakua.
Ɔyɛɛ ɔsrane sɛ ɛnkyerɛ berɛ mu nsakyeraeɛ,
owia nim ne tɔberɛ.
Woma sum duru, na adeɛ sa,
ɛno mu na kwaeɛ mu mmoa nyinaa keka wɔn ho.
Gyataburuwa bobom di mmoa akyi,
na wɔkɔpɛ wɔn aduane, Nyankopɔn nsam.
Owia pue a, wɔtwe wɔn ho,
na wɔbutubutu wɔn atu mu.
Onipa firi kɔ n’adwuma
ne ne dwumadie ho kɔsi anwummerɛ.
AWURADE, sɛdeɛ wo nnwuma si dɔɔso fa,
nyansa mu na woyɛɛ ne nyinaa,
w’abɔdeɛ ahyɛ asase so ma.
Ɛpo ni, ɛso, na ɛtrɛ kakraa,
ɛhɔ na mmoa manyamanya a ɛnni ano nenam,
mmoa nketewa ne akɛseɛ.
Ɛhɔ na ahyɛn nenam,
dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn a woyɛɛ no sɛ ɔngoro mu no ni.
Wɔn nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan
sɛ ma wɔn wɔn aduane, ne berɛ mu.
Woma wɔn, na wɔtase,
wobue wo nsam, na adepa mee wɔn.
Wohunta w’ani, na wɔpatu wu,
woyi wɔn ahome, na wɔgyaa mu,
na wɔsane kɔ wɔn mfuturo mu.
Wosoma w’ahome ba, na wode bɔ wɔn,
na woma asase ani yɛ foforɔ.
Ma AWURADE animuonyam ntena hɔ daa,
ma AWURADE ani nnye ne nnwuma mu.
Ɔno na ɔhwɛ asase na ɛwosoɔ,
ɔka mmepɔ na ɛfiri wisie.
Mete aseɛ yi, mɛto dwom mama AWURADE,
mewɔ hɔ yi, mɛto ayeyie dwom mama me Nyankopɔn.
Ɔmma m’adwene yi nyɛ no fɛ,
na me nso m’ani bɛgye AWURADE ho.
Ma nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa asase so,
na mma abɔnefoɔ nntena hɔ bio.
Me kra, hyira AWURADE.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ.
Monna AWURADE ase,
mommɔ ne din,
momma wɔnhunu ne nneyɛɛ, aman mu.
Monto dwom mma no, monto ayeyie dwom mma no,
monnwene n’anwanwadeɛ nyinaa ho nka.
Momfa ne din kronkron nhyehyɛ mo ho,
wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ AWURADE no akoma ntɔ wɔn yam.
Mompɛ AWURADE ne ne tumi akyiri kwan,
monhwehwɛ n’anim daa.
Monkae n’anwanwadeɛ a wayɛ,
n’ahodwirideɛ ne n’anom atemmusɛm no,
mo, n’akoa Abraham asefoɔ,
Yakob a ɔyii no no mma.
Ɔno ne AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn,
n’atemmuo wɔ asase nyinaa so.
Ɔkae n’apam no de kɔsi daa,
asɛm a ɔhyɛ maa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ apem no,
apam a ɔne Abraham pameeɛ no
ne ne ntam a ɔkaa Isak no,
na ɔde sii hɔ maa Yakob sɛ ahyɛdeɛ,
na ɔde maa Israel sɛ daa apam no,
sɛ: Wo na mede Kanaan asase bɛma wo
sɛ mo apɛgyadeɛ a wɔkyɛ no homa soɔ.
Ɛberɛ a nnipa no ano nnɔɔso,
wɔyɛ kakraa bi ne ahɔhoɔ wɔ hɔ
na wɔnenam firi ɔman mu kɔ ɔman mu,
wɔfiri ahennie bi mu kɔ ɔman foforɔ bi mu no,
wamma obiara kwan sɛ ɔnhom wɔn so,
na wɔn nti ɔkaa ahemfo anim sɛ:
Monnka me nnipa a wɔasra wɔn no,
na monnyɛ m’adiyifoɔ bɔne bi.
Na ɔmaa ɛkɔm baa asase no so,
ɔbubuu aduane poma nyinaa mu;
Ɔsomaa onipa bi dii wɔn anim,
wɔtɔn Yosef maa no kɔyɛɛ akoa.
Wɔde mpokyerɛ miaa ne nan,
de no too dadeɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu
kɔsii berɛ a n’asɛm baa mu,
AWURADE asɛm sɔɔ no hwɛe.
ɔhene soma maa wɔkɔtuu no,
deɛ ɔdi aman soɔ no maa wɔkɔsanee no.
Ɔde no sii ne fie so panin,
ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa sodifoɔ,
sɛ ɔnkyerɛ n’asafohene deɛ ɔpɛ,
na ɔnkyerɛ ne mpanimfoɔ nyansa.
Ɛnna Israel baa Misraim,
na Yakob bɛsoɛɛ Ham asase so sɛ hɔhoɔ.
Na ɔmaa ne man ase kyenee bebree,
na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ den sene wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ.
Ɔdanee wɔn akoma sɛ wɔntane ne man,
na wɔmfa aniteɛ nhyɛ ne nkoa so.
Ɔsomaa n’akoa Mose ne Aaron
a ɔyii no no.
Wɔyii ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ sii wɔn mu,
ne anwanwadeɛ, Ham asase so.
Ɔsomaa esum maa no duruu sum,
nanso wɔannwene ne nsɛm ho.
Ɔdanee wɔn nsuo mogya,
na ɔde kum wɔn mpataa.
Wɔn asase dɔɔ mponkyerɛne manyamanya
maa wɔbaa wɔn ahemfo mpia mu.
Ɔkasae, na anwansena borebore bae,
ntontom baa wɔn asase nyinaa so.
Ɔde asukɔtweaa yɛɛ wɔn osutorɔ
maa ogyaframa baa wɔn asase so.
Na ɔbobɔɔ wɔn bobe ne wɔn borɔdɔma,
na ɔbubuu wɔn asase so nnua.
Ɔkasae, na ntutummɛ bae
ne mmɛbɛ a wɔn dodoɔ nni ano,
na wɔbɛdii wɔn asase so ahahan nyinaa,
na wɔdii wɔn mfuo so aduane.
Na ɔbobɔɔ wɔn asase so mmakan nyinaa,
wɔn ahoɔden nyinaa mu mma a ɛdi kan.
Na ɔde wɔn ne dwetɛ ne sika firi kɔe,
na onipa a ɔyɛ mmerɛ biara nni ne mmusuakuo mu.
Wɔn adifire yɛɛ Misraimfoɔ anigyeɛ,
na wɔn ho hu tɔɔ wɔn so.
Ɔtrɛɛ mununkum mu yɛɛ nkatasoɔ,
ne ogya, sɛ ɛnyɛ hann anadwo.
Wɔbisae, na ɔde mmoko bae,
na ɔde ɔsoro aduane maa wɔmee.
Ɔbuee ɔbotan maa nsuo tuee,
ɛtenee anwea pradada so sɛ asubɔnten.
Na ɔkaee n’asɛm kronkron no,
ɔkaee n’akoa Abraham,
na ɔyii ne man maa wɔde abotɔyam firii adi,
ɔmaa wɔn a ɔyii wɔn no de ahurisie kɔe.
Na ɔde amanaman nsase maa wɔn,
na wɔdii nkurɔfoɔ adwuma so adeɛ,
sɛ wɔnhwɛ n’ahyɛdeɛ nyɛ,
na wɔnni ne mmara so.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monna AWURADE ase, na ɔyɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi aka AWURADE mmaninneɛ,
na wama wɔate n’ayeyie nyinaa?
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔkura atemmuo mu,
ne deɛ ɔdi asɛntenenee daa nyinaa.
AWURADE, wo man ho anisɔ no mu, kae me,
wo nkwagyeɛ mu bɛhwɛ me,
na menhunu wɔn a woayi wɔn no nnepa,
na m’ani nnye wo nkurɔfoɔ no anigyeɛ ho bi,
na me ne w’agyapadeɛ nhyehyɛ yɛn ho.
Yɛne yɛn agyanom ayɛ bɔne,
yɛafom, yɛayɛ bɔne kɛse.
Yɛn agyanom anhunu w’anwanwadeɛ Misraim,
wɔankae w’adɔeɛ dodoɔ no,
na wɔtee atua ɛpo ho, Mmɛwa Po ho.
Nanso ne din nti ɔgyee wɔn,
sɛ ɔbɛma wɔahunu ne mmaninyɛ.
Ɔteateaa Mmɛwa Po no maa no wee,
na ɔde wɔn faa abunu mu sɛ anwea pradada so.
Na ɔgyee wɔn firii deɛ ɔkyiri wɔn no nsam,
na ɔyii wɔn firii ɔtamfoɔ nsam,
na nsuo kataa wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ so,
wɔn mu baako mpo anka.
Ɛnna wɔgyee ne nsɛm diiɛ,
wɔtoo n’ayeyie dwom.
Wɔn werɛ firii ne nneyɛɛ ntɛm,
wɔantwɛn n’agyinatuo.
Na wɔn kɔn dɔɔ ntraso ɛserɛ so,
na wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe anwea pradada so.
Ɛnna ɔmaa wɔn deɛ wɔbisaeɛ,
nanso ɔmaa ɔfɔn baa wɔn kra mu.
Na wɔn ani beree Mose, nsraban no mu,
ne Aaron, AWURADE hotefoɔ no.
Asase mu bue menee Datan,
na ɛkataa Abiram asafo so.
Na ogya sɔ kɔkaa wɔn asafo,
ogyaframa taferee abɔnefoɔ no.
Wɔyɛɛ nantwie ba Horeb,
na wɔkotoo ohoni a wɔguiɛ.
Na wɔsakyeraa wɔn animuonyam
yɛɛ no nantwie a ɔwe wira nsɛso.
Wɔn werɛ firii Onyankopɔn a ɔgyee wɔn na
ɔyɛɛ nnoɔma akɛseɛ Misraim,
ɔyɛɛ anwanwadeɛ Ham asase so,
ne ahudeɛ, Mmɛwa Po ho no.
Na ɔse anka ɔbɛsɛe wɔn,
nanso Mose a ɔyii no no
kɔgyinaa n’anim sii abuo no ano,
sɛ ɔbɛyi n’abufuo, na wansɛe wɔn.
Na wɔtoo asase a ɛyɛ no ho mpe,
wɔannye n’asɛm anni.
Wɔnwiinwii wɔn ntomadan mu,
na wɔantie AWURADE asɛm.
Ɛnna ɔmaa ne nsa so tiaa wɔn
sɛ ɔbɛma wɔatotɔ ɛserɛ so,
na wabɔ wɔn asefoɔ agu amanaman mu,
na wapansam wɔn, nsase so.
Na wɔde wɔn ho bɔɔ Baal-peor ho,
na wɔdii adefunu afɔrebɔdeɛ,
na wɔde wɔn nneyɛɛ huruu no,
na owuyadeɛ baa wɔn mu.
Na Pinehas sɔre gyina patae,
na ɔsɔɔ owuyadeɛ no ano.
Na wɔbuu yei tenenee maa no
kɔɔ mma mma so kɔsi daa.
Na wɔyii no abufuo, Meriba nsuo no so,
na wɔn nti ɛwiee Mose bɔne.
Na wɔhoo ne honhom werɛ,
na ɔde n’ano woroo nsɛm.
Wɔankunkum aman
a AWURADE kaa wɔn ho asɛm no
na wɔfrafraa amanaman no mu,
na wɔsuasuaa wɔn nneyɛɛ.
Na wɔsom wɔn ahoni,
na ɛdanee wɔn fidie.
Na wɔde wɔn mmabanin ne wɔn mmammaa
bobɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa abosom,
na wɔkaa mogya a ɛnni fɔ gui,
wɔn mmabanin ne wɔn mmammaa mogya,
wɔde wɔn bɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa Kanaan ahoni,
maa mogya guu asase no ho fi.
Na wɔde wɔn nneyɛɛ maa wɔn ho yɛɛ nwunu,
na wɔde wɔn nsɛnnie dan nnwamamfoɔ.
Ɛnna AWURADE abufuo dɛre tiaa ne man,
na ɔkyirii n’agyapadeɛ.
Na ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ amanaman nsa,
na wɔn a wɔkyiri wɔn dii wɔn so.
Na wɔn atamfoɔ hyɛɛ wɔn so,
na wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase hyɛɛ wɔn nsa ase.
Ɔgyee wɔn mpɛn pii,
na wɔn deɛ, wɔtee atua, wɔn apam so,
na wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase wɔn amumuyɛ mu.
Nanso ɔhwɛɛ wɔn ahohia maa wɔn,
ɔtiee wɔn abooboo no.
Na ɔkaee n’apam maa wɔn,
na n’adɔeɛ dodoɔ nti ɔyɛɛ ntimmɔborɔ.
Na ɔmaa wɔn a wɔfaa wɔn nnommum nyinaa
hunuu wɔn mmɔbɔ.
Gye yɛn nkwa, AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na boaboa yɛn ano firi amanaman mu,
na yɛnna wo din kronkron no ase,
na yɛmfa w’ayeyie nhyehyɛ yɛn ho.
Nhyira ne AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn
firi tete akyirikyiri kɔsi daakye akyirikyiri,
na ma ɔman mu no nyinaa nse sɛ:
Amen. Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monna AWURADE ase, na ɔyɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ma wɔn a AWURADE agye wɔn nka saa,
wɔn a wagye wɔn afiri ɔhohiahiafoɔ nsam,
na waboaboa wɔn ano afiri nsase soɔ,
afiri apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ,
afiri atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam.
Wɔkyinkyinii anwea pradada so,
nkyɛkyerɛ a ɛnni kwan so,
wɔanhunu kuro biara antena mu.
Ɛkɔm dee wɔn, sukɔm dee wɔn,
wɔn kra tɔɔ piti wɔ wɔn mu.
Na wɔsu frɛɛ AWURADE, wɔn ahohia mu,
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu,
na ɔde wɔn faa ɔkwantenenee so
sɛ wɔnkɔ kuro a wɔbɛtumi atena mu so.
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE, n’adɔeɛ ho,
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
sɛ wama ɔkra a ne ho aweɛ ameeɛ,
na ɔde adepa ahyɛ ɔkra a ɛkɔm de no ma.
Wɔn a wɔtenaa sum ne sum kabii mu,
na wɔkyeree wɔn guu amaneɛ ne dadeɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔtee Nyankopɔn nsɛm ho atua,
na wɔbuu ɔsorosoroni no agyina animtia,
na ɔde ɔhaw brɛɛ wɔn akoma ase,
wɔhwehwee ase a ɔboafoɔ bi nni hɔ.
Na wɔsu frɛɛ AWURADE, wɔn ahohia mu,
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu.
Ɔyii wɔn firii sum ne sum kabii mu,
na ɔbubuu wɔn mpokyerɛ mu.
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE, n’adɔeɛ ho,
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
sɛ wabubu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ apono,
na watwitwa adaban mu asinasini.
Agyegyentwie, wɔn mmarato kwan
ne wɔn amumuyɛ nti wɔhunuu amane.
Wɔn kra kyiri aduane nyinaa
na wɔbɛn owuo aboboano.
Na wɔsu frɛɛ AWURADE wɔn ahohia mu,
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu.
Ɔmaa n’asɛm bɛsaa wɔn yadeɛ,
na ɔyii wɔn firii wɔn amena mu.
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE, n’adɔeɛ ho,
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
na wɔmmɔ aseda afɔdeɛ,
na wɔmfa ahurisie dwom nka ne nneyɛɛ.
Wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ ɛpo so ahyɛn mu
na wɔkɔdi nsuo akɛseɛ mu dwuma no,
wɔn na wɔhunuu AWURADE nneyɛɛ,
ne n’anwanwadeɛ ebunu mu,
na ɔka maa ahum kɛseɛ tui,
na ɛmaa n’asorɔkyeɛ so.
Wɔforo kɔɔ soro, na wɔsiane kɔɔ bunu donkodonko mu,
ahohia nti wɔn kra hodwoe.
Wɔkyim kɔ bae tɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabofoɔ,
na wɔn nyansa nyinaa sae wɔn tirim.
Na wɔsu frɛɛ AWURADE, wɔn ahohia mu,
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu.
Ɔmaa ahum no yɛɛ komm,
na asorɔkyeɛ no yɛɛ dinn.
Na wɔn ani gyee sɛ ano adwo komm,
na ɔde wɔn kɔɔ wɔn agyinaeɛ a wɔhwehwɛɛ hɔ no:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE, n’adɔeɛ ho
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
na wɔmma no so ɔman ahyiaeɛ mu,
na wɔnyi no ayɛ mpanimfoɔ dwabɔ mu.
Ɔdanee asutene maa no yɛɛ anwea pradada
ne nsuo aniwa maa no yɛɛ nkyɛkyerɛ.
Asase a ɛma aduane danee asase kɛsɛɛ,
wɔn a wɔte soɔ no bɔneyɛ nti.
Ɔdanee anwea pradada maa no yɛɛ ɔtadeɛ,
ne nkyɛkyerɛ maa no yɛɛ nsuo aniwa,
na ɔmaa wɔn a ɛkɔm dee wɔn kɔtenaa hɔ,
na wɔkyekyeree kuro tenaa mu,
na wɔyɛɛ mfuo, na wɔtetɛɛ bobe nturo,
na wɔnyaa nnɔbaeɛ pii.
Na ɔhyiraa wɔn maa wɔn ase kyenee bebree,
na wamma wɔn afieboa so anhwan.
Ɛnna afei wɔn so hwaneeɛ, na wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase,
ɛnam nhyɛsoɔ, ɔhaw ne awerɛhoɔhyɛ nti.
Ɔde animtiabuo gu mmapɔmma so,
na ɔma wɔkyini asase fo a ɔkwan nni hɔ so.
Na ɔmaa ohiani so firii amanehunu mu,
na ɔyɛɛ wɔn mmusua sɛ nnwankuo.
Teneneefoɔ bɛhunu, na wɔn ani agye,
na amumuyɛ nyinaa bɛmua n’ano.
Obiara a ɔyɛ onyansafoɔ no, ma no mmu yeinom,
na ma wɔnwene AWURADE adɔeɛ ho.
M’akoma atim, Onyankopɔn,
m’akoma atim!
Mɛto dwom, na mayi ayɛ!
Me kra nyane!
Bɛnta ne sankuten, monyane,
mɛnyane anɔpahema.
AWURADE, mɛda wo ase, aman mu,
na mɛto ayeyie dwom mama wo, aman mu.
Na w’adɔeɛ so tra ɔsoro,
na wo nokorɛ duru ewiem tɔnn.
Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tra ɔsoro,
na ma w’animuonyam so asase nyinaa so.
Deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na woagye w’adɔfo nti,
fa wo nifa gye yɛn nkwa, na gye me so.
Onyankopɔn akasa ne kronkronyɛ mu:
Medi ahurisie, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu,
na masusu Sukot bonhwa.
Gilead wɔ me, Manase wɔ me,
na Efraim yɛ me tiri so dadeɛ kyɛ,
Yuda yɛ m’ahempoma.
Moab yɛ me dwaresɛn,
Edom so na mɛto me mpaboa maguo,
Filistifoɔ asase so na mɛbɔ ose.
Hwan na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuro denden no mu,
hwan na ɔbɛgya me akɔ Edom?
Onyankopɔn, ɛnyɛ wo na woasum yɛn aguo yi,
na wo, Onyankopɔn, ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ?
Bɛboa yɛn firi ahohia mu,
na onipa mmoa yɛ ɔkwa.
Yɛde Onyankopɔn na ɛbɛyɛ mmaninneɛ,
na ɔno na ɔbɛtiatia yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ soɔ.
M’ayeyie Nyankopɔn, mmua w’ano.
Na abɔnefoɔ ne nkontompofoɔ abue wɔn ano atia me,
wɔde tɛkyerɛma torofoɔ akeka me ho nsɛm,
na wɔde nitansɛm atwa me ho ahyia,
na wɔne me di ako kwa.
Wɔtane me de hyɛ me dɔ ananmu,
na me deɛ, mpaeɛ ara na mebɔ.
Na wɔde bɔne hyɛ me papa ananmu,
na wɔkyiri me de hyɛ me dɔ ananmu.
Fa ɔbɔnefoɔ si ne so,
na ma Satan nnyina ne nifa.
Wɔbu no atɛn a, ma no nni fɔ,
na ma ne mpaebɔ nnane no bɔne.
Ma ne nna nsua,
na ne hwɛ adwuma no, ma obi mfa,
ne mma nyɛ nwisiaa,
na ne yere nnane okunafoɔ,
na ne mma nkyinkyini nsrɛsrɛ adeɛ,
na wɔmfiri wɔn amamfo so nkɔhwehwɛ aduane.
Ma ɔpempensifoɔ nsa nka deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa,
na ananafoɔ mfom n’adwumadeɛ.
Mma obiara adɔeɛ nnkyɛre mmma no,
na obiara nnnom ne nwisiaa.
Ma wɔnhye n’ase,
ma wɔn din ngu awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdi soɔ yi mu.
Wɔnkae n’agyanom amumuyɛ AWURADE anim,
na ne na bɔne nso, wɔmmpepa.
Ɛntena AWURADE anim daa,
na ɔntwa wɔn ho nkaeɛ mfiri asase so.
Ɛsiane sɛ wankae sɛ ɔbɛyɛ adɔeɛ,
na ɔtaa onipa mmɔborɔni ne ohiani
ne deɛ n’akoma abubuo, sɛ ɔbɛku wɔn.
Ɛnam sɛ ɔdɔɔ nnuabɔ nti, aba ne so,
sɛ wampɛ nhyira nti, ɛne no ntam twe.
Ɔhyɛɛ nnome sɛ n’atadeɛ,
na ɛkɔɔ ne yam sɛ nsuo,
ne ne nnompe mu sɛ ngo.
Ma no nyɛ no sɛ ntoma a ɔfira
ne abɔsoɔ a ɔde kyekyere ne ho daa.
Yei ne me ho asɛmpɛfoɔ akatua a ɛfiri AWURADE nsam,
ne wɔn a wɔka me kra ho asɛmmɔne no deɛ.
Na wo, O Onyankopɔn ne m’AWURADE,
wo din nti di ma me,
na w’adɔeɛ no yɛ, yi me!
Na meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani,
na m’akoma apira wɔ me mu.
Mekɔ sɛ sunsum a ɛrekɔtɔ,
woawoso me atwene sɛ ntutummɛ.
Abuada nti me nkotodwe popo,
na me honam afɔn, emu sradeɛ asa.
Na me deɛ, madane ahohora mama wɔn,
wɔhwɛ me a, wɔwoso wɔn ti.
Boa me, AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn,
gye me sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ,
na wɔnhunu sɛ wo nsa ni,
sɛ wo, AWURADE, na woyɛeɛ.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔdome, na wo deɛ, wohyira.
Wɔsɔre, na wɔn ani wu, na w’akoa deɛ, n’ani gye.
Me ho asɛmpɛfoɔ bɛhyɛ aniwuo,
na wɔafira wɔn ahohora sɛ ntoma.
Mede m’ano bɛkamfo AWURADE pii,
mɛto ayeyie dwom mama no nnipa bebree mu,
sɛ ɔgyina ohiani nifa,
na ɔregye no afiri wɔn a wɔbu ne kra atɛn nsam.
AWURADE asɛm a ɔse me wura nie:
Tena me nifa kɔsi sɛ mede w’atamfo
bɛyɛ wo nan ase ntiasoɔ.
Wo tumidie poma no,
AWURADE firi Sion bɛtene.
“Di hene w’atamfo mfimfini!”
Wo man bɛyi wɔn yam koraa aba wo koda no,
aduradeɛ kronkron mu,
wo mmeranteɛ asafo
ba ma wo sɛ obosuo
firi adekyeeɛ yam.
AWURADE aka ntam,
na ɔrennu ne ho:
Woyɛ daapem sɔfoɔ,
Melkisedek dibea so.
AWURADE a ɔwɔ wo nifa soɔ no
bɛbobɔ ahemfo, n’abufuo da no.
Ɔbɛdi amanaman mu asɛm,
ɔbɛma afunu ahyɛ hɔ ma.
Ɔbɛbobɔ tire
asase a ɛtrɛ so.
Ɔbɛnom kwan ho asutene mu nsuo,
enti na ɔbɛma ne tiri soɔ.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Mede m’akoma nyinaa bɛkamfo AWURADE,
ateneneefoɔ dwabɔ ne asafo mu.
AWURADE nneyɛɛ yɛ akɛseɛ,
wɔn a ɛyɛ wɔn fɛ nyinaa hwehwɛ akyiri kwan.
N’adwuma yɛ anidie ne animuonyam,
na ne tenenee gyina hɔ daa.
Wama wɔakae n’anwanwadeɛ,
ɔdomfoɔ ne mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne AWURADE.
Ɔma wɔn a wɔsuro no didi mee,
ɔkae n’apam daapem.
Wayi ne nneyɛɛ tumi akyerɛ ne man
de amanaman agyapadeɛ ama wɔn.
Ne nsa ano nneyɛɛ yɛ nokorɛ ne atemmuo,
n’ahyɛdeɛ nyinaa tim hɔ pintinn.
Ɛtintim hɔ daa daa,
wɔayɛ no nokorɛ ne tee mu.
Wasoma ɔgyeɛ abrɛ ne man,
wahyɛ n’apam de kɔsi daa,
ne din yɛ kronkron, na ɛho yɛ hu.
Nyansa mfitiaseɛ ne AWURADE suro,
ɛyɛ nhunumu pa ma wɔn a wɔdi soɔ nyinaa,
n’ayeyie gyina hɔ daa.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Nhyira ne onipa a ɔsuro AWURADE,
na ɔnya ne mmara ho anika pii.
N’asefoɔ bɛyɛ kɛseɛ asase so,
wɔhyira teneneefoɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ.
Adeɛ ne ahonya wɔ ne fie,
na ne tenenee wɔ hɔ daa.
Hann pue sum mu ma nnipa tenenee,
ɔne ɔdomfoɔ, mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne ɔteneneeni.
Onipa a ɔyɛ adom na ɔde fɛm, ɛsi no yie,
ɔbɛwie ne nsɛm di, atemmuo mu.
Na ɔrenhinhim da biara da,
ɔteneneeni bɛyɛ daa nkaeɛ.
Akwanmusɛmmɔne renyi no hu,
n’akoma si hɔ pintinn da AWURADE so.
N’akoma atim, ɔrensuro
kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛhunu deɛ ɔpɛ, n’ahohiahiafoɔ soɔ.
Ɔto pete, ɔyɛ ahiafoɔ yie;
ne tenenee wɔ hɔ daa,
wɔbɛma n’abɛn so, animuonyam mu.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ bɛhunu ama no ayɛ no ahi,
ɔbɛtwɛre ne se na wahodwo,
abɔnefoɔ adeɛ a wɔpɛ bɛyera.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Mo AWURADE nkoa, monyi ayɛ,
monyi AWURADE din ayɛ.
Nhyira nka AWURADE din
mfiri nnɛ nkɔsi daa.
Ɛfiri owiapueeɛ kɔpem n’atɔeɛ,
AWURADE din sɛ ayeyie.
Wɔama AWURADE so amanaman nyinaa so,
n’animuonyam tra ɔsoro.
Hwan na ɔte sɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn
a ne tenabea wɔ soro,
na ɔbrɛ ne ho ase hwɛ fam,
ɔsoro ne asase soɔ?
Ɔma mmɔborɔni so firi mfuturo mu,
na ɔma ohiani so firi sumina so,
sɛ ɔde no bɛtena mmapɔmma nkyɛn,
ne man mu mmapɔmma.
Ɔma ɔbaabonini nya efie tena mu,
na ɔyɛ ɔbaatan a n’ani gyeɛ.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Israel firii Misraim,
na Yakob fiefoɔ firii ananafoɔ man mu no,
Yuda yɛɛ ne kronkronbea,
na Israel yɛɛ ne tumidibea.
Ɛpo hunui, na ɛdwanee,
Yordan sanee n’akyi.
Na nkokoɔ yɛɛ sɛ nnwammaa.
Mmepɔ hurihurii sɛ adwennini,
Ɛpo, ɛdeɛn na ɛyɛɛ woɔ na woredwane,
na wo Yordan nso, woresane w’akyire yi?
Mo mmepɔ, sɛ morehurihuri sɛ adwennini,
na mo nkokoɔ, moreyɛ sɛ nnwammaa yi?
Asase, popo AWURADE anim,
Yakob Nyankopɔn anim.
Na twerɛboɔ yɛɛ nsuo aniwa.
Ɔno na ɔdanee ɔbotan maa no yɛɛ ɔtadeɛ.
Ɛnyɛ yɛn, AWURADE, ɛnyɛ yɛn,
na wo din mmom na animuonyam nka,
w’adɔeɛ nti, wo nokorɛ nti.
Adɛn na amanaman nka sɛ:
Ɛhe ara na wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ?
Na yɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ ɔsoro,
deɛ ɔpɛ nyinaa na ɔyɛ.
Wɔn ahoni yɛ dwetɛ ne sika,
nnipa nsa ano adwuma.
Wɔwɔ ano, na wɔnkasa,
wɔwɔ ani, na wɔnhunu adeɛ,
wɔwɔ aso, na wɔnte asɛm,
wɔwɔ hwene, na wɔnte hwa.
Wɔn nsa, wɔmfa nka adeɛ,
wɔn nan, wɔmfa nnante,
na wɔmfa wɔn menewa nkasa.
Wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn te sɛ wɔn ara,
obiara a ɔde ne ho to wɔn soɔ no.
Israel, fa wo ho to AWURADE so.
Wo mmoa ne wo kyɛm ne no.
Aaron fie, momfa mo ho nto AWURADE so.
Mo mmoa ne mo kyɛm ne no.
Mo a mosuro AWURADE, momfa mo ho nto AWURADE so.
Mo mmoa ne mo kyɛm ne no.
AWURADE akae yɛn, ɔbɛhyira yɛn,
ɔbɛhyira Israel fie, ɔbɛhyira Aaron fie,
ɔbɛhyira wɔn a wɔsuro AWURADE,
nketewa ne akɛseɛ nyinaa.
AWURADE bɛma mo adɔɔso,
mo ne mo mma.
Moyɛ nnipa a wɔahyira wɔn ama AWURADE,
ɔsoro ne asase yɛfoɔ no.
Ɔsoro yɛ AWURADE soro,
na asase deɛ, ɔde ama nnipa mma.
Ɛnyɛ awufoɔ na ɛbɛyi AWURADE ayɛ,
na ɛnyɛ wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ kommyɛ mu biara.
Na yɛn deɛ, yɛbɛhyira AWURADE
afiri nnɛ akɔsi daa.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Medɔ AWURADE sɛ ɔtie me nne
ne me nkotosrɛ.
Na wabrɛ n’aso ase ama me,
enti mete ase yi, mɛbɔ ne din.
Owuo nhoma kyekyeree me,
na Asamando ahohia too me,
mehunuu ahodwan ne awerɛhoɔ.
Na AWURADE din na mebɔɔ sɛ:
O AWURADE, mesrɛ wo, gye me kra.
Ɔdomfoɔ ne teneneeni ne AWURADE,
aane, yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ mmɔborɔhunufoɔ.
AWURADE hwɛ awiɛmfoɔ,
mehodwoe, na ɔgyee me nkwa.
Me kra, sane kɔ wo home mu,
na AWURADE ne wo adi no yie.
Na woayi me kra afiri owuo mu,
m’ani afiri nisuo mu,
ne me nan afiri ahweaseɛ mu.
Mɛnante AWURADE anim,
ateasefoɔ asase so.
Magye madi, mpo berɛ a mekaa sɛ:
Me deɛ, meyɛ mmɔbɔ sɛ!
Mekaa m’akomatuo mu sɛ:
Nnipa nyinaa yɛ atorofoɔ.
Ɛdeɛn na mede bɛhyɛ AWURADE ananmu,
ne yie a ɔyɛ me nyinaa ho?
Mɛma nkwagyeɛ kuruwa so,
na mabɔ AWURADE din.
Mede m’aboadeɛ bɛma AWURADE,
ne man nyinaa anim.
AWURADE ahotefoɔ wuo deɛ,
ne boɔ yɛ den n’anim.
O AWURADE, meyɛ w’akoa,
meyɛ w’akoa, w’afenaa ba;
woasane me nhoma.
Wo na mɛbɔ wo aseda afɔdeɛ,
na mabɔ AWURADE din.
Mede m’aboadeɛ bɛma AWURADE,
ne man nyinaa anim,
AWURADE fie adihɔ,
wo, Yerusalem, mfimfini.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Amanaman nyinaa, monyi AWURADE ayɛ,
aman nyinaa, monkamfo no.
Na n’adɔeɛ so yɛn so,
na AWURADE nokorɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ.
Monna AWURADE ase, na ɔyɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ma Israel nka ɛ:
Aane, n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ma Aaron fiefoɔ nka ɛ:
Aane, n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ma wɔn a wɔsuro AWURADE nka ɛ:
Aane, n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Mefiri ahohia mu mefrɛɛ AWURADE,
na AWURADE gyee me so, deɛ ɛhɔ trɛ.
AWURADE wɔ m’afa, mensuro,
ɛdeɛn na onipa bɛtumi ayɛ me?
AWURADE wɔ m’afa sɛ me boafoɔ,
na me nso mɛhunu deɛ mepɛ m’atamfoɔ soɔ.
Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔtwere AWURADE
sene sɛ wɔde wɔn ho bɛto nnipa soɔ.
Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔtwere AWURADE
sene sɛ wɔde wɔn ho bɛto ahemfo soɔ.
Amanaman nyinaa atwa me ho ahyia,
AWURADE din mu ara na mɛtwitwa wɔn maguo.
Wɔatwa me ho ahyia awie koraa mpo,
nanso AWURADE din mu ara na mɛtwitwa wɔn maguo.
Wɔatwa me ho ahyia sɛ nwowa,
wɔbɛdum sɛ nkasɛɛ mu gya,
AWURADE din mu ara na mɛtwitwa wɔn maguo.
Wɔwɔɔ me nkonsia sɛ anka menhwe ase,
nanso AWURADE aboa me.
M’ahoɔden ne m’ayeyie dwom ne AWURADE,
na wayɛ me nkwagyeɛ.
Osebɔ ne nim gyegye ateneneefoɔ ntomadan mu,
AWURADE nifa di mmaninsɛm.
Wɔama AWURADE nifa so,
AWURADE nifa di mmaninsɛm.
Merenwu, na mmom mɛnya nkwa,
na maka AWURADE nneyɛɛ makyerɛ.
Aso na AWURADE atwe me,
na owuo deɛ, wamfa me amma no.
Monhini tenenee aponkɛseɛ mma me,
na menhyɛne mu
menna AWURADE ase.
AWURADE ponkɛseɛ nie,
ateneneefoɔ bɛhyɛne mu.
Meda wo ase sɛ woagye me soɔ,
na woayɛ me nkwagyeɛ.
Ɔboɔ a abantofoɔ apa no
abɛyɛ tweaso boɔ titire.
AWURADE na ɔmaa yei yɛeɛ,
ɛyɛ nwanwa yɛn ani so.
Yei ne da a AWURADE ayɛ,
momma yɛnni ahurisie,
na yɛn ani nnye wɔ mu.
O AWURADE, gye nkwa ɛ,
O AWURADE, ma no nsi yie!
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam AWURADE din mu reba no,
yɛfiri AWURADE fie rehyira mo.
AWURADE ne Onyankopɔn,
wama hann ahyerɛn ama yɛn.
Momfa dua mman ntwa afahyɛ asefoɔ no ho nhyia
nkɔduru afɔrebukyia no mmɛn ho.
Me Nyankopɔn ne wo, na mɛda wo ase,
me Nyankopɔn ne wo, mɛma wo so.
Monna AWURADE ase, na ɔyɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn kwan yɛ pɛ,
na wɔnam AWURADE mmara soɔ.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔhwɛ n’adansesɛm soɔ,
na wɔde wɔn akoma nyinaa di akyire,
nso wɔnyɛ amumuyɛdeɛ,
na wɔnam n’akwan soɔ.
Wo na wode wo nsiesieeɛ ahyɛ yɛn
sɛ yɛnni so koraa.
O, sɛ wɔtenetene m’akwan,
na medi w’ahyɛdeɛ so ɛ!
Sɛ mehwɛ wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa a,
ɛnneɛ anka m’ani renwu.
Mede akoma tee bɛda wo ase
sɛ meresua wo tenenee atemmudeɛ no.
Mɛdi w’ahyɛdeɛ so,
nnya me korakora.
Ɛdeɛn na aberanteɛ de bɛte ne kwan ho?
Ɛne sɛ ɔhwɛ ne ho so sɛdeɛ wo nsɛm seɛ.
Mede m’akoma nyinaa mɛdi w’akyi,
mma memmfiri wo mmara nsɛm ho mennkyini.
Mede wo nsɛm makora m’akomam,
na manyɛ wo ho bɔne bi.
Nhyira ne wo, AWURADE,
kyerɛkyerɛ me w’ahyɛdeɛ.
Mede m’ano maka
w’anomu atemmuo nyinaa.
W’adansesɛm kwan mu na m’ani gyeɛ,
sɛdeɛ ɛgye ahonyadeɛ bi ho.
Meredwene wo nsiesieeɛ ho,
na merehwɛ w’akwan.
W’ahyɛdeɛ ho na me ho sɛpɛ me,
me werɛ remfiri wo nsɛm.
Yɛ w’akoa yie, na mennya nkwa,
na madi wo nsɛm so.
Bue m’ani,
na menhwɛ wo mmara mu anwanwadeɛ.
Meyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ asase so,
mfa wo mmara nsɛm nhunta me.
Me kra posa daa nyinaa,
w’atemmuo ho anigyina mu.
Woateatea ahantanfoɔ a wɔadome wɔn
a wɔfom firi wo mmara nsɛm ho no.
Yi ahohora ne aniwuo firi me so,
na madi w’adansesɛm so.
Aman mpanin nso tena ase keka me ho nsɛm a,
w’akoa bɛdwene w’ahyɛdeɛ ho.
W’adansesɛm yɛ m’adɔdeɛ,
na ɛyɛ m’agyinatufoɔ.
Me kra aka fam,
ma mennya nkwa sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Maka m’akwan makyerɛ, na woagye me so,
ma mensua w’ahyɛdeɛ.
Ma menhunu wo nsiesieeɛ kwan mu,
na mennwene w’anwanwadeɛ ho.
Awerɛhoɔ ama me kra anane,
ma me so sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Yi atorɔ kwan firi me ho,
na fa wo mmara dom me.
Mafa nokorɛdie kwan,
mede w’atemmudeɛ magu m’anim.
Matim w’adansesɛm mu,
AWURADE, mma m’ani nnwu.
Metu wo mmara nsɛm kwan so mmirika,
na wotrɛ m’akomam.
AWURADE, kyerɛ me w’ahyɛdeɛ kwan,
na mafa so makɔsi aseɛ.
Ma menhunu mu, na madi wo mmara so,
na mede m’akoma nyinaa bɛdi so.
Ma memfa wo mmara nsɛm kwan so,
na ɛno na ɛsɔ m’ani.
Kom m’akoma kɔ w’adansesɛm so,
na ɛnyɛ sikanibereɛ so.
Ma m’ani nsiane adehunu hwɛ ho,
ma mennya wo kwan mu nkwa.
Hyɛ w’asɛm mu den ma w’akoa
a ɔde ne ho ama wo suro.
Ma m’ahohora a ɛyɛ me hu nsiane me ho,
na w’atemmudeɛ yɛ.
Hwɛ, mafe wo nsiesieeɛ,
ma mennya wo tenenee mu nkwa.
AWURADE, ma w’adɔeɛ mmra mma me,
ne wo nkwagyeɛ sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Na manya asɛm bi mabua deɛ ɔbɔ me ahohora,
na mede me ho meto w’asɛm so.
Na nyi nokwasɛm no mfiri m’anomu koraa,
na w’atemmudeɛ so na m’ani da.
Na mɛdi wo mmara so ara
daa akɔsi daa ne daapem,
na mɛnante tɛtrɛtɛ mu,
na medi wo nsiesieeɛ akyi.
Na mɛka w’adanseɛ ho asɛm ahemfo anim,
na m’ani renwu.
Na me ho bɛsɛpɛ me wo mmara nsɛm ho,
na ɛno na madɔ,
na mɛma me nsa so wo mmara nsɛm a madɔ no ho,
na madwene w’ahyɛdeɛ ho.
Kae asɛm a woka kyerɛɛ w’akoa no,
ɛfiri sɛ womaa mede m’ani metoo so.
Yei ne m’awerɛkyekyerɛ m’amanehunu mu,
ɛfiri sɛ w’asɛm ma menya nkwa.
Ahantanfoɔ de me ayɛ fɛdie pii,
mennane memfirii wo mmara ho.
AWURADE, mekae w’atemmuo a ɛfiri teteete no,
na mekyekyere me werɛ.
Abufuhyeɛ hyɛ me so,
abɔnefoɔ a wɔgya wo mmara no nti.
W’ahyɛdeɛ adane me nnwom,
m’ahɔhoyɛ fie mu.
AWURADE, mekae wo din anadwo,
na medi wo mmara so.
Yei ayɛ me adeɛ,
sɛ mekura wo nsiesieeɛ mu.
AWURADE, me kyɛfa ne wo,
maka sɛ mɛdi wo nsɛm so.
Mede m’akoma nyinaa masrɛ wo:
Dom me sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Meda medwene m’akwan ho,
na medane me nan mekyerɛ w’adansesɛm.
Meyɛ ntɛm, na mentwentwɛn me nan ase,
sɛ mɛdi wo mmara nsɛm soɔ.
Abɔnefoɔ nhoma abebare me ho,
me werɛ mfirii wo mmara.
Mesɔre dasuom meda wo ase,
wo tenenee atemmudeɛ ho.
Meyɛ wɔn a wɔsuro woɔ nyinaa adamfo,
ɛne wɔn a wɔdi wo nsiesieeɛ soɔ.
AWURADE, w’adɔeɛ ahyɛ asase ma,
ma mensua w’ahyɛdeɛ.
Wo ne w’akoa adi no yie, AWURADE,
sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Kyerɛkyerɛ me nhunumu pa ne nimdeɛ,
na magye wo mmara nsɛm madi.
Wɔnnya mmrɛɛ me aseɛ no, mefomee,
na afei medi w’asɛm so.
Woyɛ, na woyɛ yie,
kyerɛkyerɛ me w’ahyɛdeɛ.
Ahantanfoɔ atoatoa atorɔ ato me so,
me deɛ, mede m’akoma nyinaa mesɔ wo nsiesieeɛ mu.
Wɔn akoma apirim sɛ sradeɛ,
me deɛ, wo mmara ho na me ho sɛpɛ me.
Ɛyɛ ma me sɛ wobrɛɛ me aseɛ,
na ama masua w’ahyɛdeɛ.
W’anomu mmara yɛ ma me
sene sika ne dwetɛ mpempem.
Wo nsa na ɛyɛɛ me na ɛsiesiee me,
ma me nteaseɛ, na mensua wo mmara nsɛm.
Wɔn a wɔsuro woɔ bɛhu me na wɔn ani agye,
na w’asɛm so na m’ani da.
AWURADE, mahunu sɛ w’atemmuo yɛ tenenee,
na wode nokorɛdie abrɛ me ase.
Ma w’adɔeɛ nyɛ me awerɛkyekyerɛ ɛ,
sɛdeɛ wokaa w’akoa no.
Ma wo mmɔborɔhunu mmra me so na mennya nkwa,
na wo mmara ne m’anika.
Ma ahantanfoɔ ani nwu
sɛ wɔbrɛɛ me ase nkontompo soɔ.
Me deɛ, mɛdwene wo nsiesieeɛ ho.
Ma wɔn a wɔsuro woɔ nnane mmra me nkyɛn,
ne wɔn a wɔnim w’adansesɛm no.
Ma m’akoma nyɛ pɛ w’ahyɛdeɛ mu,
na m’anim angu ase.
Me kra tɔ wo nkwagyeɛ ho piti,
w’asɛm so na m’ani da.
W’asɛm nti m’ani ayɛ siamoo.
Mese: Da bɛn na wobɛkyekyere me werɛ?
Na mayɛ sɛ toa a ɛwɔ wisie mu,
nanso me werɛ mfiri w’ahyɛdeɛ.
W’akoa nna si ahe?
Da bɛn na wobɛbu wɔn a wɔtaa me atɛn?
Ahantanfoɔ atutu amena ama me,
wɔn a wɔnte sɛdeɛ wo mmara kyerɛ.
Wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokorɛ.
Wɔtaa me nkontompo so, boa me!
Aka kumaa na wɔahye me awie asase so,
na me deɛ, mennya wo nsiesieeɛ.
W’adɔeɛ nti ma mennya nkwa,
na madi w’anomu adanseɛ so.
AWURADE, w’asɛm tim hɔ daa wɔ,
ɔsoro.
Wo nokorɛdie wɔ hɔ ma awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa,
woasiesie asase, na ɛgyina hɔ.
Ɛgyina hɔ nnɛ sɛdeɛ w’atemmuo teɛ,
na nnoɔma nyinaa yɛ w’asomfoɔ.
Sɛ wo mmara anyɛ m’adɔdeɛ a,
anka masɛe m’amaneɛ mu.
Me werɛ remfiri wo nsiesieeɛ ara da,
na ɛno so na wonam ma menya nkwa.
Meyɛ wo dea, gye me nkwa,
na medi wo nsiesieeɛ akyi.
Abɔnefoɔ retɛ me asɛe me.
Me deɛ, m’ani ku w’adansesɛm ho.
Mahunu pɛyɛ nyinaa awieeɛ,
wo mmara nsɛm trɛ pii.
Sɛdeɛ mesi dɔ wo mmara!
Ɛno ne m’adwene da mu nyinaa.
Wo mmara nsɛm ayɛ me onyansafoɔ asene m’atamfoɔ,
na ɛwɔ me daa.
Mewɔ nimdeɛ mesene m’akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nyinaa,
na w’adansesɛm ne m’adwene.
Mehunu adeɛ mu mesene mpanimfoɔ,
na mehwɛ wo nsiesieeɛ medi so.
Masianka me nan mafiri kwammɔne nyinaa so,
na madi w’asɛm so.
Memmane memfirii w’atemmuo ho,
na wo na woakyerɛkyerɛ me.
Sɛdeɛ wo nsɛm si yɛ me dodom dɛ!
Ɛsene sɛdeɛ ɛwoɔ yɛ m’anomu.
Wo nsiesieeɛ mu na menya nhunumu,
enti mekyiri nkontompo kwan nyinaa.
W’asɛm yɛ me nan ase kanea,
ne me kwan so hann.
Maka ntam, na mɛma no agyina,
sɛ mɛdi wo tenenee atemmudeɛ so.
Wɔabrɛ me ase dodo,
AWURADE, ma mennya nkwa sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
AWURADE, ma w’ani nsɔ m’anomu ayamyie afɔdeɛ ɛ,
na ma mensua w’atemmudeɛ.
Me kra da me nsam daa,
nanso me werɛ mfiri wo mmara.
Abɔnefoɔ asum me fidie,
nanso memfom wo nsiesieeɛ kwan ho.
Mafa w’adansesɛm mayɛ m’agyapadeɛ daa,
na ɛno na ɛma m’akoma ani gyeɛ.
Makom m’akoma sɛ mɛyɛ w’ahyɛdeɛ daa
makɔsi aseɛ.
Mekyiri adwene ntantafoɔ,
na medɔ wo mmara.
Me dwanekɔbea ne me kyɛm ne wo,
m’ani da w’asɛm so.
Nnebɔneyɛfoɔ, momfiri me so,
na madi me Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so.
Wowa me sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ, na manya nkwa,
na mma m’ani nnwu, me kwanhwɛ mu.
Sɔ me mu, na manya nkwagyeɛ,
na mahwɛ w’ahyɛdeɛ no daa.
Wobu wɔn a wɔfom w’ahyɛdeɛ nyinaa animtia,
na nkontompo nko ne wɔn nsisie.
Woyi asase so abɔnefoɔ nyinaa hɔ sɛ dadebini,
enti na medɔ w’adansesɛm.
Wo ho hu ma me honam popo,
na mesuro w’atemmudeɛ.
Mayɛ atemmuo ne tenenee,
nnya me mma wɔn a wɔhyɛ me soɔ.
Di agyinamu pa ma w’akoa,
mma ahantanfoɔ nnni me amim.
M’ani ayɛ siamoo repɛ wo nkwagyeɛ
ne wo tenenee asɛm no.
Wo ne w’akoa nni no sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ,
na ma mensua w’ahyɛdeɛ.
W’akoa ne me, ma me nteaseɛ,
na menhunu w’adansesɛm.
Berɛ aduru sɛ AWURADE yɛ biribie,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔatu wo mmara agu.
Enti medɔ wo mmara nsɛm
sene sika kɔkɔɔ ne amapa.
Enti mebu ade nyinaa mu nsiesieeɛ nyinaa sɛ ɛtene,
metane nkontompo kwan nyinaa.
W’adansesɛm yɛ nwanwa,
enti na me kra di soɔ.
Wo nsɛm mu bue ma hann,
ɛma nkwaseafoɔ hunu nyansa.
Mebue m’anomu haa mepere,
ɛfiri sɛ m’ani gyina wo mmara nsɛm.
Dane w’ani kyerɛ me, na dom me,
sɛdeɛ woyɛ wɔn a wɔdɔ wo din no.
Ma m’anammɔn ntim w’asɛm mu,
na mma amumuyɛ biara nnni me so.
Yi me firi onipa nhyɛsoɔ mu,
na menni wo nsiesieeɛ so.
Ma w’anim nhran w’akoa so,
na ma mensua w’ahyɛdeɛ.
Asutene sene m’aniwa mu gu,
ɛfiri sɛ nnipa nni wo mmara so.
Ɔteneneeni ne wo, AWURADE,
na w’atemmudeɛ nso tene.
Woahyɛ w’adansesɛm, tenenee mu
ne nokorɛdie kɛseɛ mu.
Me mmɔdemmɔ redɛre me mu sɛ ogya,
