ɛfiri sɛ m’ahohiahiafoɔ werɛ afiri wo nsɛm.
W’asɛm yɛ gyenegyene pii,
na w’akoa dɔ no.
Mesua, na memfra,
nanso me werɛ mfiri wo nsiesieeɛ.
Wo tenenee yɛ daa tenenee,
na wo mmara yɛ nokorɛ.
Ahohia ne ahoyera ato me,
nanso wo mmara nsɛm ne m’adɔdeɛ.
W’adansesɛm yɛ tenenee daa,
ma me nteaseɛ, na mennya nkwa.
Mede m’akoma nyinaa mesu mefrɛ:
Gye me so.
AWURADE, mɛdi w’ahyɛdeɛ so.
Mesu mefrɛ wo: Bɛgye me,
na madi w’adansesɛm so.
Metua anɔpahema meteam,
m’ani da w’asɛm so.
M’ani di adasuo anim
sɛ mɛdwene w’asɛm ho.
Tie me sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ.
AWURADE, ma mennya nkwa sɛdeɛ w’atemmudeɛ teɛ.
Wɔn a wɔdi mmusuo akyire twe bɛn,
wɔne wo mmara ntam ware.
AWURADE, wo nso wobɛn,
na wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokorɛ.
Mehunuu w’adansesɛm mu akyɛ,
sɛ woama no atim sɛ ɛnsi hɔ daa.
Hwɛ m’amanehunu, na yi me,
na me werɛ mfiri wo mmara.
Di m’asɛm ma me, na gye me,
ma mennya nkwa sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Abɔnefoɔ ne nkwagyeɛ ntam ware,
na wɔnhwehwɛ w’ahyɛdeɛ akyiri kwan.
Wo mmɔborɔhunu dɔɔso, AWURADE,
ma mennya nkwa sɛdeɛ w’atemmudeɛ teɛ.
M’ataafoɔ ne m’ahohiahiafoɔ dɔɔso
nanso mentwe memfirii w’adansesɛm ho.
Mehunu nnabrabafoɔ nkontompofoɔ a,
wɔn ho yɛ me nwunu,
sɛ wɔnni w’asɛm soɔ.
Hwɛ sɛdeɛ medɔ wo nsiesieeɛ, AWURADE,
ma mennya nkwa sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ.
W’asɛm ntoano yɛ nokorɛ,
na wo tenenee atemmuo nyinaa wɔ hɔ daa.
Aman mpanin ti me kwa,
nanso w’asɛm nko na mesuro.
M’ani ka w’asɛm ho
sɛdeɛ wanya asadeɛ pii.
Metane atorɔ, na mekyi,
wo mmara na medɔ.
Da koro meyi wo ayɛ mprɛnson,
wo tenenee atemmuo ho.
Asomdwoeɛ pii wɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ wo mmara,
na biribi ntoatoa wɔn.
Mehwɛ wo nkwagyeɛ kwan, AWURADE,
na madi wo mmara nsɛm so.
Me kra di w’adansesɛm so,
na medɔ no kɛse.
Medi wo nsiesieeɛ ne w’adansesɛm so,
na m’akwan nyinaa wɔ w’anim.
AWURADE, ma me nteamu nnuru w’anim,
ma me nteaseɛ sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
Ma me nkotosrɛ mmra w’anim,
gye me sɛdeɛ w’asɛm teɛ.
M’ano bɛworo w’ayeyie,
sɛ wokyerɛkyerɛ me w’ahyɛdeɛ.
Me tɛkyerɛma bɛgye w’asɛm so,
na wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa yɛ tenenee.
Ma wo nsa mmɛboa me,
na wo nsiesieeɛ na mayie.
Mefe wo nkwagyeɛ, AWURADE,
na wo mmara ne m’adɔdeɛ.
Ma me kra ntena ase nyi wo ayɛ,
na w’atemmuo mmoa me.
Mafom kwan sɛ odwan a wayera,
hwehwɛ w’akoa, na me werɛ mfiri wo mmara nsɛm.
AWURADE na m’ahohia mu mesu mefrɛɛ no,
na ɔtiee me.
AWURADE, yi me kra
firi atorɔ ano,
firi nnaadaa tɛkyerɛma mu.
Ɛdeɛn na wɔmfa mma woɔ,
na ɛdeɛn na wɔmfa nka wo ho,
wo nnaadaa tɛkyerɛma?
Ɔbrane agyan hwerɛmhwerɛm
ne ogya nsramma kɔɔ na ɛbɛyɛ wo kyɛfa.
Mennue sɛ mabɛsoɛ Mesek
na matena Kedar ntomadan mu!
Me kra ne wɔn a wɔtane asomdwoeɛ
atena akyɛre dodo.
Me deɛ, meyɛ asomdwoeɛni,
nanso sɛ mekasa a,
wɔn deɛ, wɔpɛ ɔko.
Mɛma m’ani so makyerɛ mmepɔ no,
ɛhe na me mmoa firi bɛba?
Me mmoa firi AWURADE,
ɔsoro ne asase yɛfoɔ no.
Ɔremma wo nan nwatiri,
deɛ ɔhwɛ woɔ no rentɔ nko.
Hwɛ, deɛ ɔhwɛ Israel no,
ɔrento nko, na ɔrenna.
AWURADE ne wo hwɛfoɔ,
AWURADE ne wo nwunu,
wo nsa nifa so.
Owia renhye wo awia,
anaa ɔsrane, anadwo.
AWURADE bɛhwɛ wo so bɔne nyinaa ho,
ɔbɛhwɛ wo kra so.
AWURADE bɛhwɛ
w’adifire ne wo fieba so
afiri seesei de akɔsi daa.
M’ani gyee sɛ wɔsee me sɛ:
Ma yɛnkɔ AWURADE fie.
Yɛn nan bɛgyina
w’aponkɛseɛ mu, ao, Yerusalem.
Yerusalem a wɔakyekyere no
sɛ kuro a ɛtoatoam yie.
Ɛhɔ na mmusuakuo no nante korɔ,
mekyerɛ AWURADE mmusuakuo,
sɛ wɔrekɔyi AWURADE din ayɛ,
sɛdeɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔde ama Israel teɛ no.
Ɛhɔ na wɔde nkonnwa sisi maa atemmuo,
Dawid fie nkonnwa no.
Monsrɛ ma Yerusalem asomdwoeɛ,
ɛnsi w’adɔfo yie.
Asomdwoeɛ ntena w’afasuo mu,
na yiedie ntena w’aban mu.
Me nuanom ne me mfɛfoɔ nti
mɛka sɛ asomdwoeɛ ntena wo mu.
AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn fie nti
mɛhwehwɛ papa mama wo.
Wo na mema m’ani so mehwɛ woɔ,
wo a wote soro no,
Hwɛ, sɛdeɛ nkoa
ani hwɛ wɔn wura nsa ano,
sɛ afenaa
ani hwɛ n’awuraa nsa ano no,
sɛ yɛn ani hwɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn ne no,
kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛdom yɛn.
Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ, AWURADE bɛhu yɛn mmɔbɔ,
na aniwuhyɛ afono yɛn dodo.
Taamudifoɔ fɛdie
ne ahantanfoɔ aniwuhyɛ
afono yɛn kra dodo.
Sɛ ɛnyɛ AWURADE na ɔwɔ yɛn afa a,
ma Israel nka ɛ:
Sɛ ɛnyɛ AWURADE na ɔwɔ yɛn afa,
berɛ a nnipa sɔre tiaa yɛn no a,
anka wɔn abufuo dɔ tiaa yɛn no,
wɔamemmene yɛn animono,
anka nsuo amene yɛn,
anka asubɔnten abɔ afa yɛn kra so,
anka nsuo a ɛyɛ ahantan
abɔ afa yɛn kra so.
Nhyira ne AWURADE
a wamfa yɛn anyɛ
hanam amma wɔn se.
Yɛn kra adwane sɛ anomaa
afiri afirisumfoɔ fidie mu,
fidie no abubu,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛadwane.
Yɛn mmoa wɔ AWURADE
a ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase no din mu.
Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to AWURADE soɔ no
te sɛ Sion bepɔ,
ɛnhinhim, na ɛsi hɔ daa.
Sɛdeɛ Yerusalem, mmepɔ atwa ho ahyia no,
saa ara na AWURADE atwa ne man ho ahyia
firi seesei de kɔsi daa.
Na bɔne ahempoma rentena
ateneneefoɔ kyɛfa so,
na ateneneefoɔ antene
wɔn nsa ansɔ amumuyɛ mu.
AWURADE, yɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ no yie,
ne wɔn a wɔtene wɔ wɔn akoma mu.
Na wɔn a wɔmane kɔ wɔn akwan nkontonkyi soɔ deɛ,
AWURADE de wɔn bɛfra amumuyɛfoɔ akɔ.
Asomdwoeɛ mmra Israel so.
Berɛ a AWURADE de Sion firi nnommum sane baeɛ no,
yɛyɛɛ sɛ adaeɛsofoɔ.
Ɛno na sereɛ hyɛɛ yɛn anomu ma,
na anigyeɛ dwom hyɛɛ yɛn tɛkyerɛma so ma.
Ɛno na wɔkaa no amanaman mu sɛ:
AWURADE ayɛ ade kɛseɛ ama wɔn.
AWURADE ayɛ ade kɛseɛ ama yɛn,
yɛn ani agye.
AWURADE, fa yɛn firi nnommum sane bra
sɛ anafoɔ fam asase so asutene.
Wɔn a wɔde nisuo guo
de ahurisie bɛtwa.
Sɛ mpo wɔde nisuo nenam
kura aba a wɔguo no a,
wɔde ahurisie bɛkura
n’ayemfi aba.
Sɛ AWURADE ansi dan no a,
wɔn a wɔsie yɛ ho adwuma kwa.
Sɛ AWURADE anwɛn kuro no a,
ɔwɛmfoɔ siri ho pɛ kwa.
Kwa ara na motua ahema sɔre na monnye
moahome papa biara, mpo anadwo brɛ.
Na mobrɛ ansa na moanya aduane adi.
Nanso AWURADE siesie de ma n’adɔfoɔ
mpo berɛ a wɔadeda.
Hwɛ, AWURADE agyapadeɛ ne mma,
na yafunu mu aba yɛ akatua.
Sɛ ɔbrane nsam bɛmma teɛ no,
sɛ mmeranteberɛm mma teɛ ne no.
Nhyira ne ɔbarima a
wɔahyɛ n’agyan kotokuo ma,
wɔne wɔn atamfoɔ kasa kuro pono mu a,
wɔn ani renwu.
Nhyira ne obiara a ɔsuro AWURADE,
na ɔfa n’akwan soɔ.
Na wobɛdi wo nsa ano adwuma,
nhyira ne wo, na ɛbɛsi wo yie.
Wo yere yɛ sɛ obobe a ɛso, wo fie mpia mu,
wo mma yɛ sɛ ngodua
a wɔatetɛ atwa wo pono ho ahyia.
Hwɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔhyira onipa a ɔsuro AWURADE nie.
AWURADE mfiri Sion nhyira wo,
na hunu Yerusalem yiedie
wo nkwa nna nyinaa,
aane, na hunu wo mma mma.
Asomdwoeɛ mmra Israel so.
Wɔahiahia me ho pii firi me mmɔfraase,
ma Israel nka ɛ,
wɔahiahia me ho pii firi me mmɔfraase,
nanso wɔantumi me.
Fɛntɛmfoɔ afɛntɛm m’akyi,
wɔama wɔn aka awoware.
Nanso AWURADE tene,
watwitwa abɔnefoɔ homa mu.
Ma wɔn ani nwu
na wɔnsane wɔn akyi,
wɔn a wɔtane Sion nyinaa.
Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ adan atifi wira
a ɛnnya mfefɛeɛ na ahyeɛ,
ɛnhyɛ otwitwafoɔ nsa
anaa ɔkyekyerefoɔ basa mu ma,
na wɔn a wɔtwam mpo nka sɛ:
AWURADE nhyira mmra mo so no,
yɛhyira mo AWURADE din mu.
Mefiri abunu kuronkuron mu mefrɛ wo, AWURADE.
AWURADE, tie me nne,
wɛn w’aso
tie me nkotosrɛ.
AWURADE, sɛ wodi amumuyɛdeɛ akyiri a,
hwan na anka ɔbɛgyina?
Na wo na fakyɛ wɔ wo fam,
na wɔasuro wo.
Mehwɛ AWURADE kwan,
me kra rehwɛ kwan,
na n’asɛm so na m’ani da.
Me kra twɛn AWURADE
sene awɛmfoɔ a wɔtwɛn adekyeeɛ,
sene awɛmfoɔ a wɔtwɛn adekyeeɛ.
Israel, ma w’ani nna AWURADE so,
n’afam na adɔeɛ wɔ,
na ɔgyeɛ a ɛdɔɔso wɔ ne nsam.
Ɔno na ɔbɛgye Israel
afiri n’amumuyɛ nyinaa mu.
AWURADE, m’akoma nyɛ dwaeɛ,
na m’ani ntra ne ntɔn,
na menyɛ apɔmpɔmpɛ,
na menhwehwɛ anwanwadeɛ a ɛkyɛne me.
Ampa, madwodwo me kra mama no ayɛ komm,
sɛ ɔba a wɔatwa no nufoɔ a ɔwɔ ne na ho;
aane me kra te sɛ ɔba a wɔatwa no nufoɔ
Israel, ma w’ani nna AWURADE so
mfiri seesei nkɔsi daa.
AWURADE, kae Dawid
brɛ nyinaa ma no,
sɛdeɛ ɔkaa AWURADE ntam,
na ɔhyɛɛ Yakob tumfoɔ no bɔ sɛ:
Merenkɔ me fie ntomadan mu,
meremforo me mpa so mpia mu,
meremma m’anisuatɛtɛ rentɔ nko,
nso merenna
kɔsi sɛ mɛnya baabi mama AWURADE,
tenabea bi ama Yakob tumfoɔ no ansa.
Hwɛ, yɛkɔtee no Efrata,
yɛkɔhunuu no kwaeɛ asase so.
Momma yɛnkɔ ne tenabea,
nkɔkoto ne nan ntiasoɔ anim ɛ.
AWURADE, sɔre kɔ wo home mu,
wo ne wo tumi adaka no.
Ma w’asɔfoɔ nhyɛ tenenee,
na ma w’ahotefoɔ nni ahurisie.
Ɛsiane w’akoa Dawid nti,
nnane deɛ woasra no no ani.
AWURADE aka Dawid ntam nokorɛ mu
a ɔnnane ani:
Mede wo yafumma mu bi
matena w’adwa so mama wo.
Sɛ wo mma di m’apam
ne m’adanseɛ a mɛkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn no so a,
wɔn mma nso
bɛtena w’adwa so daa.
Na AWURADE ayi Sion,
wapɛ hɔ de ayɛ ne tenabea.
Yei ne me homebea daapem,
ɛha na mɛtena, na mepɛ ha.
Mede nhyira bɛhyira n’adidideɛ,
mɛma n’ahiafoɔ aduane adi amee.
Na mede nkwagyeɛ bɛhyɛ n’asɔfoɔ,
na n’ahotefoɔ bɛto ahurisie dwom.
Ɛhɔ na mɛma abɛn afiri ama Dawid,
masiesie kanea mama deɛ masra no no.
Mɛhyɛ n’atamfo aniwuo,
na ɔno deɛ, n’ahenkyɛ bɛhyerɛn n’atifi.
Hwɛ ɛyɛ a ɛyɛ ne fɛ a ɛyɛ
sɛ anuanom bom tena faako.
Ɛte sɛ aboɔden ngo pa
a wɔhwie guu Aaron apampamu,
ɛsiane guu n’abɔgyesɛ mu,
na ɛsiane guu n’atadeɛ mmuano so.
Ɛte sɛ Hermon bosuo
a ɛsiane gu Sion mmepɔ soɔ,
na ɛhɔ na AWURADE ahyɛ nhyira,
aane, nkwa de kɔsi daa.
Hwɛ, mo AWURADE nkoa
a mogyina AWURADE fie anadwo no,
monhyira AWURADE.
Mommema mo nsa so nkyerɛ kronkronbea hɔ,
na monhyira AWURADE.
AWURADE a ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase no
mfiri Sion nhyira mo.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ.
Monyi AWURADE din ayɛ,
AWURADE nkoa, monyi no ayɛ,
mo a mogyina AWURADE fie,
yɛn Nyankopɔn fie adihɔ.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ, na AWURADE yɛ,
monto dwom mma ne din, na ɛyɛ dɛ.
Na AWURADE ayi Yakob afa,
ɔde Israel ayɛ ne deɛ.
Na me deɛ, menim sɛ AWURADE so,
na yɛn wura sene anyame nyinaa.
Biribiara a AWURADE pɛ no, ɔyɛ,
ɔsoro ne fam,
ɛpo ne abunu nyinaa mu.
Ɔma amununkum firi asase ano ba,
ɔyɛ anyinam ma osutorɔ,
ɔyi mframa firi ne korabea.
Ɔkum Misraim mmakan
firi nnipa so kɔsii mmoa so.
Ɔsomaa nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ
baa wo, Misraim, mfimfini,
Farao ne ne nkoa nyinaa so.
Ɔbobɔɔ amanaman pii,
na ɔkumm ahemfo atumfoɔ,
Amorifoɔ hene Sihon,
ne Basan hene Og,
ne Kanaan ahennie nyinaa,
na ɔde wɔn asase maa sɛ awunnyadeɛ,
ɔde yɛɛ ne man Israel awunnyadeɛ.
AWURADE, wo din wɔ hɔ daa,
AWURADE, wo nkaeɛ tena awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so.
Na AWURADE bɛbu ne man bem,
na ɔbɛhu ne nkoa mmɔbɔ.
Amanaman ahoni yɛ dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ,
nnipa nsa ano nnwuma.
Wɔwɔ ano, nanso wɔnkasa,
wɔwɔ ani, nanso wɔnhunu adeɛ,
wɔwɔ aso, nanso wɔnte asɛm,
nso home biara nni wɔn anomu.
Wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn bɛyɛ sɛ wɔn ara,
obiara a ɔde ne ho to wɔn soɔ no.
Israel fiefoɔ, monhyira AWURADE,
Aaron fiefoɔ, monhyira AWURADE.
Lewi fiefoɔ, monhyira AWURADE,
mo a mosuro AWURADE, monhyira AWURADE.
Wɔmfiri Sion nhyira AWURADE
a ɔte Yerusalem no,
monyi AWURADE ayɛ.
Monna AWURADE ase, na ɔyɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Monna anyame mu Nyankopɔn ase,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Monna awuranom mu AWURADE no ase,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔno nko ara yɛ anwanwadeɛ akɛseɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔde nteaseɛ yɛɛ ɔsoro no,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔde asase trɛɛ nsuo soɔ no,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔyɛɛ akanea akɛseɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Owia, sɛ ɛnni adekyeeɛ so,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ɔsrane ne nsoromma, sɛ ɛnni anadwo so,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔbobɔɔ Misraimfoɔ wɔn mmakan mu,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na ɔyii Israel firii wɔn mu no,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ɔde nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a watene mu na ɛyii wɔn,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔtwitwaa Mmɛwa Po mu asinasini,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na ɔde Israel faa mu,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na ɔkaa Farao ne ne dɔm guu Mmɛwa Po mu,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔgyaa ne man faa ɛserɛ soɔ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔbobɔɔ ahemfo akɛseɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na ɔkunkumm ahemfo animuonyamfoɔ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Amorifoɔ hene Sihon,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na Basan hene Og,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na ɔde wɔn asase maa sɛ apɛgyadeɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ɔde yɛɛ n’akoa Israel apɛgyadeɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Deɛ ɔkaee yɛn yɛn ahobrɛaseɛ mu,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Na ɔgyee yɛn firii yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ nsam,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ɔma honam nyinaa aduane,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Monna ɔsoro Nyankopɔn ase,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Babel nsubɔntene ho,
ɛhɔ na yɛtenaeɛ na yɛsuiɛ
berɛ a yɛkaee Sion no.
Ɛhɔ nsukakye nnua no so
na yɛde yɛn asankuo sensɛneeɛ.
Na ɛhɔ na yɛn nnommumfafoɔ
bisaa yɛn nnwom bi,
na yɛn ateeteefoɔ pɛɛ yɛn hɔ anigyeɛ sɛ:
Monto Sion dwom bi nkyerɛ yɛn.
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛbɛto AWURADE dwom,
ananafoɔ asase so?
Yerusalem, sɛ me werɛ firi wo a,
ma me nifa werɛ mfiri ne ho keka.
Sɛ mankae wo a, ma me tɛkyerɛma mfam me dodom,
sɛ mankae wo a,
sɛ mammu Yerusalem
ankyɛne m’anigyeɛ nyinaa a…!
O AWURADE, kae Yerusalem da no
ma Edom mma,
sɛ wɔsee sɛ: Monnwiri, monnwiri!
Monnwiri nkɔsi ne fapem so!
Babel babaa a wɔayɛ wo pasaa,
nhyira ne deɛ ɔtua wo ka,
sɛdeɛ wode yɛɛ yɛn no.
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔsɔ wo nkɔkoaa mu
pempem ɔbotan.
Mede m’akoma nyinaa bɛda wo ase,
anyame no anim mɛto wo dwom.
Mɛkoto makyerɛ w’asɔrefie kronkron no,
na mada wo din ase,
w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ ho,
sɛ woama w’asɛm aso atra wo din nyinaa.
Da a mesu mefrɛeɛ no, wogyee me so,
wohyɛɛ me den maa me kra nyaa ahoɔden.
AWURADE, asase so ahemfo nyinaa bɛda wo ase,
sɛ wɔate w’anomu nsɛm.
Na wɔbɛto AWURADE akwan ho dwom,
sɛ AWURADE animuonyam yɛ kɛseɛ.
Na AWURADE wɔ sorosoro, na ɔhwɛ ahobrɛasefoɔ,
na ahantanfoɔ deɛ, ɔhu wɔn wɔ akyirikyiri.
Menam ahohia mu a,
woma me nkwa,
wotene wo nsa m’atamfoɔ abufuo so,
na wo nifa gye me.
AWURADE bɛwie di ama me,
AWURADE, w’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa,
wo nsa ano adwuma no, worennya no hɔ.
AWURADE, wohwehwɛ me mu, na wohu me.
Wo na wonim m’asetena ne me sɔreɛ,
wohunu m’adwene mu akyirikyiri.
Wohwehwɛ me nanteɛ ne me nna mu,
na wonim m’akwan nyinaa mu yie.
Na asɛm biara nni me tɛkyerɛma so
gye deɛ wo, AWURADE, wonim ne nyinaa no.
Woaka me ahyɛm, m’akyiri ne m’anim,
na wode wo nsa ato me so.
Saa nimdeɛ yi yɛ me nwanwa dodo,
ɛkɔ soro dodo, mentumi nnuru koraa.
Ɛhe na mɛfiri wo honhom no anim madwane makorɔ?
Na ɛhe na mɛfiri w’anim madwane makorɔ?
Sɛ meforo soro a, wowɔ hɔ,
na mpo mekɔsɛ me kɛtɛ Asamando a, woni!
Sɛ mefa adekyeeɛ ntaban metu
mekɔtena ɛpo akyiri nohoa a,
ɛhɔ nso na wo nsa bɛkɔ akɔgya me,
na wo nifa bɛsɔ me mu.
Na sɛ mese: Esum nko mmɛkata me so
na me ho hann nnane anadwo a,
esum nso nnuru sum mma wo,
na anadwo hran sɛ awia,
esum ne hann yɛ wo pɛ.
Na wo na wobɔɔ me sawa,
wonwonoo me, me na yam.
Meda wo ase sɛ woyɛɛ me maa no yɛɛ hu ne nwanwa,
wo nneyɛɛ yɛ nwanwa,
na me kra nim saa yie.
Me nnompe anhunta wo,
berɛ a wɔyɛɛ me ahuntaeɛ mu
na wɔnwonoo me asase mu tɔnn no.
Meyɛ mogya toa nko no,
w’ani hunuu me,
na wo nwoma mu, wɔatwerɛ ne nyinaa,
nna a wɔahyɛ asie
na emu baako pɛ nnya mmaeɛ no.
Na me deɛ, Onyankopɔn,
sɛdeɛ w’adwene boɔ si yɛ me den!
Sɛdeɛ ɛsi dɔɔso!
Sɛ merekan a, ɛdɔɔso sene anwea,
menyane a, meda so mewɔ wo ho ara.
Onyankopɔn, sɛ wobɛkum abɔnefoɔ
na mogyapɛfoɔ afiri me so akɔ ɛ!
Wɔn a wɔkasa tia wo mmusuo mu
ne w’atamfo a wɔbɔ wo din ahuhudeɛ mu no.
AWURADE, wɔn a wɔtane woɔ no, mentane wɔn anaa?
Na wɔn a wɔsɔre tia woɔ no, me werɛ nho wɔn anaa?
Mede ɔtane pa metane wɔn,
mebu wɔn m’atamfoɔ.
Onyankopɔn, hwehwɛ me mu, na hunu m’akoma,
sɔ me hwɛ, na hunu m’adwene,
na hwɛ sɛ amaneɛ kwan bi wɔ me hɔ,
na gya me kɔ daa kwan so!
AWURADE, yi me firi onipa bɔne nsam,
bɔ me ho ban, ɔbarima ɔboɔdurufoɔ ho.
Wɔn na wɔdwene akoma mu bɔne,
daa nyinaa wɔka ɔko.
Wɔse wɔn tɛkyerɛma ano sɛ ɔwɔ,
ahuritia borɔ wɔ wɔn se ano.
AWURADE, hwɛ me so firi ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam,
bɔ me ho ban ɔbarima ɔboɔdurufoɔ ho,
na wɔabɔ wɔn tirim pɔ sɛ wɔbɛsum m’anammɔn atwene.
Ahantanfoɔ de fidie ne nhoma ato hɔ ama me,
wɔasum me nsɛmma kwankyɛn,
wɔasum me apa.
Mesee AWURADE sɛ: Wone me Nyankopɔn;
AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me nkotosrɛ nne.
Ao, AWURADE, me Wura, me nkwagyeɛ ahoɔden,
wokataa me tiri so wɔ ɔko da mu.
AWURADE, mma ɔbɔnefoɔ deɛ ɔpɛ,
mma n’agyina no nnkɔ so, na wɔamma wɔn ho so.
Wɔn a wɔtwa me ho hyia no deɛ,
ma wɔn anomu mmusuo mmua wɔn atifi.
Ma nsramma ngu wɔn so,
ma wɔmfa wɔn ngu ogya mu,
aku donkodonko mu a wɔrensɔre bio.
Mma ɔtɛkyerɛmafoɔ nntintim asase so,
ɔboɔdurufoɔ, ma bɔne nti no yerɛdɛdɛ.
Menim sɛ AWURADE bɛdi ɔmanehunufoɔ asɛm,
ɔbɛbu atɛn ama ahiafoɔ.
Ampa, teneneefoɔ bɛda wo din ase,
teefoɔ bɛtena w’anim.
AWURADE, mesu mefrɛ wo, yɛ ntɛm ma me;
sɛ mesu mefrɛ wo a, yɛ aso ma me.
Ma me mpaebɔ mmɛsi w’anim sɛ ohwam,
me nsa soma sɛ anwummerɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ.
AWURADE, fa ɔwɛn bɛwɛn m’ano,
na hwɛ m’anofafa pono ano.
Nkom m’akoma nkɔ nsɛmmɔne ho,
sɛ me ne nnipa amumuyɛfoɔ bɛdi nsɛmmɔne,
na mma mennka wɔn nnɔkɔnnɔkɔwadeɛ bi mennhwɛ.
Ma ɔteneneeni mmɔ me na ɔnka m’anim adɔeɛ so,
ɛyɛ tire so ngo a me tiri rempoɔ,
nanso amumuyɛfoɔ ngo deɛ, mma no ngu me tiri so,
na me mpaebɔ ara na ɛda so tia wɔn nsɛmmɔne.
Wɔsum wɔn atemmufoɔ hwe ɔbotan so,
na wɔte me nsɛm sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ.
Sɛdeɛ obi dwiri asase funtum soɔ no,
saa ara na wɔama yɛn nnompe apete Damena ano.
Na wo, AWURADE, so na m’ani da,
wo na medwane bɛtoa wo, nto me kra ntwene.
Kora me firi apa a wɔasum me
ne amumuyɛfoɔ mfidie ho.
Ma abɔnefoɔ nhwe wɔn ankasa nsɛmma mu,
na me deɛ, ma mensiane ho menkɔ prɛko.

fragment.content: Dawid nnweneho dwom. Mpaeɛ a ɔwɔ ɔbodan mu no, ɔbɔeɛ.

block_quote.content: Mede me nne mesu mefrɛ AWURADE,
mede me nne mekoto mesrɛ AWURADE,
mehwie m’abooboo megu n’anim,
meka m’ahohia mekyerɛ no.
Me honhom tɔ piti me mu a,
wo na wonim me kwan.
Ɛkwan a menam soɔ no so
na wɔsum me fidie.
Mehwɛ nifa, na hwɛ,
obi nni hɔ a n’ani ku me ho,
dwanekɔbea abɔ me,
obiara mfa me kra nyɛ huu.
Mesu mefrɛ wo, AWURADE.
Mese: Wone me dwanekɔbea,
me kyɛfa, ateasefoɔ asase so.
Wɛn w’aso tie me su,
na mayɛ hodwoo,
yi me firi m’ataafoɔ nsam,
na wɔn ho yɛ den kyɛne me.
Yi me kra firi afiase,
na mayi wo din ayɛ.
Ateneneefoɔ bɛtwa me ho ahyia
sɛ wo ne me adi no yie.
AWURADE, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso ma me nkotosrɛ,
wo nokorɛdie mu gye me so, wo tenenee mu.
Na mfa w’akoa nkɔ atemmuo mu,
na w’anim ɔteasefoɔ biara renni bem.
Na ɔtamfoɔ taa me kra,
ɔbɔ me nkwa hwe fam,
ɔma metena sum mu sɛ wɔn a wɔawu dadaada.
Na me honhom tɔ piti me mu,
m’akoma asene me yam.
Mekae tete nna,
medwene wo nneyɛɛ nyinaa ho,
mesusu wo nsa ano nnwuma ho.
Metene me nsam mekyerɛ wo,
wo ho sukɔm de me kra sɛ asase a awoɔ.
O AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm gye me so,
me honhom tɔ piti,
nyi w’ani nhunta me,
na manyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ Amena mu.
Ma mente w’adɔeɛ anɔpa,
na wo so na mede me ho metoɔ.
Ma menhunu kwan a memfa soɔ,
na wo na mema me kra so mekyerɛ woɔ.
O AWURADE, yi me firi m’atamfoɔ nsam.
Wo nkyɛn na mede me ho makora.
Kyerɛkyerɛ me deɛ wopɛ yɛ,
na wone me Nyankopɔn,
wo honhom pa no
nnya me asase tee so.
Wo din nti, AWURADE, ma mennya nkwa,
wo tenenee mu yi me kra firi ahohia mu,
na w’adɔeɛ mu yi m’atamfoɔ hɔ,
na sɛe wɔn a wɔha me kra nyinaa,
na w’akoa ne me.
Nhyira ne AWURADE, me botan
a ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me nsa ɔsa
ne me nsateaa akodie.
M’adɔeɛ ne m’abankɛseɛ,
m’abantenten ne me gyefoɔ,
me kyɛm ne deɛ medwane mekɔtoa no
a ɔbrɛ me man ase hyɛ m’aseɛ.
AWURADE, onipa ne hwan a wohu no,
ɔdasani ba ne hwan a wodwene ne ho?
Onipa te sɛ ahuhuo,
ne nna te sɛ sunsum a ɛretwam.
AWURADE, kuntunu wo soro, na si fam,
keka mmepɔ, na ɛmfiri wisie.
Pa anyinam, na pansam wɔn,
toto wo mmɛmma, na sɛe wɔn.
Tene wo nsa firi soro nohoa,
hwam me, na yi me firi nsuo akɛseɛ mu,
firi ananafoɔ mma nsam.
Wɔn na wɔn ano ka nsɛnhuhuo,
na wɔn nifa yɛ atorɔ nifa.
Onyankopɔn, mɛto dwom foforɔ mama wo,
mede sankuo a ɛso han du bɛto dwom mama wo,
sɛ wo na wode nkwagyeɛ ma ahemfo,
na wogyee w’akoa Dawid firii afena a ɛnyɛ ano.
Gye me na yi me
firi ananafoɔ mma
a wɔn ano ka nsɛnhunu nsam.
Wɔn na wɔn nifa yɛ atorɔ nifa.
Na yɛn mmabanin ayɛ sɛ tɛ nnua
a anyini yie, wɔn mmeranteberɛ mu,
na yɛn mmammaa ayɛ sɛ twea so adum
a wɔasene no sɛ ahemfie deɛ.
Na yɛn asan ayɛ ma
a wɔyi mu nnoɔma ahodoɔ nyinaa,
na yɛn nnwan awo mpempem
ayɛ mpem du du yɛn nsase so.
Na yɛn anantwie ho atua wɔn ho
a ɔsɛeɛ ne ɔyera mma wɔn mu,
na abooboo amma yɛn mmɔntene so.
Nhyira ne ɔman a wɔte sɛɛ,
nhyira ne ɔman a AWURADE ne wɔn Nyankopɔn.
Mɛma wo so, me Nyankopɔn, ɔhene,
na mɛhyira wo din daa daa.
Mɛhyira wo daa nyinaa,
na mɛyi wo din ayɛ daa daa.
AWURADE so, na ɔsɛ ayeyie kɛse,
ne kɛseyɛ mu nni hwehwɛeɛ.
Awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ kamfo wo nnwuma kyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ foforɔ,
na wɔka wo mmaninneɛ.
Mɛdwene w’animuonyam a ɛhran no kɛseyɛ
ne w’anwanwasɛm no ho.
Na wɔka wo nneyɛɛ a ɛyɛ hu no tumi ho asɛm,
na mɛka w’ade kɛseɛ makyerɛ.
Wɔworo wo papayɛ bebrebe no nkaeɛ,
na wɔto wo tenenee ho ahurisie dwom.
AWURADE yɛ ɔdomfoɔ ne mmɔborɔhunufoɔ,
ne bo kyɛre fu na n’adɔeɛ so.
AWURADE yɛ ma nnipa nyinaa,
na ne mmɔborɔhunu wɔ ne nnwuma nyinaa so.
AWURADE, wo nnwuma nyinaa da wo ase,
na w’ahotefoɔ hyira wo.
Wɔka w’ahennie animuonyam,
na wɔbɔ wo mmaninyɛ din,
sɛ wɔbɛma nnipa mma ahunu ne mmaninneɛ
ne n’ahennie animuonyam a ɛhran no.
W’ahennie yɛ daa ahennie,
na wo tumidie fa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
AWURADE wowa wɔn a wɔhwe aseɛ nyinaa,
na ɔma wɔn a wɔakotoɔ nyinaa so gyina.
Ani nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan,
na woma wɔn wɔn aduane ne berɛ mu.
Wobue wo nsam,
na woma ateasefoɔ nyinaa nya deɛ wɔpɛ di mee.
AWURADE tene, n’akwan nyinaa mu,
na ɔyɛ adɔeɛ ne nnwuma nyinaa mu.
AWURADE bɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinaa,
wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nokorɛ mu nyinaa.
Ɔyɛ deɛ wɔn a wɔsuro no no pɛ ma wɔn,
na ɔtie wɔn sufrɛ, na ɔgye wɔn.
AWURADE hwɛ n’adɔfo nyinaa so,
na abɔnefoɔ nyinaa deɛ, ɔbɛsɛe wɔn.
M’ano bɛka AWURADE ayeyie,
na ma honam nyinaa nhyira ne din kronkron daa daa.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Me kra, yi AWURADE ayɛ.
Mete ase yi, mɛyi AWURADE ayɛ,
mewɔ hɔ yi, mɛto dwom mama me Nyankopɔn.
Mommfa mo ho nnto ahemfo
anaa onipa ba a nkwagyeɛ biara nni ne mu so.
Ne honhom firi kɔ, ɔsane kɔ ne dɔteɛ mu,
da no ara ne tirim a ɔbɔeɛ yera.
Nhyira ne deɛ Yakob Nyankopɔn ne ne boafoɔ,
deɛ n’ani da AWURADE, ne Nyankopɔn, soɔ.
Ɔno na ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase,
ɛpo ne deɛ ɛwom nyinaa,
ɔno na ɔkora nokorɛ daa.
Ɔbu atɛn ma wɔn a wɔdi wɔn amim,
ɔma wɔn a ɛkɔm de wɔn aduane.
AWURADE tu nneduafoɔ.
AWURADE bue anifirafoɔ ani,
AWURADE ma wɔn a wɔakotoɔ so gyina,
AWURADE dɔ ateneneefoɔ,
AWURADE kora ahɔhoɔ,
ɔgyina nwisiaa ne akunafoɔ akyi,
na abɔnefoɔ kwan deɛ, ɔdane ani.
AWURADE di hene daa,
Sion, wo Nyankopɔn di hene kɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ,
na ɛyɛ sɛ wɔto dwom ma yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na ɛyɛ dɛ, ayeyie fata.
AWURADE na ɔkyekyere Yerusalem,
ɔpɔn Israelfoɔ a wɔapete wɔn.
Ɔsa wɔn a wɔn akoma abubuo yadeɛ,
na ɔkyekyere wɔn akuro.
Ɔkyerɛ nsoromma dodoɔ ano,
ɔtoto wɔn nyinaa din.
Yɛn AWURADE so, na ne tumi dɔɔso,
ne nhunumu nni anobuo.
AWURADE ma ahobrɛasefoɔ gyina,
ɔto abɔnefoɔ hwe fam.
Monto aseda dwom mma AWURADE,
momfa sankuo nto dwom mma yɛn Nyankopɔn.
Ɔno na ɔde mununkum kata ɔsoro,
ɔsiesie osuo ma asase,
ɔma wira fifiri mmepɔ so.
Ɔde aduane ma mmoadoma
ne anene mma a wɔsu.
Ɛnyɛ ɔpɔnkɔ ahoɔden na ɛyɛ no fɛ,
ɛnyɛ ɔdasani akokoɔduro na ɛsɔ n’ani.
AWURADE ani sɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no,
wɔn a wɔn ani da n’adɔeɛ soɔ.
Yerusalem, kamfo AWURADE,
Sion, yi wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ!
Na wahyɛ w’aponkɛseɛ adaban den,
wahyira wo mma a wɔwɔ wo mu.
Ɔma w’ahyeɛ so dwo,
ɔde ayuo pa ma wodi mee.
Ɔma ne kaseɛ ba asase so,
n’asɛm tu mmirika ntɛmntɛm.
Ɔma sukyerɛmma tɔ sɛ asaawa fukuiɛ,
ɔpete obosuo nkyenkyeneeɛ sɛ nso.
Ɔto n’asukɔtweaa gu sɛ mporoporowa;
hwan na ɔbɛtumi n’awɔ?
Ɔma n’asɛm nane no,
ɔma ne mframa bɔ ma nsuo sene.
Ɔyi n’asɛm kyerɛ Yakob,
ɔde n’ahyɛdeɛ ne n’atemmudeɛ kyerɛ Israel.
Ɔnyɛɛ ɔman biara saa da,
na n’atemmudeɛ no, wɔnnim.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ mfiri soro,
monyi no ayɛ sorosoro.
N’abɔfoɔ nyinaa, monyi no ayɛ,
n’asafo nyinaa, monyi no ayɛ.
Owia ne ɔsrane, monyi no ayɛ,
nsoromma a ɛhran nyinaa, monyi no ayɛ.
Mo soro mu soro, monyi no ayɛ,
ɛne mo asuasu a ɛwɔ ɔsoro soɔ.
Ma wɔnyi AWURADE din ayɛ,
na ɔno na ɔhyɛeɛ na wɔbɔɔ wɔn;
na ɔde wɔn tintim hɔ daa daa,
wahyɛ ahyɛdeɛ a obi ntra.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ mfiri asase so,
nsuboa ahodoɔ ne abunu nyinaa;
ogya ne asukɔtweaa, sukyerɛmma ne huruhuro,
ahum a ɛyɛ deɛ n’asɛm seɛ:
Mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ nyinaa,
nnua a ɛsoɔ ne ntweneduro nyinaa,
wiram mmoa ne afieboa nyinaa,
mmoa a wɔwea ne ntakraboa.
Asase so ahemfo ne aman nyinaa,
atitire ne asase so atemmufoɔ nyinaa,
mmeranteɛ ne mmabaa nso,
mpanin ne mmɔfra:
Wɔnyi AWURADE din ayɛ,
sɛ ne din nko na ɛso;
n’animuonyam tra asase ne ɔsoro so.
Na wama abɛn so ama ne man,
ama n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa ayeyie,
ama Israel mma, ɔman a wɔbɛn no no.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monto dwom foforɔ mma AWURADE,
monka n’ayeyie ahotefoɔ asafo mu.
Ma Israel ani nnye ne yɛfoɔ ho,
ma Sion mma nni wɔn hene ho ahurisie.
Ma wɔmfa asa nyi ne din ayɛ,
ma wɔmfa mpintin ne asankuo nto dwom mma no.
Na AWURADE ani sɔ ne man,
ɔde nkwagyeɛ hyehyɛ ahobrɛasefoɔ.
Ahotefoɔ hyehyɛ wɔn ho animuonyam mu,
wɔto ahosan dwom, wɔn nnaeɛ so.
Nyankopɔn ayeyie a ɛso wɔ wɔn anomu,
na nkrantɛ anofanu hyɛ wɔn nsam,
sɛ wɔbɛtɔ amanaman mu were,
na wɔatwe aman aso;
sɛ wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn bɛkyekyere wɔn ahemfo,
na wɔde dadeɛ mpokyerɛ agu wɔn atitire;
sɛ wɔde atɛn a wɔatwerɛ no bɛbu wɔn;
ɛne n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa animuonyam.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ wɔ ne kronkronbea,
monyi no ayɛ ne tumi wie no mu.
Monyi no ayɛ ne mmaninyɛ mu,
monyi no ayɛ sɛ ne kɛseyɛ sononko no teɛ.
Monyi no ayɛ ntotorobɛnto nne so,
monyi no ayɛ bɛnta ne sankuten so.
Monyi no ayɛ mpintin ne asa so,
monyi no ayɛ asankuhan ne atɛntɛbɛn so.
Monyi no ayɛ nsambɔ nnawuro a ne nne so so,
monyi no ayɛ nnawuta a ɛgyegye denden so.
Momma deɛ ɛhome nyinaa nyi AWURADE ayɛ.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
